src: Pendaratan D-Day dan pertempuran yang menyusul telah membebaskan utara Perancis, tetapi bahagian selatan masih belum dibebaskan. Ia telah diperintah oleh “Vichy” Perancis. Mereka ialah rakyat Perancis yang membuat pakatan damai dengan Jerman pada 1940 dan telah memilih untuk bekerjasama dengan penjajah daripada menentang mereka. Pada 15 Ogos 1940, Pihak Berikat menyerang Perancis selatan, serangan ini dipanggil “Operation Dragoon”. Hanya dalam dua minggu, tentera Amerika dan Perancis Bebas telah membebaskan selatan Perancis dan berpaling ke arah Jerman.
mt: D-Day landings and the ensuing battles had freed northern France, but the southern part was still not liberated. It had been ruled by “Vichy” France. They were the French people who made a peace pact with Germany in 1940 and had chosen to cooperate with the occupiers rather than fight them. On August 15, 1940, the Allies attacked southern France, this operation was called “Operation Dragoon”. Only in two weeks, the American and Free French armies had liberated southern France and turned towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Kapal selam ialah kapal yang direka untuk perjalanan dalam air, dan kekal di sana untuk jangka masa yang panjang.. Kapal selam digunakan dalam Perang Dunia I dan Perang Dunia II. Pada ketika itu mereka amat perlahan dan jarak tembak adalah sangat terhad. Pada mula peperangan mereka banyak menggembara di atas laut, tetapi apabila radar berkembang dan menjadi lebih tepat kapal selam terpaksa masuk ke bawah air untuk mengelakkan dilihat. Kapal selam Jerman dikenali sebagai kapal U. Orang Jerman sangat bagus dalam navigasi dan mengoperasi kapal selam mereka. Oleh sebab kejayaannya dengan kapal selam, selepas perang, pemilikan kapal selam yang banyak di tangan Jerman membimbangkan.
mt: A submarine is a ship designed to travel underwater. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. At that time they were very slow and the range of their guns was very limited. At first they were used to roam the seas, but when radar developed and became more accurate submarines had to go underwater to avoid being seen. German submarines were known as U-boats. The Germans were very good at navigation and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war, the large number of submarines in German hands was worrisome.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Manjelang 17hb September, 1939, pertahanan Poland telah hancur, dan satu-satunya harapan adalah untuk mengundur dan menyusun semula di sepanjang jambatan Romania. Namun, rancangan-rancangan ini menjadi usang dalam semalan, selepas 800,000 tentera daripada Tentera Merah Kesatuan Soviet masuk dan mewujudkan barisan Belarus dan Ukraine selepas menyerang kawasan timur Poland dengan melanggar Perjanjian Damai Riga, Perjanjian Berkecuali Soviet-Poland, dan lain-lain perjanjian antarabangsa, dua hala dan pelbagai hala.
mt: 17 September 1939, Poland's defense had been destroyed, and the only hope was to retreat and regroup along the Romanian bridge. However, these plans became obsolete in the meantime, after 800,000 troops from the Soviet Red Army entered and created the Belarus and Ukraine front after attacking eastern Poland by violating the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international, bilateral, and multilateral agreements.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Manjelang 17hb September, 1939, pertahanan Poland telah hancur, dan satu-satunya harapan adalah untuk mengundur dan menyusun semula di sepanjang jambatan Romania. ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Segalanya tidak berjalan lancar bagi orang Itali di Afrika Utara sejak awal. Dalam masa seminggu selepas pengisytiharan Itali perang pada 10 Jun, 1940, British 11 Hussars telah merampas Fort Capuzzo di Libya. Dalam satu serangan hendap di timur Bardia, British telah menangkap Jeneral Lastucci, Ketua Jurutera Tentera Darat Ke-Sepuluh Itali. Pada 28 Jun, Marsyal Italo Balbo, Gabenor Jeneral Libya dan pewaris Mussolini, terbunuh oleh tembakan terlepas ketika mendarat di Tobruk.
mt: Everything did not go smoothly for the Italians in North Africa since the beginning. Within a week after Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11 Hussars had captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In a surprise attack east of Bardia, the British had captured General Lastucci, Chief of Staff of the Tenth Italian Army. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor General of Libya and heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Agama Buddha Tibet adalah berdasarkan kepada ajaran Buddha, tetapi telah dilanjutkan dengan jalan cinta mahayana dan banyak teknik daripada Yoga India. Buddhisme Tibet mempunyai prinsip yang sangat sederhana. Ia terdiri daripada Yoga Kundalini, meditasi dan laluan cinta yangmenyeluruh. Tenaga Kundalini (tenaga kesedaran) dicetuskan dengan Yoga Kundalini melalui postur yoga, latihan pernafasan, mantra dan visualisasi. Asas kepada meditasi Tibet ialah Yoga Dewa. Menggambarkan pelbagai dewa membersihkan saluran tenaga, mengaktifkan cakra dan kesedaran dalaman diwujudkan.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but has been extended with the path of Mahayana and many techniques from Indian Yoga. Tibetan Buddhism has a very simple principle. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the all-encompassing path of love. The Kundalini energy (energy of awareness) is triggered by Kundalini Yoga through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The basis of Tibetan meditation is God Yoga. By depicting various gods cleansing the energy channels, activating chakras and inner awareness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Program ini bermula pada 8:30 p.m. waktu tempatan (15.00 UTC). Penyanyi terkenal dari seluruh negara mempersembahkan bhajan, atau lagu ibadah, pada hujung kaki Shri Shyam. Penyanyi Sanju Sharma memulakan petang itu, diikuti dengan Jai Shankar Choudhary. [Lakka Singh juga] menyampaikan chhappan bhog bhajan. Penyanyi Raju Khandelwal menemaninya. Kemudian, Lakkha Singh mengetuai nyanyian lagu bhajan. 108 pinggan Chhappan Bhog (dalam agama Hindu, 56 item berbeza yang boleh dimakan, seperti manisan, buah, kekacang, juadah dsb. yang dipersembahkan kepada dewa) dihidangkan kepada Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh juga mempersembahkan chhappan bhog bhajan. Penyanyi Raju Khandelwal menemani beliau.
mt: The program began at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers from all over the country performed bhajans, or devotional songs, at the feet of Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma began the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. [Lakka Singh also] led the singing of chhappan bhog bhajans. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then, Lakkha Singh led the singing of chhappan bhog bhajans. 108 chhappan bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different items that can be eaten, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, snacks, etc. that are offered to the god) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also performed chhappan bhog bhajans. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Perayaan dimulakan dengan persembahan khas oleh kumpulan Cirque du Soleil yang terkenal di dunia. Ia diikuti oleh Orkestra Simfoni Negeri Istanbul, kugiran Janissary serta penyanyi Fatih Erkoç dan Müslüm Gürses. Kemudian Whirling Dervishes telah naik ke pentas. Diva Turki Sezen Aksu membuat persembahan bersama penyanyi tenor Alessandro Safina dari Itali serta penyanyi Yunani, Haris Alexiou. Upacara diakhiri dengan pertunjukan “Troy” oleh kumpulan tarian Fire of Anatolia dari Turki.
mt: The celebrations began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. This was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary Band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. The Whirling Dervishes then took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The ceremony ended with the performance "Troy" by the Turkish dance troupe Fire of Anatolia.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Penumpang diberikan air sambil mereka menunggu di bawah suhu panas 90°F. Kapten bomba Scott Kouns berkata, “Hari itu hari yang panas di Santa Clara dengan suhu dalam lingkungan 90°F. “Sebarang tempoh terperangkap di roller coaster akan menyebabkan ketidakselesaan, dan memerlukan sekurang-kurangnya satu jam untuk usaha penyelamatan dilakukan.”
mt: Passengers were given water as they waited under the hot 90°F weather. Captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. "Any period trapped on the roller coaster would cause discomfort, and would require at least one hour for rescue efforts to be made."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Menurut buletin terkini, bacaan paras laut menunjukkan tsunami telah berlaku. Terdapat beberapa aktiviti tsunami yang jelas dicatatkan berhampiran Pago Pago dan Niue. Tiada kerosakan atau kecederaan teruk dilaporkan di Tonga, tetapi bekalan tenaga hilang buat sementara waktu, yang dilaporkan menghalang pihak berkuasa Tonga daripada menerima amaran tsunami yang dikeluarkan oleh PTWC. Empat belas sekolah di Hawaii yang terletak di atau berdekatan pesisir pantai ditutup sepanjang hari Rabu walaupun amaran ditarik balik.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred.  Several tsunami events were clearly recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.  No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power outages have been reported, which have prevented Tongan officials from receiving tsunami warnings issued by PTWC.  Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near the shoreline were closed for the day Wednesday, even though the warning was cancelled.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, pembantu pemandu untuk pasukan A1GP New Zealand telah membuat sejarah dengan memandu paling pantas di atas Jambatan Pelabuhan Auckland, New Zealand yang berusia 48 tahun, secara mematuhi undang-undang. En Reid berjaya memandu kereta A1GP New Zealand, Black Beauty pada kelajuan melebihi 160km/j tujuh kali di atas jambatan. Polis New Zealand menghadapi masalah menggunakan alat radar kelajuan mereka untuk melihat kelajuan Mr Reid disebabkan kerendahan kenderaan Black Beauty tersebut, dan satu-satunya masa polis berjaya mendapatkan bacaan ialah ketika Mr Reid memperlahankan kelajuan kenderaan kepada 160km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, the driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, made history by driving the fastest ever over the Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand's 48-year-old bridge, legally. Reid successfully drove the A1GP New Zealand car, Black Beauty, at speeds exceeding 160 km/h seven times over the bridge. New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar to see Reid's speed because of the low profile of the Black Beauty car, and the only time police were able to get a reading was when Reid slowed the car to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Satu gempa bumi sederhana telah menggegarkan Montana Barat pada pukul 10.08 p.m. pada hari Isnin. Tiada laporan segera mengenai kerosakan telah diterima oleh Tinjauan Geologi Amerika Syarikat (USGS) dan Pusat Maklumat Gempa Bumi Nasional. Gempa bumi berpusat kira-kira 20 km (15 batu) utara-timur laut Dillon, dan kira-kira 65 km (40 batu) selatan Butte.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10.08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage were received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Penjara Abu Ghraib di Iraq telah dijilat api ketika sebuah rusuhan. Penjara itu menjadi terkenal setelah berlaku penderaan tahanan di sana selepas tentera AS mengambil alih.
mt: Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set ablaze during a riot. The prison became notorious after prisoner abuse occurred there after U.S. troops took over.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Kumpulan ini membatalkan persembahan di Stadium Peringatan Perang Maui yang akan dihadiri oleh 9.000 orang dan meminta maaf kepada peminat. Syarikat pengurusan kumpulan itu, HK Management Inc., tidak memberi sebarang sebab apabila mereka membatalkan pada 20 September, tetapi telah menyalahkan logistik hari esok.
mt: The group canceled a performance at the Maui War Memorial Stadium, which was to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The group's management company, HK Management Inc., did not give any reason for the cancellation on September 20, but has blamed logistics for the next day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Penjarahan yang berleluasa dilaporkan berlanjutan semalaman, kerana pegawai penguatkuasa tidak hadir di jalan Bishkek. Bishkek digambarkan sebagai mendalami keadaan “anarki” oleh seorang pemerhati, sambil berkelompok orang merayau-rayau di jalan dan merompak kedai barang konsumer. Beberapa penduduk Bishkek menyalahkan penunjuk perasaan dari selatan untuk huru-hara tersebut.
mt: Robberies were reported to continue overnight, as traffic police were not present on Bishkek street. Bishkek was described as “anarchic” by an observer, as people roamed in groups in the streets and looted consumer stores. Some Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the chaos.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Sebelum ini, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, mengatakan syarikat itu bermula apabila loceng pintu beliau tidak dapat didengar dari kedai dalam garajnya. Dia menghasilkan loceng pintu WiFi, katanya. Siminoff mengatakan bahawa jualan telah meningkat setelah penampilan beliau pada tahun 2013 dalam sebuah episod Shark Tank di mana panel rancangan tersebut menolak untuk membiayai permulaannya. Pada akhir 2017, Siminoff muncul pada saluran televisyen membeli-belah QVC. Ring turut mencapai satu penyelesaian tuntutan mahkamah dengan syarikat keselamatan pesaing, ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company started when his garage doorbell couldn't be heard from his store. He created a WiFi doorbell, he said. Siminoff said sales have increased after his appearance on a 2013 episode of Shark Tank where the show's panel rejected funding his start-up. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC. Ring also reached a settlement with security rival ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Tayangan PBS mempunyai lebih dua dozen anugerah Emmy, dan perjalanannya adalah lebih pendek hanya daripada “Sesame Street” dan “Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood”. Setiap episod dari rancangan tersebut akan memberi tumpuan pada satu tema dalam sebuah buku khusus dan menggali tema tersebut melalui pelbagai kisah. Setiap pertunjukkan juga memberi cadangan berkaitan buku-buku yang kanak-kanak patut mencari semasa mereka ke perpustakaan. John Grant, dari WNED Buffalo (stesen utama Reading Rainbow) mengatakan “Reading Rainbow telah mengajar kanak-kanak kenapa harus membaca,... minat untuk membaca - [rancangan ini] menggalakkan kanak-kanak untuk mengambil buku dan membaca.” Dipercayai beberapa individu, termasuk ohn Grant, bahawa masalah pembiayaan dan anjakan dalam falsafah pengaturcaraan pendidikan televisyen menyumbang kepada pengakhiran siri tersebut.
mt: PBS has more than two dozen Emmy awards, and its journey is shorter than "Sesame Street" and "Mister Rogers' Neighborhood". Each episode of the show will focus on one theme in a special book and explore that theme through various stories. Each episode also offers suggestions about books that children should look for when they go to the library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (the main station of Reading Rainbow) said, "Reading Rainbow has taught children why they should read,... interest in reading - [this show] encourages children to take books and read." It is believed by some individuals, including John Grant, that funding problems and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to the end of the series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Pegawai untuk bandaraya Amsterdam dan Muzium Anne Frank menyatakan bahwa pokok berkenaan telah dijangkiti kulat dan menimbulkan bahaya kesihatan awam semasa mereka berhujah berkenaan ia berbahaya tumbang. Ia telah dijadualkan untuk dipotong pada hari Selasa, tapi diselamatkan setelah keputusan mahkamah darurat.
mt: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree in question has been infected with fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argued it was dangerous to fall. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after a last-minute court decision.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Pembebasan haiwan dan Masyarakat Diraja untuk pencegahan kekejaman terhadap haiwan (RSPCA) sekali lagi mohon instalsi kamera television litar tertutup di semua rumah sembelih Australia. Ketua inspektor RSPCA New South Wales, David O'Shannessy memberitahu ABC bahawa pengawasan dan pemeriksaan rumah sembelih menjadi perkara biasa di Australia. “CCTV ini pasti akan menghantar isyarat yang jelas kepada orang-orang yang bekerja dengan haiwan bahawa kebajikan haiwan ini adalah keutamaan tertinggi.”
mt: The RSPCA and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) once again call for closed-circuit television (CCTV) installations in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that monitoring and inspection of abattoirs is commonplace in Australia. "This CCTV will certainly send a clear signal to those working with animals that animal welfare is the top priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Berita tersebar di komuniti Red Lake hari ini semasa upacara pengebumian untuk Jeff Weise dan tiga daripada sembilan mangsa berlangsung, yang seorang pelajar lain telah ditahan berhubung dengan penembakan sekolah yang berlaku pada 21 Mac. Pihat berkuasa menyatakan tidak banyak secara rasmi di luar pengesahan penangkapan hari ini. Namun, sebuah sumber dengan pengetahuan tentang siasatan tersebut telah memaklumkan Minneapolis Star Tribune bahawa orangnya adalah Louis Jordan, anak lelaki Pengerusi Puak Red Lake Floyd Jourdain yang berusia 16 tahun. Tidak diketahui pada masa ini jenis tuduhan yang akan dikenakan atau apakah petunjuk yang membawa pihak berkuasa kepada penangkapan budak lelaki itu, tetapi prosiding juvana telahpun bermula di mahkamah persekutuan.
mt: News spread in the Red Lake community today as the funeral for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims was underway, one other student was arrested in connection with the school shooting that occurred on March 21. Authorities have confirmed little officially outside of the arrest today. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation has informed the Minneapolis Star Tribune that the person is Louis Jordan, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be filed or what evidence led authorities to the arrest of the young man, but juvenile proceedings have already begun in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Para penganjur bagi tunjuk perasaan itu berkata kira-kira 100,000 orang telah menyertai di bandar-bandar German seperti Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg dan Hanover. Di Berlin, polis menganggar sebanyak 6,500 penunjuk perasaan. Protes juga telah mengambil tempat di Paris, Sofia di Bulgaria, Vilnius di Lithuania, Valetta di Malta, Tallinn di Estonia, serta Edinburgh dan Glasgow di Scotland. Di London, kira-kira 200 orang membuat tunjuk perasaan di luar beberapa buah pejabat pemegang hak cipta utama. Bulan lepas, terdapat protes besar-besaran di Poland bila negara itu menandatangani ACTA, di mana membawa kerajaan Poland membuat keputusan untuk tidak meratifikasikan perjanjian, untuk sekarang. Latvia dan Slovakia telah melambatkan proses menganggotai dengan ACTA.
mt: Organizers of the protests said about 100,000 people had taken part in cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated about 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, as well as Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people held a protest outside several major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were large protests in Poland when the country signed ACTA, where the Polish government decided not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have slowed the process of joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Lebih kurang 60 kes ipod tidak berfungsi yang terlampau panas telah dilaporkan, menyebabkan sejumlah enam kebakaran dan empat orang melecur ringan. Kementerian Ekonomi, Perdagangan dan Industri (METI) Jepun menyatakan bahawa mereka sedar terdapat 27 kemalangan yang dikaitkan dengan peranti tersebut. Pada minggu lalu, METI mengumumkan bahawa Apple telah mengumumkan penambahan sebanyak 34 kejadian pemanasan melampau, tetapi syarikat menganggapnya “tidak serius.” Kementerian telah membalas dengan memanggil penundaan laporan dari Apple “sangat mengecewakan”.
mt: 60 or so overheating iPods have been reported, causing six fires and four minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said there were 27 incidents associated with the device. Last week, METI announced that Apple had reported an additional 34 incidents of overheating, but the company considered them "not serious." The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "very disappointing."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Ketua Pegawai Eksekutif Apple, Steve Jobs memperkenalkan peranti tersebut dengan berjalan merentas pentas dan mengeluarkan iPhone dari poket seluar jeans beliau. Dalam ucapannya selama 2 jam, beliau menyatakan “Hari ini Apple akan mencipta semula telefon, Kita akan mencipta sejarah hari ini.”
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device by walking across the stage and pulling an iPhone from his jeans pocket. In his two-hour presentation, he said, "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone. We're going to reinvent the phone."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Ketua Pegawai Eksekutif Apple, Steve Jobs memperkenalkan peranti tersebut dengan berjalan merentas pentas dan mengeluarkan iPhone dari poket seluar jeans beliau. Dalam ucapannya selama 2 jam, beliau menyatakan “Hari ini Apple akan mencipta semula telefon, Kita akan mencipta sejarah hari ini.”
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device by walking across the stage and pulling an iPhone from his jeans pocket. In his two-hour presentation, he said, "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone. We're going to reinvent the phone."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Senator semasa dan Wanita Pertama Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner mengumumkan pencalonannya sebagai presiden petang semalam di La Plata, sebuah kota 50 kilometer (31 batu) dari Buenos Aires. Puan Kirchner mengumumkan hasrat beliau untuk mencalonkan dirinya sebagai presiden di Argentine Theatre, lokasi sama yang beliau menggunakan dulu untuk memulakan kempen untuk Senat pada 2005 sebagai anggota delegasi wilayah Buenos Aires.
mt: Current and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used in 2005 to begin her campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA juga mendapati walaupun video berkenaan disiarkan di internet, Big Brother tidak melanggar undang-undang penapisan kandungan atas talian kerana media berkenaan tidak disimpan di laman web Big Brother. Akta Perkhidmatan Penyiaran menetapkan pengawalan untuk kandungan Internet, namun untuk dianggap kandungan Internet, ia harus secara fisikal berada pada pelayan.
mt: ACMA also found that although the video was broadcast on the Internet, Big Brother did not breach online content filtering laws because the media was not stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act requires control for Internet content, but for Internet content to be considered, it must be physically located on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello, bendahari Australia dan lelaki yang paling mungkin menggantikan Perdana Menteri John Howard sebagai pemimpin parti Liberal telah memberi sokongan untuk sebuah loji kuasa nuklear di Australia. En Castello menyatakan bahwa apabila penjanaan kuasa nuklear menjadi berdaya maju dari segi ekonomi, Australi harus meneruskan penggunaannya. “Jika ia menjadi komersial, kita perlu menggunakannya. Ini bermaksud, tiada bantahan secara prinsip terhadap tenaga nuklear,” kata Encik Costello.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer and the man most likely to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has voiced support for a nuclear power plant in Australia. Mr Costello said that if nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should continue to use it. "If it becomes commercial, we should use it. That means, there is no principled objection to nuclear power," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Dengan hanya lapan belas pingat boleh dimenangi setiap hari, sebilangan negara gagal menaiki podium pingat. Mereka merangkumi peserta dari Belanda iaitu Anna Jochemsen yang tamat di kedudukan ke sembilan Super-G kelmarin, dan Katja Saarinen iaitu peserta dari Finland yang tamat di kedudukan ke sepuluh dalam acara yang sama. Pemain Australia, Mitchell Gourley menduduki tempat kesebelas dalam kategori lelaki Super-G berdiri. Pesaing dari Czech, Oldrich Jelinek menduduki tempat keenam belas dalam kategori lelaki Super-G duduk. Arly Velasquez Mexico menamatkan dengan kedudukan lelaki yang kelima belas di Super-G. Adam Hall dari New Zealand menamatkan dengan kedudukan kesembilan di Super-G. Pemain ski lelaki yang cacat penglihatan dari Poland, Maciej Krezel dan pemandunya Anna Ogarzynska menduduki tempat ketiga belas di Super-G. Jong Seork Park dari Korea Selatan menduduki tempat kedua puluh empat dalam acara duduk Super-G lelaki.
mt: With only eighteen medals awarded each day, a number of countries failed to climb the medal podium. They included participants from the Netherlands, Anna Jochemsen who finished in ninth place in the Super-G standing yesterday, and Katja Saarinen, a participant from Finland who finished in tenth place in the same event. The Australian player, Mitchell Gourley finished in eleventh place in the men's standing Super-G. The Czech player, Oldrich Jelinek finished in sixteenth place in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez Mexico finished in fifteenth place in the men's standing Super-G. Adam Hall from New Zealand finished in ninth place in the Super-G. The blind men's ski player from Poland, Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished in thirteenth place in the Super-G. Jong Seork Park from South Korea finished in twenty-fourth place in the men's sitting Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Perbicaraan berlangsung di Mahkamah Birmingham Crown dan berakhir pada 3 Ogos. Penyampai tersebut yang ditangkap di tempat kejadian, menafikan serangan tersebut dan mengatakan bahawa beliau telah menggunakan galah tersebut untuk melindungi diri daripada botol-botol yang dilemparkan ke arahnya oleh hampir tiga puluh orang. Blake turut didakwa untuk cuba merosakkan jalan keadilan. Hakim memberitahu Blake bahawa “hampir mustahil” untuk dia tidak dimasukkan ke penjara.
mt: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and ended on August 3. The speaker was arrested at the scene, denying the attack and saying that he had used the stick to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by nearly thirty people. Blake was also charged with attempting to obstruct justice. The judge told Blake that "it was almost impossible" for him not to be imprisoned.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Subjek-subjek lain dalam agenda di Bali termasuk menyelamatkan hutan yang masih terpelihara, dan berkongsi teknologi untuk membantu membangunkan negara-negara membangun dengan cara yang mengurangi pencemaran. Pihak Pertubuhan Bangsa-Bangsa Bersatu berharap dapat memuktamadkan satu dana untuk membantu negara-negara yang terjejas oleh pemanasan global bagi mengatasi kesannya. Wang yang dikumpul boleh digunakan untuk memasang penahan banjir pada rumah, pengurusan air yang lebih baik dan kepelbagaian tanaman.
mt: Other items on the agenda in Bali include saving remaining forests, and sharing technology to help developing countries in ways that reduce pollution. The United Nations hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with its effects. The money collected can be used to install flood barriers on homes, better water management and crop diversity.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigeria sebelum ini mengumumkan rancangannya untuk menyertai AfCFTA pada minggu menjelang sidang kemuncak. Pesuruhjaya perdagangan dan perindustrian AU Albert Muchanga mengumumkan penyertaan Benin. Pesuruhjaya berkata, “Kami belum mencapai persetujuan mengenai peraturan asal-usul dan kelonggaran tarif, namun rangka yang ada sudah cukup untuk memulakan perdagangan pada Julai 1, 2020”.
mt: Nigeria previously announced its plans to join AfCFTA last week ahead of the summit. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin's entry. The commissioner said, "We have not reached agreement on rules of origin and tariff relaxation, but the framework is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Beliau memperoleh sanjungan kritis semasa zaman kegemilangannya di Atlanta dan diiktiraf untuk pendidikan bandar inovatif. Pada tahun 2009 beliau dianugerahkan gelaran “Penguasa Polis Nasional Cemerlang” Ketika pemberian anugerah tersebut, sekolah-sekolah di Atlanta telah menunjukkan peningkatan besar dalam skor ujian. Tidak lama selepas itu, Perlembagaan-Jurnal Atlanta menerbitkan laporan yang menunjukkan masalah yang terdapat pada keputusan ujian. Laporan menunjukkan markah pemeriksaan telah meningkat dengan cepat secara tidak munasabah, dan mendakwa bahawa pihak sekolah telah mengesan masalah dalaman sebelumnya tetapi tidak mengambil tindakan. Bukti selepas itu menunjukkan bahawa kertas ujian telah diubah. Hall, bersama-sama 34 pegawai pendidikan lain, didakwa pada tahun 2013.
mt: He received critical acclaim during his tenure in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 he was awarded the title of “Outstanding National Police Chief” When the award was given, schools in Atlanta had shown a large increase in test scores. Shortly after that, the Atlanta Constitution-Journal published a report showing problems with the test results. The report showed that test scores had risen quickly in an unreasonable manner, and claimed that the school had previously identified internal problems but did not take action. Evidence after that showed that test papers had been changed. Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Sebuah bom telah meletup di luar pejabat gabenor jeneral. Tiga lagi bom meletup berhampiran bangunan kerajaan dalam tempoh dua jam. Beberapa laporan menyatakan angka kematian rasmi ialah lapan orang dan laporan rasmi mengesahkan bahawa sehingga 30 orang cedera; tetapi jumlah yang muktamad belum diketahui.
mt: A bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in the next two hours. Several reports state the official death toll is eight people and official reports confirm that up to 30 people are injured; but the final number is not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Jesus yang berusia 21 tahun daripada kelab Brazil Palmeiras telah menyertai Manchester City pada Januari 2017 dengan bayaran yang dilaporkan berjumlah £ 27 juta. Sejak itu, pemain Brazil itu telah menyertai 53 buah perlawanan untuk kelab tersebut dalam semua pertandingan dan telah menjaringkan 24 gol.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus from Brazil's Palmeiras joined Manchester City in January 2017 for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Sebuah asrama runtuh di Makkah, bandar suci Islam sekitar pukul 10 pagi ini waktu tempatan. Bangunan ini menempatkan beberapa jemaah yang datang untuk melawat bandar suci pada malam sebelum haji haji. Tetamu hotel kebanyakan ialah warganegara Emirat Arab Bersatu. Jumlah kematian adalah sekurang-kurangnya 15, satu nombor di mana adalah dijangka untuk naik.
mt: A dormitory collapsed in Makkah, the holy city of Islam around 10 am this local time. The building housed some pilgrims who came to visit the holy city the night before the Hajj. Most hotel guests are citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a number that is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Kedua-dua satelit yang mempunyai jumlah berat lebih dari 1,000 paun, dan bergerak kira-kira 17,500 batu per jam, berlanggar antara satu sama lain 491 batu di atas Bumi. Para saintis berkata bahawa letupan yang disebabkan oleh perlanggaran tersebut adalah sangat besar. Mereka masih sedang cuba menentukan betapa besarnya kemalangan berkenaan dan bagaimana bumi akan terjejas. Kawalan Strategik Amerika Syarikat dari pejabat Pertahanan A.S. sedang menjejaki serpihan. Keputusan memplotkan analisis akan dipaparkan pada laman sesawang umum.
mt: Two satellites, each weighing more than 1,000 pounds, and traveling about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was very large. They are still trying to determine how big the accident was and how the Earth will be affected. The U.S. Defense Department's Strategic Command is tracking debris. The results of plotting the analysis will be posted on a public Web site.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten menduduki tempat ke-190 dalam senarai 400 Orang Paling Kaya Di Amerika Tahun 2008 dengan anggaran kekayaan $2.3 bilion. Beliau lulus dari sekolah tinggi Seni & Sains University of Virginia pada 1950 dan merupakan penyumbang penting institusi tersebut.
mt: Batten ranked 190th in the 2008 Forbes 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts & Sciences in 1950 and is a major benefactor of the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Gabenor California Arnold Schwarzenegger menandatangani undang-undang yang melarang menjual atau menyewa permainan video ganas kepada kanak-kanak bawah umur. Rang undang-undang tersebut menghendaki permainan video yang ganas yang dijual di negeri California dilabelkan dengan decal yang bertulis “18” dan menjadikan penjualan kepada individu di bawah umur boleh dikenakan denda $1000 setiap kesalahan.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a law that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The law requires violent video games sold in California to be labeled with a "18" decal and makes selling to minors punishable by a $1000 fine per offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall, yang telah berkahwin dan mempunyai dua orang anak dewasa, tidak meninggal kesan yang besar pada Miller, yang maklumkan cerita berkenaan. Apabila diminta untuk memberi komen, Miller berkata, “Mike banyak bercakap semasa pendengaran itu...Saya sedang bersiap sedia oleh itu saya tidak dengar apa yang beliau cakap.”
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not leave a large estate to Miller, who reported the story. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talked a lot during the hearing...I was ready for that so I didn't hear what he said."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper telah bersetuju untuk mengemukakan “Akta Udara Bersih” kerajaan kepada jawatankuasa semua parti untuk dikaji semula, sebelum pembacaan keduanya, selepas mesyuarat 25 minit hari Selasa bersama ketua NDP Jack Layton di PMO. Layton telah meminta perubahan pada rang undang-undang alam sekitar konservatif semasa pertemuan dengan PM, meminta “penulisan semula yang menyeluruh dan lengkap” untuk rang undang-undang alam sekitar parti Konservatif. Sejak Kerajaan Persekutuan melangkah untuk mengambil alih pembiayaan hospital Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, kerajaan negeri dan beberapa ahli parlimen telah mengkritik akta ini sebagai aksi dalam awalan kepada pilihan raya persekutuan akan dipanggil menjelang November. Namun Perdana Menteri, John Howard telah berkata bahawa tindakan itu hanya untuk melindungi kemudahan hospital daripada diturun taraf oleh kerajaan Tasmania, dengan memberikan tambahan berjumlah $45 juta AUD.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to put forward the "Clean Air Act" government to all-party committee for review, before a second reading, after a 25-minute meeting Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO. Layton has asked for "comprehensive and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental legislation during a meeting with PM, asking for "a thorough and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental legislation. Since the Federal Government has taken over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some MPs have criticized this act as an action in the forefront of the federal election will be called before November. However, Prime Minister John Howard has said that the action is only to protect the hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, with an additional $45 million AUD.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Kedua asid sianurik dan melamin ditemukan dalam sampel air kencing dari haiwan peliharaan yang meninggal setelah makan makanan haiwan peliharaan yang tercemar. Kedua sebatian itu bereaksi dengan satu sama lain untuk membentuk kristal yang kemungkinan dapat menghambat fungsi ginjal, kata pengkaji di universiti itu. Para penyelidik memerhatikan kristal yang terbentuk dalam air kencing kucing selepas menambah melamin dan asid sianurik. Komposisi kristal ini berpadanan yang dikesan dalam kencing haiwan peliharaan yang terjejas apabila dibanding melalui spektroscopi inframerah (FTIR)
mt: 2 cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after eating contaminated pet food. Both compounds react with each other to form crystals that may interfere with kidney function, researchers at the university said. Researchers observed crystals that formed in cat urine after adding melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matched those detected in affected pets when compared through infrared spectroscopy (FTIR)
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Xinhua melaporkan bahwa penyiasat-penyiasat kerajaan terjumpa dua perakam penerbangan “kotak hitam” pada hari Rabu. Ahli gusti lain juga memberi penghormatan kepada Luna. Tommy Dreamer berkata “Luna adalah Queen pertama Ekstrim. Pengurus pertama saya. Luna meninggal dunia pada malam dua bulan. Pretty unik seperti beliau. Wanita yang kuat.” Dustin “Goldust” Runnels mengulas “Luna seganjil saya ...mungkin lebih...sayang dia dan akan merinduinya...semoga arwah ditempatkan di syurga.”
mt: Xinhua reported that government investigators found two flight recorders, "black boxes," on Wednesday. Other wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Extreme Queen. My first boss. Luna died on the night of two months. Pretty unique like her. A strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented, "Luna was the sweetest person I've ever met... maybe more...I'll miss her...may her soul rest in heaven."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Walaupun seramai tiga orang berada di dalam rumah ketika kereta itu melanggarnya, tiada satu daripada mereka yang tercedera. Namun begitu, pemandu telah cedera parah di kepala. Jalan tempat nahas ditutup sementara untuk perkhidmatan kecemasan membebaskan pemandu daripada Audi TT merah berkenaan. Pada awalnya dia dirawat di Hospital James Paget di Great Yarmouth. Dia selepas itu dipindahkan ke Hospital Addenbrooke di Cambridge.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car crashed through it, but none of them were injured. However, the driver was seriously injured to the head. The road where the accident happened was closed temporarily for emergency services to free the driver from the red Audi TT. Initially he was treated at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to the Addenbrooke Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Permainan dimulakan pada 10:00 pagi dengan cuaca yang baik dan selain hujan gerimis di waktu pagi yang cepat terhenti, ia merupakan hari yang sempurna untuk ragbi 7. Pasukan teratas Afrika Selatan bermula dengan baik apabila mereka mendapat kemenangan mudah dengan skor 26 - 00 menentang Zambia, pasukan berkedudukan ke-5. Pasukan Afrika Selatan kelihatan kurang berprestasi dalam perlawanan menentang jiran selatan mereka, namun prestasi mereka bertambah baik sepanjang kejohanan berlangsung. Disiplin pertahanan mereka, kemahiran mengendali bola dan bekerjasama yang cemerlang menjadikan mereka bertahan dan ia adalah terang bahawa ini adalah pasukan untuk mengalahkan.
mt: The game started at 10:00 am with good weather and aside from a quick morning shower that stopped, it was a perfect day for rugby 7. The top-ranked South Africa team started well by winning easily with a score of 26 - 00 against Zambia, the fifth-ranked team. The South African team looked less impressive in their match against their southern neighbors, but their performance improved throughout the tournament. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and excellent teamwork made them tough to beat and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Sepanjang tiga dekad yang terakhir, walaupun secara rasmi tetap menjadi negeri komunis, Cina telah membangunkan ekonomi pasaran. Pembaharuan ekonomi yang pertama telah dibuat di bawah pimpinan Deng Xiaoping. Sejak itu, saiz ekonomi negara China meningkat 90 kali ganda. Buat pertama kalinya, pada tahun lepas China telah mengeksport lebih banyak kereta dari Jerman dan melepasi Amerika Syarikat sebagai pasaran terbesar dalam industri itu. KDNK China berupaya mengatasi Amerika Syarikat dalam tempoh dua dekad.
mt: Over the last three decades, although officially still a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, the size of the Chinese economy has increased 90 times. For the first time last year, China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market in the industry. China's GDP is able to surpass the United States in two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: “Kami akan berusaha mengurangkan pengeluaran karbon dioksida per unit dari KDNK dengan margin yang ketara menjelang 2020 dari peringkat 2005,” kata Hu. Beliau tidak menetapkan nilai untuk potongan tersebut, sambil menyatakan bahawa ia akan dibuat berdasarkan pengeluaran ekonomi Cina. Hu menggalakkan negara-negara membangun “untuk mengelakkan jalan lama tercemar yang pertama dan membersihkan kemudian.” Dia menambah bahawa “mereka tidak harus sebaliknya diminta untuk memikul tanggungjawab yang melampaui tahap perkembangan, tanggungjawab dan kemampuan mereka.”
mt: “We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,” said Hu. He did not set a value for the cut, saying it would be made based on China’s economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries “to avoid the first dirty road and clean up later.” He added that “they should not be asked to bear responsibility that exceeds their level of development, responsibility and capacity.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Badan amal perubatan Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres dan Pertubuhan Kesihatan Sedunia menyatakan wabak itu adalah yang paling teruk di negara itu. Jurucakap untuk Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman berkata: “Angola sedang menuju ke arah wabak terburuk dan keadaannya kekal sangat teruk di Angola,” ujar beliau.
mt: The  medical charity Médecins Sans Frontières and the World Health Organization have said the outbreak is the worst in the country. A spokesman for Médecins Sans Frontière Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading towards the worst outbreak and its situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Pengarah Pendakwaan Awam, Keir Starmer QC, memberi keterangan pagi ini mengumumkan pendakwaan kedua-dua Huhne dan Pryce. Huhne telah meletak jawatan dan akan diganti di Kabinet dengan ADUN Ed Davey. ADUN Norman Lamb dijangka mengambil alih jawatan Menteri Perniagaan yang Davey mengosongkan. Huhne dan Pryce dijadualkan hadir ke Mahkamah Majistret Westminster pada 16 Februari.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, gave evidence this morning announcing charges against both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in the Cabinet by MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb is expected to take over the role of Business Secretary that Davey vacated. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Cerita tersebut yang dipersembahkan dalam opera Perancis oleh Camille Saint-Saens adalah mengenai seorang artis “yang hidupnya ditentukan oleh cinta untuk dadah dan Jepun”. Oleh itu, para pelakon menghisap ganja di atas pentas, dan pihak teater itu sendiri menggalakkan penonton untuk menyertainya.
mt: The story, presented in a French opera by Camille Saint-Saens, is about an artist “whose life is determined by love for drugs and Japan.” So, actors inhale marijuana on stage, and the theater itself encourages the audience to join them.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, juga dikenali sebagai “angkasawan No. 11”, merupakan sebahagian daripada pasukan asal Kesatuan Soviet terhadap angkasawan. Pada 18hb Mac 1965, beliau menjadi manusia pertama yang melakukan aktiviti di luar kapal angkasa (EVA), atau “perjalanan angkasa”, secara bersendirian di luar kapal angkasa selama lebih dua belas minit. Dia menerima “Pahlawan Kesatuan Soviet”, iaitu penghormatan tertinggi Kesatuan Soviet, untuk kerjanya. Sepuluh tahun kemudian, beliau memimpin bahagian Soviet dari misi Apollo-Soyuz yang melambangkan bahawa Lumbaan Angkasa telah selesai.
mt: Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was a part of the original Soviet team against cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he became the first man to perform an activity outside the spacecraft (EVA), or "spacewalk", alone outside the spacecraft for more than twelve minutes. He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the highest honor of the Soviet Union, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission that symbolized that the Space Race was over.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Selepas kemalangan berlaku, Gibson dibawa ke hospital tetapi meninggal dunia tidak lama kemudian. Pemandu lori tersebut yang berusia 64 tahun tidak cedera dalam kemalangan itu. Kenderaan itu dialihkan dari tempat kejadian kemalangan pada kira-kira jam 1200 GMT pada hari yang sama. Seorang pekerja di garaj berhampiran tempat kemalangan itu berkata: “Terdapat kanak-kanak yang menunggu untuk menyeberang jalan yang menjerit dan menangis.” Mereka semua berlari kembali di mana kemalangan itu telah berlaku.
mt: After the accident, Gibson was taken to the hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who was 64 years old, was not injured in the accident. The vehicle was diverted from the accident scene at around 1200 GMT on the same day. An employee at the nearby garage where the accident occurred said, "There were children waiting to cross the street who were screaming and crying. They all ran back to where the accident occurred."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Kerja yang dilakukan kebanyakannya secara teori, namun program tersebut ditulis untuk mensimulasi pemerhatian yang dibuat ke atas galaksi Sagittarius. Kesan yang dicari pasukan adalah disebabkan oleh daya pasang surut di antara jirim gelap galaksi dan jirim gelap Milky Way. Sama seperti bulan yang mengenakan daya tarikan pada bumi lalu menyebabkan pasang surut air, begitu juga Bima Sakti yang mengenakan daya ke atas galaksi Sagittarius. Para saintis dapat menyimpulkan bahawa jirim gelap menjejaskan jirim gelap yang lain dalam cara yang sama dengan jirim biasa. Teori ini mengatakan bahawa perkara gelap di seluruh galaksi yang terletak di sekitar galaksi dalam sejenis halo, dan diperbuat daripada banyak zarah kecil.
mt: The work is mostly theoretical, but the program simulates observations made on the Sagittarius galaxy. The effects sought by the team are caused by tidal forces between dark matter in the galaxy and dark matter in the Milky Way. Just as the moon exerts a pull on the Earth, causing tides, so too does the Milky Way exert a pull on the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists can conclude that dark matter affects normal matter in the same way as normal matter. This theory says that dark matter is found throughout the galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Debat telah dicetuskan oleh kontroversi mengenai perbelanjaan untuk bantuan dan pembinaan semula akibat Taufan Katrina; yang dilabel oleh konservatif kewangan secara seloroh sebagai “Bush's New Orleans Deal.” Kritikan bebas terhadap usaha pembinaan semula telah difokuskan kepada pemberian kontrak pembinaan semula untuk melihat orang dalam Washington.
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending for relief and rebuilding efforts following Hurricane Katrina; which was derided by fiscal conservatives as "Bush's New Orleans Deal." Criticism of the rebuilding efforts was focused on the awarding of rebuilding contracts to see who was in Washington.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Aapabiloa kapsul sampai ke Bumi dan memasuki atmosfera, pada lebih kurang 5pagi (waktu timur), ia dijangka akan membuat persembahan yang cukup ringan untuk orang ramai di Utara Carlifornia, Oregon, Nevada dan Utah. Kapsul itu akan nampak sangat serupa seperti tahi bintang merentasi langit. Kapsul berkenaan akan bergerak dengan anggaran kelajuan12.8 km atau 8 batu sesaat, cukup laju untuk bergerak daripada San Francisco ke Los Angeles dalam satu minit. Stardust bakal mencipta rekod masa baharu kerana menjadi kapal angkasa terpantas untuk kembali ke bumi, memecahkan rekod sebelumnya yang ditetapkan olehnya pada bulan Mei 1969 ketika modul perintah Apollo X telah kembali. “Ia akan merentasi pantai barat California utara dan akan menerangi langit dari California melalui pusat Oregon dan seterusnya merentasi Nevada dan Idaho dan ke dalam Utah,” kata Tom Duxbury, pengurus projek Stardust.
mt: If the capsule reaches Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5 a.m. (Pacific time), it is expected to make a fairly bright display for people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look very much like a shooting star across the sky. The capsule will move at an estimated speed of 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will set a new record for time, becoming the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the record previously set by it in May 1969 when the Apollo X command module returned. "It will cross the northern California coast and will light up the sky from California through the center of Oregon and then across Nevada and Idaho and into Utah," said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Seorang doktor yang bekerja di Hospital Kanak-kanak Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania akan didakwa untuk pembunuhan secara kejam selepas ibunya ditemui mati di dalam but keretanya pada hari Rabu, menurut pihak berkuasa di Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, ditemui di Blue Ash, Ohio, pinggir bandar kira-kira 15 batu ke utara Cincinnati berbaring di atas tanah di tepi jalan berbaju T-shirt dan seluar dalam dengan keadaan yang mempunyai banyak ubat. Dia mengarahkan pegawai ke kenderaannya, Oldsmobile Intrigue berwarna hitam yang terletak 500 kaki dari situ. Di sana, mereka menemui mayat Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, yang ditutup dengan selimut berlumuran darah. Polis mengatakan bahawa mayat itu telah berada di sana selama satu hari.
mt: A doctor who worked at the Pittsburgh Children's Hospital, Pennsylvania will be charged with murder after his mother was found dead in her car on Wednesday, according to authorities in Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground in a T-shirt and underwear with a condition that had many drugs. He directed officers to his car, a black Oldsmobile Intrigue that was located 500 feet from there. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with a blanket soaked in blood. Police say the body had been there for a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Ia merupakan pengambilalihan terbesar dalam sejarah eBay. Syarikat berharap untuk meluaskan sumber keuntungan dan meraih kemasyhuran dalam lapangan di mana Skype memegang kedudukan kuat, seperti di China, Eropah Timur, dan Brazil.
mt: It is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to expand its revenue sources and gain prominence in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Ketika pertempuran berhenti dan selepas yang cedera dihantar ke hospital, lebih kurang 40 daripada banduan yang tinggal berada di halaman dan enggan kembali ke sel-sel mereka. Perunding cuba untuk memperbaiki keadaan, namun tuntutan tahanan tidak jelas. Antara 10: 00-11: 00 pm MDT, api telah dimulakan oleh penghuni di kawasan itu. Tidak lama kemudian, pegawai penjara dilengkapi alat rusuhan memasuki perkarangan dan mengepung banduan menggunakan gas pemedih mata. Krew penyelamat kebakaran sebenarnya memadamkan api pada 11:35 pm.
mt: When the fighting stopped and after the wounded were taken to the hospital, about 40 of the prisoners remaining in the yard refused to return to their cells. Mediators tried to improve the situation, but the prisoners' demands were unclear. Between 10:00 and 11:00 pm MDT, the inmates started the fire in the area. Shortly thereafter, prison officials equipped riot gear entered the grounds and surrounded the prisoners with tear gas. The actual fire crew extinguished the fire at 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
