src: Selepas ia menjadi jelas bahawa banyak keluarga telah mendapatkan bantuan undang-undang untuk memerangi pengusiran, satu mesyuarat telah diadakan pada 20 Mac di Law Center East Bay Community untuk mangsa penipuan perumahan. Apabila semua penyewa telah mula berkongsi pengalaman tentang apa yang terjadi kepada mereka, kebanyakan keluarga yang terlibat menyedari bahawa Carolyn Wilson dari OHA telah mencuri wang jaminan mereka dan melarikan diri. Para penyewa di Lockwood Gardens percaya bahawa mungkin terdapat 40 keluarga atau lebih akan diusir, kerana mereka mendapat tahu bahawa polis OHA juga sedang menyiasat hartanah perumahan awam di Oakland yang mungkin terlibat dalam penipuan perumahan.
mt: After it became clear that many families had sought legal help to fight eviction, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for victims of housing fraud. When all the tenants had begun to share their experiences about what happened to them, most of the families involved realized that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had stolen their security deposits and fled. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be 40 families or more to be evicted, as they learned that OHA police are also investigating public housing properties in Oakland that may be involved in housing fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Selepas perlumbaan, Keselowski tetap mendahului Drivers' Championship dengan 2,250 mata. Tujuh mata di belakang, Johnson menduduki tempat kedua dengan mata 2,243. Dalam tempat ketiga, Hamlin ketinggalan dua puluh mata, tetapi lima lebih dari Bowyer. Kahne dan Truex, Jr. menduduki tempat kelima dan keenam masing-masing dengan 2,220 dan 2,207 mata. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, dan Harvick mengakhiri kedudukan sepuluh teratas Kejohanan Pemandu dengan baki empat perlumbaan musim ini.
mt: After the race, Keselowski remained atop the Drivers' Championship with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson sat in second with 2,243 points. In third, Hamlin trailed by 20 points, but five more than Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. finished fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick ended the top ten in the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Ini dipercayai menjadi kali kelima dalam sejarah di mana orang telah memerhati apa yang rupa-rupanya menjadi bahan yang disahkan secara kimia merupakan bahan dari planet Marikh yang jatuh ke Bumi. Kira-kira 24,000 meteorit diketahui telah turun ke Bumi, hanya sekitar 34 telah disahkan sebagai makhluk Marikh yang asal. Lima belas daripada batu ini adalah dikaitkan dengan pancuran meteorit pada Julai lepas. Sebilangan batu, yang amat jarang di Bumi, dijual daripada US$11,000 sehingga $22,500 se auns, iaitu lebih kurang sepuluh kali ganda daripada harga emas.
mt: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what appears to be a chemically verified Martian material falling to Earth. About 24,000 meteorites are known to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been confirmed as Martian originals. Fifteen of these rocks are associated with the meteor shower in July last. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are sold from $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher yang telah bersara pada tahun 2006 setelah memenangi kejuaraan Formula 1 sebanyak tujuh kali telah dijangka untuk menggantikan Felipe Massa yang tercedera. Pemandu dari Brazil itu mengalami kecederaan kepala serius selepas terlibat dalam kemalangan semasa Grand Prix Hungaria 2009. Massa dijangka tidak akan mengikuti musim 2009 yang selebihnya.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired after winning seven titles, was expected to replace Felipe Massa, who was injured. The Brazilian driver suffered serious head injuries after being involved in an accident during the Hungarian Grand Prix 2009. Massa is expected not to follow the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Sehingga kini, AOL telah berjaya menggerakkan dan membangunkan pasaran IM dengan rentaknya sendiri, disebabkan penggunaannya yang meluas di Amerika Syarikat. Dengan pengaturan yang ada, kebabasan ini mungkin berakhir. Gabungan jumlah pengguna perkhidmatan Yahoo! dan Microsoft dapat bersaing dengan jumlah pelanggan AOL.
mt: Until now, AOL has successfully driven and developed the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use in the United States. With the current setup, this freedom may end. The combined number of Yahoo! and Microsoft users can compete with AOL's subscribers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Sebuah bom kereta meletup di ibu pejabat polis di Gaziantep, Turki pagi semalam yang membunuh dua pegawai polis dan mencederakan lebih dari dua puluh mangsa yang lain. Pejabat gabenor berkata sembilan belas daripada yang tercedera adalah pegawai polis. Polis menyatakan bahawa mereka mengesyaki seorang yang disangka militan Daesh (ISIL) bertanggungjawab untuk serangan tersebut.
mt: A car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty other victims. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant was responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Bekas gabenor Massachusetts, Mitt Romney memenangi pilihan raya wakil utama presiden Parti Republik Florida pada hari Selasa dengan lebih 46 peratus daripada undian. Bekas Ketua Dewan A.S. Newt Gingrich menduduki tempat kedua dengan 32 peratus daripada undian. Sebagai negeri yang memberikan menyokong pihak pemenang sepenuhnya, Florida telah menganugerahkan kesemua lima puluh wakilnya kepada Romney, yang mengakibatkan beliau mendahului pencalonan Parti Republik.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party's presidential primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich took second place with 32 percent of the vote. As a state that awards all of its 50 delegates to the winner, Florida has given all of its delegates to Romney, who is now leading the Republican Party's nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Bekas Yang Dipertua Dewan Rakyat Newt Gingrich, gabenor Texas Rick Perry, dan Ahli Kongres Michele Bachmann selesai di tempat keempat, kelima dan keenam masing-masing. Selepas keputusan tiba, Gingrich memuji Santorum, tetapi mengkritik Romney disebabkan kempen pengiklanan negatifnya yang ditayangkan di Iowa menentang Gingrich. Perry menyatakan bahawa dia akan “kembali ke Texas untuk menilai hasil kokus malam ini, dan melihat jika saya mempunyai peluang dalam pertarungan ini”. Namun kemudian dia berkata dia akan kekal dalam pertarungan dan bersaing dalam pemilihan pendahuluan South Carolina pada 21 Januari. Bachmann, yang memenangi Pengundian Ames Straw pada bulan Ogos, mengambil keputusan untuk menamatkan kempen beliau.
mt: Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich praised Santorum, but criticized Romney for his negative advertising aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would “return to Texas to assess the results of this caucus tonight, and see if I have a chance in this race.” He later said he would stay in the race and compete in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Laman web stesen tersebut menggambarkan rancangan tersebut sebagai “teater radio bergaya lama dengan konsep baru dan luar biasa pintar!” Pada permulaannya, rancangan ini hanya disiarkan di laman radio internet yang sekian lama wujud, TogiNet Radio, satu laman yang memfokuskan pada radio bual. Pada lewat tahun 2015, TogiNet menubuhkan AstroNet Radio sebagai stesen subsidiari. Rancangan ini pada asalnya menampilkan pelakon suara amatur tempatan Texas Timur.
mt: The station's website describes the show as "old-fashioned radio theater with a new concept and smart!" At first, the show was only broadcast on the long-standing internet radio station TogiNet Radio, a site that focuses on talk radio. Late in 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured local amateur voice actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Penyerang Mumbai tiba melalui kapal pada 26 November 2008 dan membawa bersama bom tangan, senjata automatik dan menyerang beberapa sasaran termasuk stesen keretapi Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus yang sesak dan Hotel Taj Mahal yang terkenal. Pencarian dan pengumpulan maklumat oleh David Headley telah membantu untuk memungkinkan operasi oleh 10 orang bersenjata daripada kumpulan militan Pakistan Laskhar-e-Taiba. Serangan itu menegangkan hubungan antara India dan Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by ship and brought with them hand grenades, automatic weapons and attacked several targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Hotel Taj Mahal. The search and collection of information by David Headley has helped to enable operations by 10 armed militants from the Pakistan militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack strained relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Rekod pertemuan Nadal dan pemain Kanada ini ialah 7-2. Baru-baru ini beliau telah tewas kepada Raonic dalam kejohanan Brisbane Open. Nadal mendapat 88% mata bersih dalam perlawanan yang menang 76 mata dalam perkhidmatan pertama. Selepas perlawanan, King of Clay berkata, “Saya teruja kerana dapat kembali ke pusingan akhir untuk acara-acara yang paling penting. Saya berada di sini untuk cuba menang.”
mt: Nadal's record against this Canadian player is 7-2. Recently he lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal got 88% of the points in the match he won 76 in the first set. After the match, King of Clay said, "I'm excited to be back in the final for the most important events. I'm here to try to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Minggu lepas, Naked News mengumumkan yang ia akan meningkat mandat bahasa antarabangsanya secra mendadak kepada laporan berita, dengan tiga siaran terbaru. Sudah melaporkan dalam bahasa Inggeris dan Jepun, organisasi global melancarkan program bahasa Sepanyol, Itali, dan program Korea untuk televisyen, web, dan peranti mudah alih.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that it would suddenly increase its global mandate for news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization launched its Spanish, Italian, and Korean programs for television, web, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Selain acara pada hari Rabu, Carpanedo bertanding dalam dua perlumbaan individu di kejohanan itu. Yang pertama ialah Slalom, di mana beliau memperoleh Tidak Selesai untuk larian pertamanya. 36 daripada 116 pesaing mendapat keputusan yang sama dalam perlumbaan itu. Perlumbaannya yang lain, Giant Slalom, menunjukkan beliau berada di kedudukan kesepuluh dalam kategori wanita dengan gabungan masa larian 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minit lebih perlahan daripada pemenang tempat pertama Austrian Claudia Loesch dan 1:09.02 minit lebih perlahan daripada penamat tempat kesembilan, Gyöngyi Dani dari Hungary. Empat orang pemain ski dalam kumpulan duduk wanita telah gagal untuk menghabiskan perlumbaan mereka dan 45 daripada 117 jumlah pemain ski di Slalom Gergasi gagal untuk mendapat kedudukan di pertandingan itu.
mt: Besides the Wednesday events, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the championships. The first was Slalom, where she received a Did Not Finish for her first run. 36 of 116 competitors received the same result in the race. Her other race, Giant Slalom, showed her in tenth place in the women's category with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than the first-place Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth-place finisher, Gyöngyi Dani from Hungary. Four of the skiers in the women's group failed to finish their race and 45 of 117 total skiers failed to get a position in the competition.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Pada hari Rabu, Persatuan Bola Keranjang Kebangsaan Amerika Syarikat (NBA) telah menangguhkan musim bola keranjang profesional kerana kebimbangan berkenaan COVID-19. Keputusan NBA adalah berikutan pemain Utah Jazz yang diuji positif untuk virus COVID-19.
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) of the United States (US) has postponed its professional basketball season due to concerns over COVID-19. The NBA's decision comes after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Pemain Terbaik hari ini ialah Alex Ovechkin dari pasukan Washington Capital. Dia mendapat 2 gol dan 2 bantuan dalam kemenangan Washington 5-3 semasa menewas Atlanta Thrashers. Sepakan bantuan pertama Ovechkin adalah gol yang memenangi permainan oleh pemain baru Nicklas Backstrom; gol keduanya pada malam itu adalah yang ke-60 musim ini, menjadi pemain pertama menjaringkan 60 atau lebih gol dalam satu musim sejak 1995-1996, apabila Jaromir Jagr dan Mario Lemieux mencapai detik itu.
mt: Today's top scorer is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist was the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in one season since 1995-1996, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished that feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Bank Northern Rock telah dimiliknegarakan pada tahun 2008 berikutan pendedahan bahawa syarikat tersebut telah mendapat sokongan kecemasan dari Kerajaan UK. Rock Utara memerlukan sokongan kerana pendedahannya semasa krisis gadai janji subprima pada 2007. Tawaran yang dibuat untuk bank tersebut oleh Kumpulan Virgin Sir Richard Branson telah ditolak sebelum nasionalisasi bank itu. Dalam 2010, semasa dinasionalisasi, high street bank Rock Utara plc sediada telah dipisahkan daripada “bank buruk”, Rock Utara (Pengurusan Aset). Virgin hanya membeli 'bank yang baik' Rock Utara, bukan syarikat pengurusan aset.
mt: Bank Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 following its exposure that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Rock North needed support because of its exposure during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. The offer made for the bank by Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group was rejected before the nationalisation of the bank. In 2010, during the nationalisation, high street bank Rock North plc was separated from the "bad bank", Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the "good bank" Rock North, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

mt: Bank Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 following its exposure that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Rock North needed support because of its exposure during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. The offer made for the bank by Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group was rejected before the nationalisation of the bank. In 2010, during the nationalisation, high street bank Rock North plc was separated from the "bad bank", Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the "good bank" Rock North, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Keputusan En. Rudd untuk menandatangani persetujuan iklim Kyoto akan mengasingkan Amerika Syarikat, yang kini akan menjadi satu-satunya negara maju yang tidak meratifikasi perjanjian tersebut. Bekas kerajaan konservatif Australia menolak untuk menandatangani perjanjian Kyoto, dengan mengatakan ia akan menjejaskan ekonomi dengan kebergantungan tinggi terhadap eksport arang batu, sementara negara seperti India dan China tidak terikat dengan sasaran pelepasan gas rumah kaca.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement will isolate the United States, which is now the only major industrialised country not to have ratified the treaty. The former conservative Australian government refused to sign the Kyoto agreement, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries such as India and China are not bound by greenhouse gas emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Penembak dalam percubaan kawalan perosak tambahan perlu diawasi dengan ketat oleh pihak renjer, sementara percubaan tersebut dipantau dan dinilai dari segi keberkesanannya. Dalam kerjasama NPWS dan Persatuan Penembak Sukan dari Australia (NSW) Inc, sukarelawan yang berkelayakan direkrut, di bawah program pemburuan Persatuan Penembak Sukan. Menurut Mick O’Flynn, Pemangku Pengarah Park Conversation and Heritage dengan NPWS, empat penembak dipilih untuk operasi tembakan pertama menerima arahan latihan dan keselamatan yang komprehensif.
mt: Trappers in the additional pest control trial must be closely monitored by rangers, while the trial is monitored and evaluated in terms of its effectiveness. In collaboration with NPWS and the NSW Sporting Shooters Association Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS Park Conservation and Heritage Acting Director, four shooters were selected for the first shooting operation to receive comprehensive training and safety instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: “Berdasarkan pada fosil ini, itu bermakna pecahan ini adalah lebih awal daripada tindak balas dari penunjuk molekul. Ia bermakna kesemuanya harus dihentikan seketika, menurut Berhanne Asfaw, iaitu pengarang bersama bagi kajian ini serta turut bertugas di Rift Valley Research Service yang terletak di Ethiopia.
mt: “Based on this fossil, it means this piece is older than the molecular response. It means everything should be stopped immediately,” said Berhanne Asfaw, a co-author of the study and also working at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Pada majlis penyampaian ucapan dasar Khamis daripada Pertunjukkan Permainan Tokyo, Presiden Nintendo Satoru Iwata melancarkan reka bentuk pengawal untuk konsol Nintendo Revolusi baru syarikat. Menyerupai alat kawalan jauh televisyen, alat kawalan menggunakan dua sensor yang terletak dekat televisyen pengguna untuk triangulasi kedudukannya dalam ruang tiga dimensi. Ini akan membolehkan pemain mengawal aksi dan pergerakan dalam permainan video dengan menggerakkan peranti melalui udara.
mt: At the Thursday keynote address of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo President Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the new controller for the company's upcoming Nintendo Revolution console. Similar to a television remote control, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control in-game actions and movements by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Sebelum ini agensi berita Cina Xinhua melaporkan sebuah kapal terbang akan dirampas. Laporan kemudian menyatakan pesawat itu menerima ancaman bom dan ditukar kembali ke Afghanistan mendarat di Kandahar. Laporan awal mengatakan pesawat itu dialihkan kembali ke Afghanistan selepas menafikan mendarat kecemasan di Ürümqi.
mt: Previously, Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane would be seized. Later reports stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. Early reports stated the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after denying an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Pada hari Isnin, Sara Danius, setiausaha tetap kepada Jawatankuiasa Nobel untuk Sastera di Akademi Sweden, mengumumkan secara terbuka semasa rancangan radio di radio Sveriges di Sweden jawatankuasa, tidak dapat mengubungi Bob Dylan secara langsung berkaitan kemenangan Hadiah Nobel Sastera 2016, telah meninggalkan usaha untuk menhgubunginya. Danius berkata, “Sekarang kita sedang tidak membuat apa-apa. Saya telah memanggil dan menghantar e-mel kepada rakan-rakannya yang terdekat dan telah menerima maklum balas yang mesra. Untuk waktu ini, itu tentunya mencukupi.”
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary to the Swedish Academy, announced openly during a radio program on Swedish radio that the committee, unable to directly contact Bob Dylan regarding his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature win, had given up trying. Danius said, "Now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent e-mails to his closest friends and have received friendly responses. For now, that will have to suffice."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Presiden A.S. George W. Bush mengalu-alukan pengumuman itu dengan baik. Jurucakap Bush, Gordon Johndroe memanggil Korea Utara ikrar “Langkah utama bergerak untuk mencapai matlamat dapat nyah-penukleusan ditentusahkan di wilayah rakyat Korea.”
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the move “a significant step forward in achieving the goal of verifiably denuclearizing the Korean peninsula.”
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: Pada tahun 1956 Słania telah berpindah ke Sweden, lalu tiga tahun kemudiannya dia mula bekerja dengan Pejabat Pos Sweden dan menjadi ketua pengukir. Beliau menghasilkan lebih 1,000 stem untuk Sweden dan 28 negara lain. Hasil karya beliau mempunyai kualiti dan perincian yang sangat dikenali sehingga beliau merupakan seorang yang termasyhur antara ahli filatel. Ada beberapa yang menjadi pakar dalam mengumpulkan hasil karyanya sahaja. Setem ke-1,000nya adalah setem “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” yang mengagumkan oleh David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl pada tahun 2000, yang disenaraikan dalam Guinness Book of World Records. Beliau juga diupah untuk mengukir wang kertas untuk berbagai negara, contoh terbaru hasil kerjanya termasuk potret Perdana Menteri pada bahagian depan wang kertas Kanada $5 dan $100.
mt: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, three years later he began working with the Swedish Post Office and became chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work has quality and detail that is well known so that he is a well known among philatelists. There are some who are experts in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also commissioned to engrave banknotes for various countries, the latest of his work includes the portrait of the Prime Minister on the front of Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 batu dari Sistem Saluran Paip Trans-Alaska ditutup setelah terjadi tumpahan beribu-ribu tong minyak mentah di selatan Fairbanks, Alaska. Bekalan kuasa yang putus berikutan ujian sistem kawalan kebakaran yang rutin mengakibatkan injap pelepasan terbuka dan minyak mentah melimpah berhampiran stesen pam 9 Fort Greely. Bukaan injap membenarkan pembebasan tekanan untuk sistem dan minyak mengalir pada pelapik ke tangki yang boleh menampung 55,000 tong (2.3 juta gelen). Setakat Rabu tengahari, lubang udara tangki tersebut masih bocor paling mungkin disebabkan oleh pengembangan haba di dalam tangki. Satu lagi kawasan penyimpanan sekunder di bawah tangki-tangki tersebut yang mampu menampung 104,500 tong belum diisi sampai penuh.
mt: 800 miles from the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System was closed after a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. Power outages resulting from routine fire control system tests caused the release valve to open and crude oil overflowed near pump station 9 Fort Greely. The valve opening allowed pressure relief for the system and oil flowed onto the deck to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday morning, the tank's vent was still leaking most likely due to heat expansion inside the tank. Another secondary storage area under the tanks that can hold 104,500 barrels was not filled to capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Syarikat Jurutera A.S. menganggarkan bahawa 6 inci daripada hujan boleh melanggar benteng yang sebelumnya rosak. Kawasan perumahan Ninth Ward yang mengalami banjir setinggi 20 kaki semasa Taufan Katrina kini berada pada paras pinggang ketika tanggul yang berdekatan telah melebihi batas. Air melimpah ke tetambak seluas 100 kaki.
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to breach the levee that was previously damaged. The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now at chest level when the nearby levee has exceeded its limits. Water is flowing into the 100-foot wide floodway.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton mengesahkan bahawa pesakit yang dimasukkan ke Universiti Hospital Howard berada dalam keadaan stabil. Pesakit telah ke Nigeria, di mana beberapa kes virus Ebola telah berlaku. Hospital telah mengikuti protokol untuk mengawal jangkitan, termasuk memisahkan pesakit lain untuk mencegah kemungkinan jangkitan dari orang lain.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the patient admitted to Howard University Hospital is in stable condition. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where several cases of Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocols to control infection, including isolating other patients to prevent possible infection from others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Komet mungkin sumber penghantaran air ke bumi beserta bahan organik yang dapat membentuk protein dan menyokong kehidupan. Saintis berharap untuk memahami bagaimana planet terbentuk, terutamanya bagaimana Bumi terbentuk, sejak komet bertembung dengan Bumi suatu ketika dahulu.
mt: Comets may be the source of water delivery to Earth along with organic material that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how Earth formed, since comets collided with Earth at some point in the past.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Sementara pihak berkuasa tidak pasti berkenaan kredibiliti ancaman, pihak berkuasa Pangangkutan Maryland membuat penutupan dengan desakan FBI. Lori sampah digunakan untuk menghadang pintu masuk tiub dan seramai 80 orang polis membantu mengarah pemandu kenderaan ke lencongan. Tiada kelewatan lalu lintas yang teruk dilaporkan pada beltway, laluan alternatif di bandar ini.
mt: While authorities are not sure about the credibility of the threat, Maryland Transportation Authority made the closure with FBI pressure. Garbage trucks were used to block the entrance of the tunnel and about 80 police officers helped to direct drivers to detours. No major traffic delays were reported on the beltway, alternate routes in this city.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Jurugambar itu dibawa ke Pusat Perubatan Ronald Reagan UCLA, di mana beliau meninggal dunia. Dia dilaporkan berusia sekitar 20 tahun. Dalam sebuah kenyataan, Bieber menyatakan “walaupun saya tidak hadir atau terlibat secara langsung dengan kemalangan tragis ini, saya memikirkan dan mendoakan keluarga mangsa.” Laman web berita hiburan TMZ dimaklumkan bahawa jurugambar tersebut menghentikan kenderaannya di seberang Sepulveda Boulevard dan cuba mengambil gambar sekatan polis sebelum melintas jalan dan bersambung, menyebabkan pegawai polis California Highway Patrol yang melakukan penghentian trafik mengarahkannya kembali ke seberang jalan, sebanyak dua kali. Menurut polis, pemandu kenderaan berkenaan yang mel;anggar jurugambar tidak mungkin akan menghadapi tuduhan jenayah.
mt: The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he died. He was reported to be around 20 years old. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I was not present nor directly involved with the tragic accident that took place in L.A. today, my heartfelt prayers go out to the victim, family and friends affected by this situation." TMZ reported that the photographer stopped his car on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to take pictures of the police barricade before crossing the street and continuing, causing California Highway Patrol officers to direct him back across the street twice. According to police, the driver of the car that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Jurugambar itu dibawa ke Pusat Perubatan Ronald Reagan UCLA, di mana beliau meninggal dunia. Dia dilaporkan berusia sekitar 20 tahun. Dalam sebuah kenyataan, Bieber menyatakan “walaupun saya tidak hadir atau terlibat secara langsung dengan kemalangan tragis ini, saya memikirkan dan mendoakan keluarga mangsa.” Laman web berita hiburan TMZ dimaklumkan bahawa jurugambar tersebut menghentikan kenderaannya di seberang Sepulveda Boulevard dan cuba mengambil gambar sekatan polis sebelum melintas jalan dan bersambung, menyebabkan pegawai polis California Highway Patrol yang melakukan penghentian trafik mengarahkannya kembali ke seberang jalan, sebanyak dua kali. Menurut polis, pemandu kenderaan berkenaan yang mel;anggar jurugambar tidak mungkin akan menghadapi tuduhan jenayah.

src: Arias diuji positif untuk kes virus yang ringan, kata Menteri Presiden Rodrigo Arias. Keadaan presiden adalah stabil, walaupun beliau akan di asingkan di rumah untuk beberapa hari. “Selain mengalami demam dan sakit tekak, saya rasa sihat dan dalam keadaan baik untuk menjalankan tugas saya dengan bekerja dari jarak jauh. Saya jangka untuk kembali berkhidmat pada hari Isnin,” kata Arias dalam sebuah kenyataan.
mt: Arias tested positive for a mild virus, said President Minister Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, although he will be isolated at home for several days. "In addition to experiencing fever and sore throat, I feel healthy and in good condition to carry out my duties by working from a distance. I expect to return to service on Monday," said Arias in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Dalam puncak Siklon Tropika Gonu, yang mendapat nama daripada sebeg daun palma dalam Bahasa Maldives, telah mencapai angin berterusan selaju 240 kilometer sejam (149 batu sejam) . Menjelang awal hari ini, angin sekitar 83 km sejam, dan dijangka terus melemah.
mt: At the peak of Tropical Storm Gonu, named after a type of palm tree in the Maldives language, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). By early today, winds around 83 km per hour, and is expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Pasang surut merah disebabkan konsentrasi Karenia brevis yang lebih tinggi daripada normal, iaitu sebuah organisma bersel tunggal yang terjadi secara semulajadi. Faktor semula jadi dapat bergabung untuk menghasilkan keadaan sesuai, lalu membenarkan alga ini untuk bertambah dengan mendadak. Alga akan menghasilkan neurotoksin yang merosakkan saraf manusia dan ikan. Ikan sering mati disebabkan kepekatan toksin dalam air yang tinggi. Manusia boleh terkesan dengan air yang tercemar yang dibawa ke udara oleh angin dan ombak.
mt: Red tides are caused by higher than normal concentrations of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled organism. Natural factors can combine to produce conditions suitable for this alga to suddenly increase in numbers. The alga produces neurotoxins that damage human and fish nerves. Fish often die due to high concentrations of toxins in the water. Humans can be affected by contaminated water blown by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, yang merupakan Ribut Kategori 4 pada Skala Saffir-Simpson Hurricane, melemah menjadi taufan tropika sebelum menghilang Selasa. Sisanya menghasilkan hujan di sebahagian besar pulau, walaupun belum ada kerosakan atau banjir yang dilaporkan. Kerpasan tersebut yang mencapai 6.34 inci di sebuah tolok di Oahu, digambarkan sebagai “bermanfaaat”. Beberapa ketika dari hujan tersebut diiringi guruh dan petir yang kerap.
mt: Felicia, which was a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical storm before dissipating on Tuesday. The rest of the storm produced rain across much of the island, although no damage or flooding was reported. The rainfall totaled 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial". Some of the rain was accompanied by frequent thunder and lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. terhempas di Grand Prix Singapura 2008 betul-betul selepas perhentian pit awal untuk Fernando Alonso, membawa keluar kereta keselamatan. Ketika kereta di hadapan Alonso berhenti untuk mengisi minyak di bawah kereta keselamatan, dia mengejar pelumba lain untuk meraih kejayaan. Piquet Jr. dipecat selepas Grand Prix Hungaria 2009.
mt: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after the early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. When Alonso's car stopped to refuel under the safety car, he chased other drivers for the win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Satu kajian yang diterbitkan pada hari Khamis dalam jurnal Sains melaporkan mengenai pembentukan spesies burung baharu di Kepulauan Galápagos Ecuador. Penyelidik dari Princeton University di Amerika Syarikat dan Uppsala University di Sweden melaporkan spesies baharu itu telah berevolusi selepas hanya dua generasi, walaupun proses ini dipercayai mengambil masa yang lebih lama, kerana pembiakan antara seekor burung finch endemik di Darwin, fortes Geospiza, dan burung finch kaktus imigran, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reports on the formation of a new bird species in the Galápagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden report the new species evolved after only two generations, although the process is believed to have taken longer, as hybridization between the endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Acara artistik itu adalah sebahagian daripada kempen oleh Dewan Bandaraya Bucharest yang bertujuan untuk melancarkan semula imej ibu negara Romania sebagai metropolis yang kreatif dan berwarna-warni. Bandar tersebut akan menjadi yang pertama di Eropah Tenggara untuk menjadi tuan rumah bagi CowParade, acara seni awam yang terbesar di dunia, antara bulan Jun dan Ogos tahun ini.
mt: The artistic event is part of a campaign by Bucharest City Hall to relaunch the image of Romania's capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first in Southeast Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Pesawat itu menuju ke Irkutsk dan dikendalikan oleh kumpulan dalaman. Satu siasatan telah dimulakan untuk menyiasat. Il-76 telah merupakan komponen utama tentera Rusia dan Soviet sejak tahun 1970an dan telah pun terlibat dalam kemalangan serius di Rusia bulan lepas. Pada 7 Oktober sebuah enjin terpisah semasa berlepas, tanpa mengakibatkan sebarang kecederaan. Rusia menamatkan penggunaan Il-76 buat sementara selepas kemalangan itu.
mt: The aircraft was heading to Irkutsk and was operated by the domestic group. An investigation has been launched to investigate. The Il-76 has been a main component of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s and has already been involved in serious accidents in Russia last month. On October 7, a separate engine separated during takeoff, without causing any injuries. Russia has temporarily discontinued the use of Il-76 after the accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Sebelum Simpsons Simon bekerja di beberapa pertunjukan dalam pelbagai posisi. Selama tahun 1980 an dia mengusahakan persembahan seperti Pertunjukkan Teksi, Cheers, dan The Tracey Ullman. Dalam 1989 beliau membantu untuk mencipta The Simpsons bersama Brooks dan Groening, dan beliau bertanggungjawab untuk mengupah penulis pertunjukan yang pertama. Walaupun beliau meninggalkan rancangan itu pada tahun 1993, namun beliau masih kekal sebagai penerbit eksekutif dan terus menerima berpuluh juta dolar royalti setiap musim.
mt: Before Simpsons Simon worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he produced shows like Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and he was responsible for hiring the first writing staff. Although he left the show in 1993, he still remains as executive producer and continues to receive tens of millions of dollars in royalties each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke menulis tentang beberapa usaha oleh sesetengah pihak yang menghalang wanita daripada membicarakan tentang kesihatan wanita namun tidak berjaya. Beliau membuat kesimpulan tersebut disebabkan banyak komen positif dan galakan yang diberikan oleh individu lelaki dan perempuan yang mengatakan bahawa ubat kontrasepsi harus dipertimbangkan sebagai keperluan perubatan.
mt: Fluke writes about some efforts by some parties to prevent women from talking about women's health but failed. She concludes this because of many positive comments and encouragement given by men and women who say that contraceptive drugs should be considered as medical needs.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: “Ia akan berkelakuan seperti air. Ia telus seperti air. Jika anda berdiri di garisan pantai, anda akan dapat melihat ke dalam sehingga ke apa-apa batu kerikil atau bahan melekit di bawah. Sejauh yang kita ketahui, hanya terdapat satu badan planet yang mempamerkan dinamisme yang lebih dari Titan, dan namanya adalah Bumi,” ujar Stofan.
mt: “It will behave like water. It is transparent like water. If you stand at the shoreline, you will be able to see into it until you hit any pebbles or muddy material on the bottom. As far as we know, only one planetary body exhibits dynamics more than Titan, and its name is Earth,” Stofan said.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Hal ini bukan sahaja mengesahkan bahawa dinosaur tertentu mempunyai bulu, satu teori yang sudah tersebar luas, tetapi menyediakan butir-butir khusus yang secara amnya tidak dapat diberi oleh fosil, misalnya warna dan penyusunan tiga dimensi. . Para saintis mengatakan bahawa bulu haiwan ini berwarna coklat perang di bahagian atas dengan bahagian bawah adalah pucat atau berwarna karotenoid. Kajian juga memberi wawasan tentang evolusi bulu pelepah pada burung. Oleh sebab bulu dinosaur tidak mempunyai batang yang tumbuh dengan baik, yang dipanggil rakis, tetapi mempunyai ciri-ciri bulu lain - duri dan barbul - penyelidik menyimpulkan bahawa rakis berkemungkinan satu perkembangan evolusi ciri-ciri lain ini yang datang kemudian. Struktur bulu mencadangkan bahawa ia tidak digunakan untuk tujuan terbang tetapi lebih kepada pengawalan suhu atau untuk dipamerkan. Para penyelidik mencadangkan, walaupun ekor itu ekor dinosaur berusia muda, sample menunjukkan bulu adalah milik dewasa dan bukan yang muda. Para penyelidik mencadangkan, walaupun itu ekor dinosaur yang muda, sampel berkenaan menunjukkan bulu dewasa dan bukan bulu halus anak ayam.
mt: This not only confirms that certain dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has been widely spread, but provides specific details that generally cannot be given by fossils, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.. Scientists say the feathers of this animal were reddish-brown on top with the underside being pale or carotenoid-colored. The study also provides insight into the evolution of the feathered tail in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but had other feather characteristics - barbs and barbules - researchers concluded that the rachis may be a later evolutionary development of these other features. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggest, although the tail is a young dinosaur, the sample shows feathers of an adult and not a young one. src: Hal ini bukan sahaja mengesahkan bahawa dinosaur tertentu mempunyai bulu, satu teori yang sudah tersebar luas, tetapi menyediakan butir-butir khusus yang secara amnya tidak dapat diberi oleh fosil, misalnya warna dan penyusunan tiga dimensi. . Para saintis mengatakan bahawa bulu haiwan ini berwarna coklat perang di bahagian atas dengan bahagian bawah adalah pucat atau berwarna karotenoid. Kajian juga memberi wawasan tentang evolusi bulu pelepah pada burung. Oleh sebab bulu dinosaur tidak mempunyai batang yang tumbuh dengan baik, yang dipanggil rakis, tetapi mempunyai ciri-ciri bulu lain - duri dan barbul - penyelidik menyimpulkan bahawa rakis berkemungkinan satu perkembangan evolusi ciri-ciri lain ini yang datang kemudian. Struktur bulu mencadangkan bahawa ia tidak digunakan untuk tujuan terbang tetapi lebih kepada pengawalan suhu atau untuk dipamerkan. Para penyelidik mencadangkan, walaupun ekor itu ekor dinosaur berusia muda, sample menunjukkan bulu adalah milik dewasa dan bukan yang muda. src: Walaupun satu vaksin eksperimen menunjukkan keupayaan mengurangkan kadar kematian Ebola, namun sehingga kini, tiada ubat yang jelas terbukti sesuai untuk merawat jangkitan sedia ada. Satu campuran antibodi iaitu ZMapp, pada awalnya menunjukkan peluang kejayaan tinggi dalam bidang itu, namun kajian formal menunjukkan bahawa ia kurang bermanfaat daripada yang dijangka dalam mencegah kematian. Semasa percubaan PALM, ZMapp berfungsi sebagai rawatan kawalan yang bermaksud ahli sains menggunakannya sebagai garis dasar dan membandingkan tiga rawatan lain dengannya.
mt: Although one experimental vaccine shows ability to reduce Ebola death rates, no clear treatment has yet been proven effective for treating existing infections. A monoclonal antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed great promise in this field, but formal studies showed it was less effective than expected in preventing death. During the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control treatment, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared three other treatments with it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Pada hari Isnin, Saintis daripada Sekolah Perubatan Universiti Stamford mengumumkan penemuan alat diagnostik baru yang boleh mengasingkan sel-sel mengikut jenis: cip kecil yang boleh dicetak yang boleh dihasilakn menggunakan pencetak standard inkjet untuk kira-kira satu sen A.S setiap satu. Penyelidik utama mengatakan bahawa ia mungkin menghasilkan pengesanan awal kanser, tuberkulosis, HIV dan malaria kepada pesakit di negara-negara berpendapatan rendah, di mana kadar kemandirian untuk penyakit seperti kanser payu dara ialah separuh daripada di negara-negara yang lebih kaya.
mt: On Monday, scientists from the University of Stamford Medical School announced a new diagnostic tool that can separate cells by type: small chips that can be printed using standard inkjet printers for about a penny U.S. each. The lead researcher said it might make early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the rate of independence for diseases such as breast cancer is half that of richer countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Para saintis telah menemui bentuk muka bumi yang berselarak pada permukaan bulan yang dipanggil tubir lobat yang disebabkan oleh bulan yang mengecut dengan amat perlahan. Serpihan ini telah ditemui di serata permukaan bulan dan masih kurang terjejas oleh faktor persekitaran, yakni secara geologinya menunjukkan bahan tersebut adalah baharu terbentuk. Teori ini bercanggah dengan dakwaan bahawa bulan adalah sepenuhnya tanpa aktiviti geologi.
mt: Scientists have found a form of surface terrain called lunar swirls caused by the moon slowly shrinking. These fragments have been found all over the moon and are still relatively unaffected by environmental factors, meaning geologically they are showing new formation. This theory contradicts claims that the moon is completely without geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya sudah berada dalam Edinburgh Sheriff Court atas dakwaan membunuh anaknya. Dia berada dalam tahanan sementara menunggu dakwaan dan perbicaraan, tetapi sebarang bukti saksi mungkin tercemar kerana gambarnya telah disiarkan secara umum. Ini ialah amalan biasa di tempat lain di UK tetapi fungsi keadilan di Scotland adalah berbeza dan mahkamah menganggap penerbitan foto boleh menyebabkan prasangka. Professor Pamela Ferguson dari Universiti Dundee menyatakan “wartawan diibaratkan berjalan di laluan berbahaya sekiranya menerbitkan foto dan sebagainya kepunyaan suspek.” Pejabat Mahkota, yang bertanggungjawab ke atas keseluruhan pendakwaan, telah menunjukkan kepada wartawan yang tiada komen selanjutnya yang akan dibuat sekuarng-kurangnya sehingga dakwaan.
mt: Adekoya has been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court on charges of killing his son. He is in custody awaiting charges and trial, but any witness evidence may be tainted because his picture has been published widely. This is a common practice elsewhere in the UK but the function of justice in Scotland is different and the court considers publishing a photo can cause prejudice. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee stated "journalists are walking on a minefield if they publish photos and so forth belonging to the suspect." The Crown Office, which is responsible for the entire prosecution, has shown to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until charges.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Selain daripada ais yang tebal, keadaan cuaca ekstrim juga telah menggangu usaha menyelamat. Pittman mengesyorkan keadaan tidak akan bertambah baik sehingga minggu depan. Jumlah dan ketebalan ais yang dibungkus, menurut Pittman, adalah yang paling teruk untuk pengedap dalam 15 tahun kebelakangan ini.
mt: Besides thick ice, extreme weather conditions have also hampered rescue efforts. Pittman recommends that conditions will not improve until next week. The amount and thickness of ice wrapped, according to Pittman, is the worst in 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts menolak bulat-bulat untuk memberi pendapatnya tentang bila kehidupan bermula, satu persoalan yang penting apabila mempertimbangkan etika pengguguran, dengan mengatakan bahawa tidak beretika untuk mengulas mengenai kes-kes yang mungkin berlaku. Dia bagaimanapun menegaskan kenyataan beliau sebelum itu yang Roe v. Wade adalah “penyelesaian undang-undang tanah”,menekankan kepentingan keputusan Mahkamah Tertinggi yang konsisten. Beliau juga mengesahkan bahawa beliau percaya akan hak tersirat untuk privasi, di mana keputusan Roe bergantung.
mt: Roberts rejected outright to give his opinion on when life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it is unethical to opine on cases that may occur. He however reaffirmed his previous statement that Roe v. Wade was a "landmark decision", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court decisions. He also confirmed that he believes in the right to privacy, where the Roe decision depended.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Tepat pada pukul 8:46 pagi, bandar tersebut hening dengan tiba-tiba, menandakan masa sebenar jet pertama mengenai sasarannya. Dua pancaran lampu telah dipasang untuk menunjuk ke langit semalam. Pembinaan sedang berjalan untuk lima pencakar langit baharu di tapak tersebut, dengan pusat pengangkutan dan taman peringatan di bahagian tengah.
mt: 8:46 a.m. precisely, the city fell silent suddenly, marking the exact time of the first jet's impact. Two spotlights were set up to point to the sky. Construction is underway for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation hub and memorial park in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Semua pintu masuk gua, yang mana dinamakan “The Seven Sisters”, adalah sekurang-kurangnya 100 ke 250 meter (328 ke 820 kaki) dalam garis pusat. Imej inframerah menunjukkan perubahan suhu dari malam ke siang menunjukkan ia berkemungkinan besar ialah gua-gua. “Mereka adalah lebih sejuk daripada permukaan pada waktu siang dan lebih panas pada waktu malam. Tindakan termalnya tidak sestabil gua besar di Bumi yang sering mengekalkan suhu yang agak tetap, tetapi ia konsisten dengan lubang tersebut yang agak dalam di tanah,” kata Glen Cushing dari Pasukan Astrogeologi Tinjauan Geologi Amerika Syarikat (USGS) dan Nothern Arizona University yang terletak di Flagstaff, Arizona.
mt: All of the cave's entrances, which are named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show temperature changes from night to day indicating it is likely a cave. "They are cooler than the surface during the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as stable as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with the holes being fairly deep in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Science Center and Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Lelaki tersebut dikatakan telah memandu sebuah kenderaan beroda tiga yang bersenjata bahan letupan ke dalam khalayak ramai. Lelaki yang disyaki meletupkan bom telah ditahan, setelah mengalami kecederaan akibat letupan tersebut. Namanya masih tidak diketahui oleh pihak berkuasa, walaupun mereka tahu bahawa dia berasal daripada kumpulan etnik Uighur.
mt: A man was reported to have driven a three-wheeled vehicle loaded with explosives into a crowd. The suspected bomber was detained, after suffering injuries from the explosion. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they know he is of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Afrika Selatan telah menewaskan All Blacks (New Zealand) dalam perlawanan Tri Nations kesatuan ragbi di Stadium Royal Bafokeng di Rustenburg, Afrika Selatan. Skor akhir adalah kemenangan dengan satu mata, 21:20, yang mengakhiri 15 kemenangan berturut-turut All Blacks. Untuk Springboks, ia mengakhiri kekalahan lima perlawanan berturut-turut. Ia merupakan perlawanan terakhir untuk All Blacks, yang telah memenangi piala tersebut dua minggu yang lalu. Perlawanan akhir siri ini akan berlangsung di Taman Ellis di Johannesburg minggu depan, apabila Springboks berlawan Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a Tri Nations rugby union match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21:20, ending the All Blacks' 15-game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-game losing streak. It was the last match for the All Blacks, who won the cup two weeks ago. The final match of the series will be held at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

Perlawanan akhir siri ini akan berlangsung di Taman Ellis di Johannesburg minggu depan, apabila Springboks berlawan Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a Tri Nations rugby union match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21:20, ending the All Blacks' 15-game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-game losing streak. It was the last match for the All Blacks, who won the cup two weeks ago. The final match of the series will be held at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stesen tersebut kekal dengan pendiriannya, walaupun kehilangan giroskop sebelum ini dalam misi stesen angkasa lepas, hingga hujung jalan angkasa. Chiao dan Sharipov dilaporkan menjadi jarak yang selamat daripada pendorong penyesuaian sikap. Kawalan darat Rusia mengaktifkan jet dan mengembalikan kedudukan normal stesen.
mt: The station remained in its original orientation, although it had lost its gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov were reported to be safely away from the thruster adjustment. Russian ground control activated the jets and returned the station to its normal orientation.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Kes itu telah didakwa di Virginia kerana ia merupakan tempat asal bagi penyedia perkhidmatan internet terkemuka AOL, syarikat yang memulakan tuduhan tersebut. Ini ialah kali pertama sabitan telah diperolehi menggunakan perundangan yang digubal pada tahun 2003 untuk mengekang e-mel pukal, juga dikenali sebagai spam, daripada pengedaran yang tidak diminta ke peti mel pengguna-pengguna.
mt: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it was the home of the leading Internet service provider AOL, the company that brought the suit. This is the first conviction obtained using legislation enacted in 2003 to curb unsolicited bulk e-mail, also known as spam, from being sent to users' inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Vidal yang berusia 28 tahun telah menyertai pasukan Barça tiga musim yang lalu, dari Sevilla. Sejak berpindah ke ibu negeri Catalan, Vidal telah bermain 49 perlawanan untuk kelab itu.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Jarque telah menjalankan latihan pra-musim di Coverciano di Itali pada awal hari. Beliau telah menginap di hotel pasukan sebelum perlawanan yang dirancang untuk hari Ahad menentang Bolonia. Beliau tinggal di hotel pasukan sebelum perlawanan yang dirancang untuk Hari Ahad menentang Bolonia.
mt: Jarque has been training at Coverciano in Italy at the start of the day. He has been staying at the team hotel before the scheduled match against Bologna. He has been staying at the team hotel before the scheduled match against Bologna.

src: Tiada amaran tsunami telah dikeluarkan dan menurut agensi geofizik Jakarta, tiada amaran tsunami akan dikeluarkan kerana gempa bumi tidak memenuhi syarat magnitud 6.5. Meskipun tidak ada ancaman tsunami, para penghuni telah mula panik dan mula meninggalkan perniagaan dan kediaman mereka.
mt: No tsunami warning has been issued and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued as the earthquake did not meet the criteria of magnitude 6.5. Although there is no tsunami threat, residents have begun to panic and started leaving their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Mereka mendapati bahawa Matahari beroperasi menggunakan prinsip dasar yang sama dengan bintang lain. Aktiviti semua bintang di sistem didapati terpengaruh dengan kilauan, putaran dan tiada yang lain. Kilauan dan putaran digunakan bersama untuk menentukan nombor Rossby sebuah bintang, yang berkaitan dengan aliran plasma. Semakin kecil nombor Rossby, semakin kurang aktif bintang dari segi pembalikan magnetik.
mt: They found that the Sun operates using the same basic principles as other stars. The activity of all stars in the system was found to be affected by the radiation, rotation and nothing else. Radiation and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active a star is in terms of magnetic reversal.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
