src: Dari 1,400 orang yang diundi sebelum pilihan raya persekutuan 2010, mereka yang menentang Australia menjadi republik meningkat sebanyak 8 peratus sejak 2008. Pemangku Perdana Menteri Julia Gillard mendakwa sewaktu kempen pilihan raya 2010 bahawa beliau percaya Australia harus menjadi republik pada akhir pemerintahan Ratu Elizabeth II. 34 peratus daripada mereka dalam tinjauan ini berpendapat, inginkan Ratu Elizabeth II menjadi raja terakhir Australia. Pada ekstrim pungutan pendapat umum, 29 peratus daripada yang ditinjau percaya bahawa Australia harus menjadi sebuah republik secepat mungkin manakala 31 peratus percaya bahawa Australia tidak patut menjadi sebuah republik.
mt: 1,400 people were polled before the 2010 federal election, those who opposed Australia becoming a republic increased by 8 percent since 2008. Acting Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the 2010 election campaign that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent of those polled believe, want Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last king. In the extreme public opinion poll, 29 percent of those polled believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believe Australia should not become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, jjurucakap untuk Yayasan Komen, mengatakan bahawa organisasi tersebut mengamalkan peraturan baru yang tidak membenarkan geran atau pembiayaan untuk dianugerahkan kepada organisasi yang sedang berada di bawah siasatan undang-undang. Dasar Komen yang membatalkan Keibubapaan Terancang disebabkan oleh siasatan yang belum selesai mengenai bagaimana Keibubapaan Terancang membelanjakan dan melaporkan wangnya yang dijalankan oleh Wakil Cliff Stearns. Steam sedang menyiasat samada cukai digunakan untuk membiayai pengguguran melalui “Planned Parenthood” dalam peranannya sebagai pengerusi Jawatankuasa kecil Pengawasan dan Penyiasatan, yang di bawah naungan Jawatankuasa Rumah Tenaga dan Perdagangan.
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for Komen, said the organization is implementing a new policy that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's decision to end its relationship with Planned Parenthood was due to the ongoing investigation into how Planned Parenthood spent and reported its money, which was being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether tax dollars were used to fund abortions through "Planned Parenthood" in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations subcommittee, which is under the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Polis Madhya Pradesh menjumpai semula komputer riba dan telefon bimbit yang dicuri. Timbalan Ketua Polis Negara D K Arya berkata, “Kami telah menahan lima individu yang telah merogol wanita Switzerland itu dan mendapatkan semula telefon bimbit dan komputer ribanya”. Tertuduh bernama sebagai Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar dan Vishnu Kanjar. Penguasa polis Chandra Shekhar Solanki berkata tertuduh itu muncul dalam mahkamah dengan muka bertutup.
mt: Madhya Pradesh police recovered a laptop and mobile phone that was stolen. Deputy Chief of State D K Arya said, "We have arrested five individuals who have raped a Swiss woman and recovered her mobile phone and laptop." The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police chief Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee PC, sebelumnya melancarkan penjimatan kos seluruh dunia dan faktor-faktor fungsi, menjadi topik hangat dalam 2007 Bulan Tapei IT Tetapi pasaran pengguna komputer riba akan bervariasi dan berubah secara radikal selepas ASUS dianugerahkan dalam Anugerah Lestari Taiwan 2007 oleh Eksekutif Yuan dari Republik China.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, previously launched cost-saving and function factors, became a hot topic in the 2007 Taipei IT Month, but the laptop market will vary and change radically after ASUS was awarded the Taiwan Green Award 2007 by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Isu ini bermula pada 1 Januari apabila berpuluh-puluh penghuni tempatan mengadu kepada Pejabat Pos Obanazawa bahawa mereka belum menerima kad Tahun Baru biasa dan tradisional mereka. Semalam, pejabat pos mengeluarkan permohonan maaf mereka kepada orang awam dan media selepas mendapati bahawa budak lelaki itu menyembunyikan lebih daripada 600 dokumen pos, termasuk 429 poskad tahun baru, yang bukan dihantar kepada penerima yang dimaksudkan.
mt: The issue began on January 1 when dozens of local residents complained to the Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their usual and traditional New Year's cards. Yesterday, the post office issued an apology to the public and media after finding that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, that were not sent to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray kalah pada set pertama dalam perlawanan pemutus seri selepas kedua-dua pemain masing-masing mengekalkan setiap servis dalam set. Del Potro mempunyai kelebihan pada set kedua, tetapi ini juga memerlukan putaran seri selepas mencapai 6-6. Potro menerima rawatan pada bahunya pada saat ini tetapi berjaya kembali semula ke permainan.
mt: Murray lost the first set in the tiebreaker after both players maintained each other's serve in the set. Del Potro had the advantage in the second set, but this also required a tiebreaker after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment on his shoulder at this point but was able to return to the game.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: Didampingi pegawai-pegawai tersebut, beliau meyakinkan penduduk Texas bahawa tindakan sedang diambil untuk melindungi keselamatan orang awam. Perry secara khususnya mengatakan, “Terdapat beberapa buah tempat di dunia yang lebih lengkap untuk menghadapi cabaran yang timbul dalam kes ini.” Gabenor juga menyatakan, “Hari ini, kita mendapat tahu bahawa ada anak-anak sekolah dikenal pasti pernah berjumpa dengan pesakit.” Beliau seterusnya berkata, “Kes ini adalah serius. Yakinlah bahawa sistem kami berfungsi dengan baik seperti sepatutnya.”
mt: He was accompanied by those officials, he reassured Texans that action was being taken to protect public safety. Perry specifically said, "There are some places in the world better equipped to deal with the challenges that arise in this case." The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some schoolchildren have been identified as having had contact with the patient." He then said, "This is serious. Be assured that our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Lama sebelum The Daily Show dan The Colbert Report, Heck dan Johnson membayangkan sebuah penerbitan yang akan mempersendakan berita—dan pelaporan berita—ketika mereka merupakan pelajar di UW pada tahun 1988. Sejak permulaannya, The Onion telah menjadi empayar parodi berita yang sebenar , dengan edisi cetak, laman web yang menarik 5,000,000 pelawat unik pada bulan Oktober, iklan peribadi, rangkaian berita 24 jam, podcast, dan baru-baru ini melancarkan atlas dunia yang dinamakan “Our Dumb World”. Al Gore dan Jeneral Tommy Franks berbincang secara kasual tentang tajuk berita kegemaran mereka (apabila The Onion melaporkan Gore dan Tipper menikmati seks terbaik dalam hidup mereka selepas kekalahan beliau pada Electoral College 2000. Sebilangan besar penulis mereka seterusnya mempunyai pengaruh kuat terhadap rancangan parodi berita Jon Stewart dan Stephen Colbert.
mt: Before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would lampoon the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a real news parody empire, with a print edition, a popular website that attracts 5,000,000 unique visitors in October, advertising, a 24-hour news network, a podcast, and most recently launched an atlas of the world called “Our Dumb World.” Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have casually discussed their favorite news stories (when The Onion reported that Gore and Tipper enjoyed the best sex of their lives after his loss in the Electoral College 2000. Many of its writers have gone on to have a strong influence on the news parody programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Sekitar pukul 11:00 waktu tempatan (UTC +1) tunjuk perasaan berlaku di Whitehall bertentangan pintu masuk yang dikawal polis ke Downing Street, kediaman rasmi Perdana Menteri. Sejurus selepas pukul 11:00, penunjuk perasaan menyekat lalu lintas di laluan yang menuju ke arah utara di Whitehall. Pada pukul 11:20, polis meminta penunjuk perasaan untuk berundur ke laluan pejalan kaki, dengan menyatakan bahawa mereka perlu mengimbangi hak untuk menunjuk perasaan dengan kesesakan lalu lintas. Sekitar pukul 11:29, perarakan bantahan bergerak ke arah Whitehall, melepasi Trafalgar Square, sepanjang Strand, melepasi Aldwych dan melalui Kingsway menuju ke Holborn di mana Parti Konservatif sedang mengadakan Forum Musim Bunga mereka di hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: 11:00 local time (UTC +1) protests began in Whitehall against the entrance guarded by police to Downing Street, the official residence of the Prime Minister. Shortly after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound route in Whitehall. At 11:20, police asked protesters to retreat to the pedestrian route, stating that they need to balance the right to protest with traffic congestion. Around 11:29, the march of protest moved towards Whitehall, passing through Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing Aldwych and through Kingsway to Holborn where the Conservative Party was holding their Spring Forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: “Kami kini mempunyai seekor anak tikus yang berusia 4 bulan yang sudah tidak menghidap diabetes,” beliau menambah. Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor perubatan di University Dalhousie dalam Halifax, Nova Scotia dan ketua bahagian klinikal dan saintifik Persatuan Diabetes Kanada mengingatkan bahawa penyelidikan masih dalam peringkat awal. Seperti beberapa pakar lain, beliau skeptikal sama ada diabetes boleh disembuhkan, dan menyatakan bahawa penemuan-penemuan ini tidak relevan kepada mereka yang telah menghidapi diabetes Jenis 1.
mt: “We now have a four-month-old mouse that is no longer diabetic,” he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early stages. Like some other experts, he is skeptical as to whether diabetes can be cured, and states that these findings are not relevant to those who have had Type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Pesawat Twin Otter itu membuat percubaan untuk mendarat di Kokoda semalam sebagai penerbangan Airlines PNG CG4684, tetapi telah dibatalkan sekali. Kira-kira sepuluh minit sebelum ia dijangka mendarat untuk percubaan kali kedua, ia hilang. Tapak nahas telah ditemui hari ini dan ia amat sukar dicapai sehingga dua orang polis telah diturunkan ke dalam hutan untuk berjalan ke tempat kejadian dan mencari mangsa-mangsa yang selamat. Pencarian telah terhalang oleh cuaca buruk yang telah menyebabkan pendaratan terbatal.
mt: The Twin Otter was attempting to land at Kokoda yesterday as a flight of Airlines PNG CG4684, but was cancelled once. About ten minutes before it was expected to land for the second attempt, it disappeared. The crash site was found today and it is very difficult to reach until two police were dropped into the forest to walk to the scene and search for survivors. The search was hampered by bad weather that caused the landing to be cancelled.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: “Nasib baik tidak ada apa-apa yang terjadi kepada saya, tetapi saya menyaksikan peristiwa yang ngeri, apabila orang ramai mencuba untuk memecah tingkap untuk keluar. Orang sedang memukul panel tingkap menggunakan kerusi namun tingkap berkenaan tidak boleh dipecahkan. Salah satu panel akhirnya patah dan mereka mula keluar melalui tingkap,” kata Franciszek Kowal yang terselamat.
mt: “I'm lucky nothing happened to me, but I witnessed a terrifying scene, as people were trying to break the windows to get out. People were hitting the windows with chairs, but the windows couldn't be broken. One panel finally broke and they started to get out through the window,” said Franciszek Kowal who survived.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Ribut Tropika Danielle, ribut keempat yang telah diberikan nama pada musim taufan Atlantik 2010, terbentuk di Lautan Atlantik timur. Ribut ini, yang berada kira-kira 3,000 batu dari Miami, Florida, mempunyai angin berterusan pada kelajuan 40 bsj (64 kmj). Ahli sains di Pusat Taufan Nasional meramalkan bahawa Danielle akan bertambah kencang dan dikelaskan sebagai ribut taufan pada hari Rabu. Oleh sebab ribut jauh dari daratan, ia tetap sukar untuk menilai potensi kesan ke atas Amerika Syarikat atau Caribbean.
mt: Tropical Storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed in the Atlantic Ocean. The storm, about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, had sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). National Hurricane Center forecasters predicted Danielle would strengthen into a hurricane on Wednesday. Because the storm was far from land, it was difficult to assess its potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Doktor Lee menyatakan keprihatinannya terhadap laporan kanak-kanak di Turki kini telah dijangkiti oleh virus influenza burung A (H5N1) tanpa mendapat sakit. Beberap kajian mencadangkan penyakit berkenaan menjadi kurang bahaya sebelum menyebabkan wabak global, katanya. Terdapat kebimbangan bahawa para pesakit yang masih mengalami simptom selesema yang ringan akan menjangkiti lebih ramai orang sekiranya mereka meneruskan rutin harian seperti biasa.
mt: Dr Lee expressed concern over reports of children in Turkey now infected with the avian influenza A (H5N1) virus without getting sick. Several studies suggest the disease is less dangerous before causing a global pandemic, he said. There is concern that patients who are still experiencing mild flu-like symptoms will infect more people if they continue with their daily routines as usual.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Pada malam 9hb Ogos, taufan Eye of Morakot berada kira-kira tujuh puluh kilometer dari wilayah China Fujian. Taufan dijangka bergerak ke negara China pada kelajuan sebelas kmj.
mt: On the night of August 9, Typhoon Morakot was about seventy kilometers from the Fujian province of China. The typhoon is expected to move into China at a speed of eleven kmj.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Presiden AS George W Bush telah tiba di Singapura pada pagi 16 November, menandakan permulaan lawatan yang berlangsung seminggu di Asia. Beliau disambut oleh Timbalan Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng dan membincangkan isu perdagangan dan keganasan dengan Lee Hsien Loong, Perdana Menteri Singapura. Selepas kerugian beberapa minggu di pilihanraya separuh penggal,Bush memberitahu para hadirin berkenaan pengembangan perdagangan di Asia.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W Bush arrived in Singapore this morning, marking the start of a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Lee Hsien Loong, Singapore's Prime Minister. After recent losses in midterm elections, Bush told the audience about the development of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Pengumuman hari ini juga telah melanjutkan komitmen kerajaan yang dibuat pada bulan Mac tahun ini untuk membiayai gerabak tambahan. 300 unit tambahan membawa jumlah keseluruhan kepada 1,300 gerabak yang akan diperoleh untuk mengurangkan kesesakan.
mt: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March this year to fund additional carriages. 300 additional units bring the total to 1,300 carriages that will be procured to reduce congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Beliau berkata, “Tidak ada kepintaran untuk mencadangkan bahawa serangan dijangka tidak lama lagi. Namun,pengurangan tahap ancaman kepada teruk tidak bermakna keseluruhan ancaman telah hilang.
mt: He said, "There is no intelligence to suggest an attack is imminent. However, a reduction in the level of threat does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly mengangkat sumpah dalam Majlis Pemilihan Sementara (CEP) baru yang terdiri dari sembilan ahli semalam. Ia ialah CEP kelima Martelly dalam tempoh empat tahun. Suruhanjaya Presiden pada bulan lepas mengesyorkan pengunduran CEP sebelumnya sebagai sebahagian daripada langkah untuk menggerakkan negara bagi pelaksanaan pilihan raya baharu. Komisen itu ialah tindak balas Martelly kepada rusuhan meluas anti-rejim yang bermula dalam bulan Oktober. Protes yang kadangkala ganas itu berlaku disebabkan oleh kegagalan mengadakan pilihan raya, sesetengah berlaku sejak 2011.
mt: Martelly took the oath in a new Interim Electoral Council (CEP) consisting of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. The President's Commission last month recommended the dismissal of the previous CEP as part of a move to move the country forward for the implementation of new elections. The commission is Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime riots that began in October. Protests, sometimes violent, occurred because of the failure to hold elections, some of which have occurred since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: Amerika Syarikat Gimnastik menyokong surat Komuniti Olimpik Amerika Syarikat dan menerima keperluan mutlak keluarga Olimpik bagi mewujudkan persekitaran yang selamat untuk semua atlet kita. Kami bersetuju dengan kenyataan USOC bahawa kami boleh menjaga kepentingan atlet dan kelab kami, dan sukan mereka, dengan lebih baik di masa hadapan dengan perubahan yang lebih bermakna di dalam organisasi kami, dan bukannya pembatalan kesahan. Gimnastik Amerika Syarikat menyokong siasatan bebas yang mungkin boleh mendedahkan kesah deraan Larry Nassar dan mengambil tindakan perubahan yang wajar berkaitan kesah deraan yang dibongkarkan dengan berani oleh mangsa-mangsa beliau di mana perbuatan keji ini berlaku tanpa dikesan untuk tempoh masa yang lama. Gimnastik AS dan JOAS mempunyai matlamat yang sama, menjadikan sukan gimnastik dan lain-lain selamat bagi para atlet untuk mengejar impian mereka dalam persekitaran yang selamat, positif dan berdaya maju.
mt: The United States Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of the Olympic family to create a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC statement that we can better protect the interests of our athletes and clubs, and the sport they love, with more meaningful changes within our organization, rather than decertification. The United States Gymnastics supports a thorough investigation that may reveal the abuse of Larry Nassar and take appropriate action regarding the abuse that was revealed with courage by his victims where these heinous acts occurred undetected for a long period of time. USAG and JOAS have the same goal, making gymnastics and other sports safe for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and progressive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Tentera Laut Amerika Syarikat turut menyatakan mereka menyiasat insiden berkenaan. Mereka juga berkata dalam kenyataan, “Sekarang krew bekerja untuk memastikan kaedah yang terbaik pengekstrakan kapal dengan selamat. Sebuah kapal penyapu ranjau kelas Avenger, kapal tersebut sedang dalam perjalanan ke Puerto Princesa di Palawan. Ia ditugaskan kepada Armada Ketujuh Tentera Laut A.S. dan berpusat di Sasebo, Nagasaki di Jepun.
mt: The United States Navy also stated they are investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, "Now the crew is working to ensure the best safe extraction method. An Avenger-class minesweeper, the ship is en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy and is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Lewat pada hari Ahad, Presiden Amerika Syarikat Donald Trump, dalam satu kenyataan dihantar melalui setiausaha akhbar, mengumumkan tentera AS akan meninggalkan Syria. Pengumuman tersebut dibuat selepas Trump mengadakan perbualan telefon dengan Presiden Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turki akan juga mengambil alih kawalan ke atas tawanan pejuang ISIS yang, kata kenyataan itu, negara-negara Eropah tidak bersetuju untuk dikembalikan.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement sent through the press secretary, announced that U.S. troops will leave Syria. The announcement was made after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey will also take control of the ISIS fighters, the statement said, that European countries disagree to return.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Askar sekutu dan Afghanistan masuk ke kawasan terbabit untuk mengawal tapak tersebut dan pesawat sekutu lain telah dihantar untuk membantu. Kemalangan itu berlaku di kawasan pergunungan tinggi, dan dipercayai akibat api. Usaha untuk mencari lokasi nahas ditentang cuaca buruk dan permukaan yang sukar dicapai.
mt: Allied and Afghan troops entered the area to secure the site and other allied aircraft were dispatched to assist. The crash occurred in a mountainous area, and is believed to be due to fire. Efforts to locate the crash site were hampered by bad weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Selepas ampangan dibina pada 1963, banjir bermusim yang akan menyebar sedimen ke seluruh sungai telah terhenti. Sedimen ini adalah perlu bagi mewujudkan bar pasir dan pantai, yang bertindak sebagai habitat hidupan liar. Akibatnya, dua spesies ikan telah pupus, dan dua spesies ikan lain pupus, termasuk ketulan paus kelasa. Walaupun aras air akan naik beberapa kaki selepas banjir, pegawai berkuasa berharap ia mencukupi untuk memulihkan tebing pasir yang telah terhakis di hilir sungai.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal flooding that would spread sediment throughout the river had stopped. This sediment was necessary to create sand bars and beaches, which serve as habitat for wildlife. As a result, two fish species have gone extinct, and two fish species have gone extinct, including the humpback whale. Although the water level will rise a few feet after the flood, officials hope it will be enough to restore the eroded sandbars downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: Kedutaan Amerika Syarikat yang terletak di Nairobi, Kenya telah mengeluarkan amaran bahawa “anggota ekstremis dari Somalia” sedang merancang untuk melancarkan serangan bom bunuh diri di Kenya dan Etiopia. A.S. mengatakan bahawa mereka telah menerima maklumat daripada sumber yang tidak didedahkan yang secara khusus telah menyatakan penggunaan pengebom berani mati untuk meletupkan “mercu tanda terkenal” di Ethiopia dan Kenya.
mt: The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued an alert that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from undisclosed sources that specifically stated the use of suicide bombers to explode "well-known" landmarks in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Peguam terkenal Yunani, Sakis Kechagioglou dan George Nikolakopoulos telah dipenjarakan di penjara Korydallus di Athen, kerana mereka didapati bersalah melakukan sogokan dan rasuah. Hasil daripada ini, skandal besar komuniti undang-undang Yunani telah diperoleh melalui pendedahan tindakan yang menyalahi undang-undang hakim, peguam, peguam cara dan peguam yang telah berlaku pada tahun sebelumnya. Beberapa minggu yang lalu, selepas maklumat itu disiarkan oleh wartawan Makis Triantafylopoulos dalam rancangan TV popularnya “Zoungla” di Alpha TV, ahli Parlimen dan peguam, Petros Mantouvalos meletak jawatan kerana ahli pejabatnya telah terlibat dalam kegiatan sogokan dan rasuah. Tambahan pula, hakim tertinggi Evangelos Kalousis dipenjarakan kerana beliau didapati bersalah kerana rasuah dan akhlak buruk.
mt: Greek lawyer Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos were imprisoned in the Korydallus prison in Athens, after they were found guilty of bribery and corruption. As a result, a big scandal in the Greek legal community was obtained through the exposure of the illegal actions of judges, lawyers, barristers and lawyers that had taken place in the previous year. A few weeks ago, after the information was broadcast by journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular TV show “Zoungla” in Alpha TV, Member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos resigned because his assistant had been involved in bribery and corruption. In addition, the highest judge Evangelos Kalousis was imprisoned because he was found guilty of corruption and bad morals.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa mendapat skor innings tertinggi, 70 larian dengan hanya 41 bola dengan memukul 11 empat dan 2 enam. Pemukul pertengahan, Sachin Tendulkar dan Rahul Dravid, menunjukkan prestasi yang baik dan bekerjasama untuk menghasilkan skor seratus larian Tetapi, setelah kalah wiket kapten, India hanya membuat 36 larian, dan kalah 7 wiket untuk mengakhiri inning.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest innings score, 70 runs with only 41 balls with hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle batsman, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, showed good performance and collaborated to produce a score of 100 runs But, after losing the wicket captain, India only made 36 runs, and lost 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Pentadbir Commons Adam Cuerden menyatakan kekecewaannya atas pemadaman tersebut ketika beliau berbual dengan Wikinews pada bulan lalu. “Dia [Wales] pada dasarnya telah berbohong kepada kami dari awal. Pertama, dengan berlakon seolah-olah ini adalah bagi tujuan undang-undang. Kedua, dengan berpura-pura mendengar kami, sehingga dia memadam seninya.” Kemarahan masyarakat membawa kepada usaha untuk merangka dasar mengenai kandungan seksual untuk laman web tersebut yang menjadi hos kepada berjuta-juta media berlesen terbuka.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his disappointment at the deletion when he spoke to Wikinews last month. "He [Wales] was basically lying to us from the start. First, by pretending this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen to us, until he deleted his image." Public outrage led to efforts to draft a policy on sexual content for the site that hosts millions of open-licensed media.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Tidak semua menyokong untuk memasukkan taraf wanita. Pemenang pingat perak Olimpik 2004, Amir Khan berkata, “Saya benar-benar percaya wanita tidak patut berlawan. Itu pendapat saya.” Walaupun dengan ulasannya, beliau berkata beliau akan menyokong pesaing British pada Olimpik 2012 yang diadakan di London.
mt: Not everyone supports the inclusion of women. 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan said, "I really believe women shouldn't fight. That's my opinion." Although with his comments, he said he would support British rivals at the 2012 Olympics held in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, pelumba motosikal berusia 13 tahun, meninggal dunia selepas terlibat dalam kemalangan di Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Pada pusingan memanaskan badan, Lenz jatuh dari motornya, dan kemudian dilanggar oleh rakan pelumba, Xavier Zayat. Dia segera dirawat oleh kakitangan perubatan di landasan yang betul dan dihantar ke sebuah hospital tempatan di tempat beliau meninggal dunia. Zayat tidak tercedera dalam kemalangan itu.
mt: 13-year-old motocross racer Peter Lenz died after being involved in an accident at Indianapolis Motor Speedway. During the warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by trackside medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Peter Lenz, pelumba motosikal berusia 13 tahun, meninggal dunia selepas terlibat dalam kemalangan di Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Pada pusingan memanaskan badan, Lenz jatuh dari motornya, dan kemudian dilanggar oleh rakan pelumba, Xavier Zayat. Dia segera dirawat oleh kakitangan perubatan di landasan yang betul dan dihantar ke sebuah hospital tempatan di tempat beliau meninggal dunia. Zayat tidak tercedera dalam kemalangan itu.
mt: 13-year-old motocross racer Peter Lenz died after being involved in an accident at Indianapolis Motor Speedway. During the warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by trackside medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Perjalanan dengan kapal terbang mungkin suatu pengalaman yang menakutkan bagi sesiapa sahaja pada setiap peringkat umur dan latar belakang, terutama jika mereka tidak pernah terbang atau pernah mengalami peristiwa traumatik. Hal ini bukanlah sesuatu yang perlu dimalukan: ia tidak berbeza daripada ketakutan atau perasaan tidak suka akan benda lain yang biasa dialami ramai. Bagi sesetengah orang, memahami bagaimana kapal terbang berfungsi dan pengendaliannya ketika di udara mungkin dapat membantu mengatasi ketakutan mereka yang berdasarkan apa yang tidak diketahui atau perasaan tidak berada dalam kawalan.
mt: Traveling by plane is a frightening experience for anyone at any age and background, especially if they have never flown or have experienced a traumatic event. This is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different than fear or dislike of other things commonly experienced by many. For some people, understanding how planes work and their operation in the air may help overcome their fears based on what is unknown or feelings of being out of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Pada masa kini perjalanan udara hanya jarang ditempah terus melalui syarikat penerbangan itu tanpa pencarian pertama dan perbandingan harga. Kadangkala penerbangan yang sama boleh mempunyai kadar harga yang berbeza pada pelbagai agregator dan adalah lebih baik untuk membandingkan dahulu hasil carian dan juga merujuk terlebih dahulu ke laman web syarikat penerbangan tersebut sebelum membuat tempahan.
mt: At present, air travel is rarely booked directly through the airline without a first search and price comparison. Sometimes the same flight can have different rates on different aggregators and it is better to compare the results of the search and also refer to the airline's website before making a booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. src: Syarikat penghantar dibayar dengan lumayan untuk menghantar barang dengan cepat. Seringkali, masa sangat penting dengan dokumen perniagaan, dagangan atau alat ganti untuk pembaikan kecemasan. Di laluan tertentu, syarikat yang lebih besar memiliki pesawat sendiri, tetapi untuk laluan lain dan syarikat kecil mereka menghadapi masalah. Sekiranya mereka menghantar barang melalui pengankutan udara, di beberapa laluan mungkin memakan masa beberapa hari untuk melakukan pemunggahan dan kastam. Satu satunya cara untuk melakukannya dengan lebih pantas adalah dengan menghantarnya sebagai bagasiyang didaftar masuk. Peraturan syarikat penerbangan tidak membenarkan mereka menghantar bagasi tanpa penumpang, di sinilah anda diperlukan.
mt: Courier companies are paid well to deliver quickly. Often, time is very important with business documents, trading or spare parts for emergency repairs. In some routes, larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller companies they face problems. If they deliver goods by air transport, in some routes it may take several days to do customs and clearance. The only way to do it faster is to deliver it as checked baggage. Airline regulations do not allow them to deliver baggage without passengers, here you are needed.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Anda harus berhati-hati semasa memilih syarikat penerbangan Frequent Flyer yang menggangotai sebuah perikatan. Walaupun anda mungkin mempunyai gerak hati untuk menyertai syarikat penerbangan yang sering anda gunakan, anda harus sedar bahawa keistimewaan yang ditawarkan biasanya berbeza dan mata penerbangan yang kerap mungkin lebih banyak diberikan di bawah syarikat penerbangan berbeza dalam pakatan yang sama.
mt: You should be careful when choosing a Frequent Flyer airline alliance. While you may have a preference for joining an airline that you frequently use, you should be aware that the perks offered are usually different and frequent flier miles may be given under different airlines in the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Minumlah minuman beralkohol dengan sederhana. Alkohol mempunyai pengaruh yang berbeza pada orang yang berbeza, dan mengetahui had pengambilan anda ialah perkara yang paling penting. Masalah kesihatan jangka panjang yang berkemungkinan akibat minuman alkohol berlebihan termasuk kerosakan hati dan juga hilang keupayaan melihat dan kematian. Risiko bahaya meningkat apabila mengambil alkohol yang dihasilkan secara haram. Arak haram boleh mengandungi pelbagai kekotoran berbahaya termasuk metanol, yang boleh menyebabkan buta atau kematian walaupun dalam dos yang kecil.
mt: Drink alcohol in moderation. Alcohol affects people differently, and knowing your limits is the most important thing. Long-term health problems that may result from excessive drinking include liver damage and also loss of sight and death. Risks increase when consuming alcohol produced illegally. Bootleg alcohol can contain various dangerous contaminants including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Canal District (bahasa Belanda: Grachtengordel) merupakan daerah terkenal abad ke17 yang mengelilingi Binnenstad di Amsterdam. Seluruh daerah tersebut ditentukan sebagai Tapak Warisan Dunia UNESCO disebabkan oleh nilai budaya dan sejarah uniknya, dan nilai hartanya adalah antara yang paling tinggi dalam negara.
mt: Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a famous 17th-century district that surrounds the Binnenstad in Amsterdam. The entire district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site due to its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12km barat daya dari Siem Reap. Tokong di puncak bukit ini dibina pada hujung abad ke-9, semasa pemerintahan Raja Yasovarman. Suasana suram di Kuil dan pemandangan dari Tasik Tonle Sap membuat pendakian ke bukit adalah berbaloi. Satu lawatan ke tapak tersebut boleh digabungkan dengan perjalanan bot ke tasik itu dengan mudah. Pas Angkor diperlukan untuk memasuki tokong itu. Oleh itu, jangan lupa membawa pasport anda semasa menuju ke Tonle Sap.
mt: 12km southwest of Siem Reap. The temple on the top of this hill was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere at the temple and the view from Tonle Sap Lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be combined easily with a boat trip to the lake. Angkor Pass is required to enter the temple. So, don't forget to bring your passport when heading to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antartika ialah kawasan paling sejuk di Bumi dan ia megelilingi Kutub Selatan. Perbelanjaan untuk melancong adalah mahal, perlu cergas dari segi fizikal, hanya dapat dilakukan pada musim panas bulan November-Februari, dan sebahagian besarnya terhad di Semenanjung, Kepulauan dan Laut Ross. Beberapa ribu pekerja tinggal di sini pada musim panas di kebanyakan empat dozen pangkalan kawasan tersebut; manakala sebilangan kecil tinggal pada musim sejuk. Pendalaman Antartika adalah dataran tinggi ditutupi oleh 2-3 km ais. Sekali-sekala lawatan udara pakar pergi ke pedalaman, untuk pendakian gunung atau untuk mencapai Kutub, mempunyai asas yang besar.
mt: Antartika is the coldest place on Earth and it surrounds the South Pole. The cost of travel is expensive, requires physical fitness, can only be done during the summer months of November-February, and most of it is restricted to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. Several thousand workers live here during the summer at most four dozen bases in the area; while a few live during the winter. Antartika is a high plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasionally flights go to the interior, for mountain climbing or to reach the Pole, having a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Balai cerap pra-moden tidak digunakan hari ini, dan kekal sebagai muzium, atau tapak pendidikan. Pencemaran cahaya di zaman kegemilangan mereka bukan jenis masalah yang ada hari ini, biasanya terletak di bandar-bandar atau di kampus, lebih mudah untuk mencapai daripada yang dibina pada zaman moden. Kebanyakan teleskop kajian moden merupakan fasiliti besar di daerah terpencil dengan keadaan atmosfera yang sesuai.
mt: Pre-modern telescopes are not used today, and remain as museums, or educational sites. Light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem that exists today, usually located in cities or campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are large facilities in remote areas with suitable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Terdapat banyak pantai, disebabkan Auckland merentangi dua pelabuhan. Pantai yang paling popular terdapat di tiga kawasan. Pantai Shore Utara (di daerah Pelabuhan Utara) di Lautan Pasifik dan meluas dari Long Bay utara ke Devonport di selatan. Mereka hampir semua pantai berpasir dengan tempat berenang yang selamat dan kebanyakan tempat teduh yang disediakan oleh pokok-pokok pohutukawa. Pantai Tamaki Drive terletak di Pelabuhan Waitemata, di pinggir bandar mewah Mission Bay dan St Heliers di Pusat Auckland. Ini merupakan pantai keluarga yang kadang-kadang sesak dengan beraneka jenis kedai sepanjang persisiran pantai. Selamat untuk berenang.
mt: There are many beaches, due to Auckland straddling two harbours. The most popular beaches are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in the North Shore area) on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay north to Devonport south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming areas and most of the shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are located on the Waitemata Harbour, on the edge of the upmarket Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. This is a family beach that is sometimes crowded with a variety of shops along the beachfront. Safe for swimming.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Sila ingat bahawa anda pada dasarnya sedang mengunjungi kawasan kubur besar, yang juga kawasan yang mempunyai makna yang hampir tidak dapat dihitung untuk bahagian yang signifikan daripada penduduk dunia. Masih ramai lelaki dan wanita yang masih hidup dan terselamat dari tempat itu, dan ramai lagi yang mempunyai orang tersayang yang dibunuh atau melakukan buruh paksa sehingga mati di sana, tidak mengira kaum Yahudi mahupun bukan Yahudi. Sila anggap tapak ini bermaruah, kesungguhan dan menghormati dengan sewajarnya. Jangan membuat lawak mengenai Holocaust atau Nazi. Dilarang merosakkan tapak dengan menanda atau membuat grafiti pada sebarang struktur.
mt: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a large graveyard, which also has meaning that is almost incalculable for a significant portion of the world's population. Many men and women still alive and safe from that place, and many more have loved ones killed or worked to death there, regardless of whether they are Jewish or not. Please consider this place holy, solemn, and deserving of respect. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not deface the site by tagging or making graffiti on any structure.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Bahasa tambahan ialah bahasa buatan atau dibina dengan niat untuk memudahkan komunikasi antara rakyat sebaliknya akan mempunyai kesukaran berkomunikasi. Mereka terpisah daripada lingua francas, yang merupakan bahasa semula jadi atau organik yang menjadi dominan dengan satu sebab atau sebab lain sebagi alat komunikasi antara penutur-penutur bahasa lain.
mt: Additional languages are artificial or constructed with the intention of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are distinguished from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

They are distinguished from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Sekiranya melintasi Utara Baltik pada musim sejuk, periksa lokasi kabin, kerana pelayaran menyusuri ais menghasilkan bunyi yang kuat kepada mereka yang terlibat. Pelayaran Saint Petersburg termasuk masa di bandar. Penumpang pelayaran dikecualikan daripada keperluan visa (periksa syarat-syaratnya)
mt: If crossing the Baltic Sea in winter, check cabin location, as voyages through ice produce strong sounds to those involved. The St. Petersburg cruise includes time in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check its requirements)
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Bahasa rasmi Barcelona ialah Catalan dan Sepanyol. Lebih kurang setengah daripada penduduknya lebih suka berbahasa Catalan kerana sebilangan besar memahaminya dan hampir semua orang tahu bahasa Sepanyol. Walau bagaimanapun, kesemua tanda hanya menggunakan bahasa Catalan disebabkan perundangan menetapkan statusnya sebagai bahasa rasmi utama. Namun, Bahasa Sepanyol juga banyak digunakan dalam pengankutan awam dan lain-lain fasiliti. Pengumuman berkala di Metro diumumkan hanya dalam bahasa Catalan, tetapi gangguan yang tidak dirancang akan diumumkan oleh sistem automatik dalam pelbagai bahasa termasuk bahasa Sepanyol, Inggeris, Perancis, Arab dan Jepun.
mt: The official language of Barcelona is Catalan and Spanish. About half of its inhabitants prefer to speak Catalan because a large majority understand it and almost everyone knows Spanish. However, all signs are in Catalan only because legislation establishes its status as the main official language. However, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Announcements on the Metro are announced only in Catalan, but unscheduled interruptions will be announced by the automatic system in several languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Di negara-negara maju hari ini, penyediaan inap-sarapan mewah dipertingkatkan menjadi satu seni. Pada skala mewah, B&B dengan jelas bertanding atas dua perkara, tempat tidur dan sarapan. Oleh itu, di tempat elegan seperti ini anda pasti mendapati tempat tidur paling mewah, mungkin selimut buatan tangan atau katil antik. Sarapan mungkin termasuk hidangan bermusim di rantau ini atau sajian istimewa tuan rumah. Ia mungkin terletak di sebuah bangunan lama yang bersejarah dengan perabot antik, perkarangan yang dijaga rapi dan kolam renang.
mt: In developed countries today, the provision of in-room breakfasts has been elevated to an art. On the luxury scale, B&Bs are clearly competing on two things, bed and breakfast. So, in places like this you will find the most luxurious beds, perhaps hand-made quilts or antique beds. Breakfast may include seasonal dishes from this region or a special hostess serving. It may be located in an old building with historical furniture, manicured gardens and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Bandar Beijing di China akan menjadi bandar tuan rumah bagi Sukan Olimpik Musim Sejuk tahun 2022, yang akan menjadikannya bandar pertama yang menjadi tuan rumah untuk kedua-dua Olimpik musim sejuk dan musim panas. Beijing akan menjadi tuan rumah kepada majlis pembukaan dan penutupan dan acara ais tertutup. Acara berski yang lain akan diadakan di Taizicheng kawasan ski di Zhangjiakou, lebih kurang 220 km (140 batu) dari Beijing.
mt: Beijing, China will be the host city for the 2022 Winter Olympic Games, making it the first city to host both the Winter and Summer Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the ice events. Other skiing events will be held at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Selesema burung, atau secara rasminya influenza avian, boleh menjangkiti burung dan mamalia. Kurang daripada seribu kes yang pernah dilaporkan pada manusia, tetapi beberapa antaranya membawa maut. Kebanyakannya melibatkan mereka yang bekerja dalam bidang penternakan ayam, namun mereka yang berkecimpung dalam aktiviti mencerap burung juga turut menghadapi risiko.
mt: Bird flu, or officially avian influenza, can infect birds and mammals. Less than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some have been fatal. Most involve those who work in the poultry industry, but those who engage in birdwatching also face risks.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Viking menggunakan jalan air Rusia untuk sampai ke Laut Hitam dan Laut Kaspia. Sebahagian daripada laluan ini masih boleh digunakan. Semak keperluan permit khas, yang mungkin sukar untuk mendapatkannya. Terusan Laut Putih-Baltik menghubungkan Lautan Artik dengan Lautan Baltik, melalui Tasik Onega, Tasik Ladoga dan Saint Petersburg, kebanyakannya melalui sungai dan tasik. Tasik Onega juga tersambung dengan Volga, maka masih boleh untuk sampai dari Laut Caspian menerusi Rusia.
mt: Viking uses the Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some of this route is still usable. Check special permits, which may be difficult to obtain. The White Sea-Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean with the Baltic Sea, mostly through lakes and rivers. Lake Onega is also connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to reach from the Caspian Sea via Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Pos pemeriksaan imigresen biasanya merupakan hentian pertama setelah turun dari kapal terbang, kapal atau kenderaan lain. Dalam sesetengah kereta api merentas sempadan pemeriksaan dilakukan di kereta api yang berjalan dan anda harus mempunyai ID yang sah bersama anda apabila menaiki salah satu kereta api. Di dalam kereta api semalaman, pasport mungkin diambil oleh konduktor supaya tidur anda tidak terganggu.
mt: Immigration checkpoints are usually the first stop after disembarking from a plane, ship or other vehicle. In some trains, inspections are done on the moving train and you must have a valid ID with you when boarding one of these trains. On overnight trains, passports may be taken by the conductor so your sleep is not disturbed.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapura secara umum sangat selamat dan sangat mudah untuk mencari jalan, dan anda boleh membeli hampir apa sahaja setelah sampai. Tetapi diletakkan di kawasan “tropika tinggi” hanya beberapa darjah di utara khatulistiwa, anda akan mengalami cuaca panas (selalu) dan matahari yang terik (apabila langit cerah, lebih jarang).
mt: Singapore is generally very safe and easy to find your way around, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But placed in the "tropical highlands" just a few degrees north of the equator, you will experience hot weather (always) and intense sun (when the sky is clear, less often).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Pastri yang terdapat di Jerman cukup sedap, dan pastri di Bavaria pula agak manis berlemak dan beraneka, serupa dengan pastri yang boleh didapati di negara jiran selatan, Austria. Pastri buah ialah juadah biasa, dengan epal yang dijadikan pastri sepanjang tahun, serta ceri dan plum yang muncul ketika musim panas. Banyak makanan bakar Jerman juga mengandungi badam, kacang hazel, dan lain-lain kacang pokok. Kek popular selalunya sedap dimakan dengan secawan kopi yang keras. Sekiranya anda menginginkan pastri yang kecil namun berlemak, anda boleh mencuba pastri yang dinamakan berdasarkan daerah asalnya seperti Berliner, Pfannkuchen atau Krapfen.
mt: Pastries in Germany are quite tasty, and pastries in Bavaria are a bit sweeter and fattier, similar to pastries that can be found in the neighboring southern country, Austria. Apple pastries are a common treat, with apples being made into pastries year-round, as well as cherries and plums that appear during the summer. Many German baked goods also contain almonds, hazelnuts, and other nuts. Popular cakes are usually best eaten with a strong cup of coffee. If you are looking for a small but fatty pastry, you can try pastries named after their original region such as Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Jika anda ingin melihat dunia dengan harga murah, untuk tujuan keperluan, gaya hidup atau cabaran, terdapat beberapa cara untuk berbuat begitu. Secara umum ia jatuh dalam dua kategori: Sama ada anda bekerja sambil melancong atau cuba untuk membataskan perbelanjaan anda. Artikel ini berfokuskan kepada yang kedua. Bagi mereka yang sanggup mengorbankan keselesaan, masa dan kebolehramalan untuk menurunkan perbelanjaan hampir ke kosong, lihat pelancongan bajet minimum. Nasihat tersebut membuat anggapan bahawa para pelancong tidak mencuri, menceroboh, mengambil bahagian dalam pasaran haram, mengemis atau mengeksploitasi orang lain untuk keuntungan mereka
mt: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are several ways to do so. Generally it falls into two categories: either you work while you travel or try to limit your expenses. This article focuses on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to bring down expenses almost to zero, see budget travel. Advice assumes travelers are not stealing, trespassing, participating in black markets, panhandling or exploiting others for their own gain
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Regangan antara Point Marion dan Fairmont memberikan keadaan pemanduan paling mencabar di Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, yang kerap melalui kawasan kayu terpencil. Jika anda tida biasa memandu di jalanraya luar bandar, berhati-hati dengan, gred curam, lorong sempit, dan lengkung tajam mendominasi. Pengumuman kadar laju adalah jelas rendah dari sebelum dan seksyen subsekuen - biasanya 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - dan kepatuhan ketat kepada mereka bahkan lebih penting dari selain. Yang menghairankan, perkhidmatan telefon mudah alih adalah lebih kuat di sini dari bahagian-bahagian lain di sepanjang laluan, contohnya, Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont provides the most challenging driving conditions along the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, which often runs through remote wooded areas. If you are not used to driving on rural roads, be careful with, steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp turns dominating. Speed limit announcements are clearly low from before and subsequent sections - usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - and strict adherence to them is even more important than elsewhere. Surprisingly, cell phone service is stronger here than in other parts of the route, for example, Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: “Canyoning” (atau: canyoneering) adalah tentang menurun ke dasar gaung, sama ada yang kering atau penuh dengan air. Ngarai menggabungkan unsur berenang, mendaki dan melompat--tetapi memerlukan sedikit latihan atau bentuk fizikal untuk bermula (berbanding dengan pendakian batu, menyelam skuba atau ski Gunung Alp, sebagai contoh).
mt: “Canyoning” (or: canyoneering) is about descending to the bottom of a canyon, whether dry or full of water. Canyons combine elements of swimming, climbing and jumping—but requires a little training or physical fitness to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: “Canyoning” (atau: canyoneering) adalah tentang menurun ke dasar gaung, sama ada yang kering atau penuh dengan air. Ngarai menggabungkan unsur berenang, mendaki dan melompat--tetapi memerlukan sedikit latihan atau bentuk fizikal untuk bermula (berbanding dengan pendakian batu, menyelam skuba atau ski Gunung Alp, sebagai contoh).
mt: “Canyoning” (or: canyoneering) is about descending to the bottom of a canyon, whether dry or full of water. Canyons combine elements of swimming, climbing and jumping—but requires a little training or physical fitness to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Masuk ke dalam kereta anda dan bergerak untuk perjalanan yang lama dan mempunyai rayuan intrinsik dalam kesederhanaan. Tidak seperti kenderaan lebih besar, anda mungkin sudah biasa memandu kereta anda dan tahu hadnya. Mendirikan khemah di tanah persendirian atau di bandar dengan sebarang ukuran boleh menarik perhatian yang tidak dikehendaki. Secara ringkas, membawa kereta anda adalah cara yang hebat untuk perjalanan darat namun jarang sekali sesuai secara sendirinya untuk 'berkhemah' . Perkhemahan kereta tidak mustahil jika anda mempunyai minivan yang besar, SUV, Sedan atau Station Wagon dengan kerusi yang boleh baring.
mt: Get in your car and drive for a long trip and have the inherent allure of simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you may already be familiar with driving your car and know its limits. Pitching a tent on private land or in town with any size can draw unwanted attention. In short, bringing your car is a great way to go for overland travel yet rarely suitable by itself for 'camping'. Car camping is not impossible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with fold-down seats.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."
