src: Bandar moden Casablanca ditemukan oleh nelayan Berber pada abad ke-10 sebelum Masihi, dan digunakan oleh orang-orang Phoenecia, Rom dan Merenid sebagai pelabuhan strategik yang dipanggil Anfa. Orang Portugis memusnahkannya dan membinanya semula dengan nama Casa Branca, hanya untuk membiarkanya selepas gempa bumi berlaku pada 1755. Sultan Moroccan membina kembali bandar seperti Daru I-Badya dan memberi nama Casablanca oleh pedagang Spanish yang menstabilkan berasas perniagaan di situ. Casablanca merupakan salah satu tempat paling kurang menarik untuk membeli-belah di Maghribi. Mudah untuk menjumpai tempat yang menjual barangan tradisional Maghribi di sekitar Medina lama seperti tagin, tembikar, barangan kulit, shisha dan pelbagai perhiasan kecil, tetapi itu hanya untuk pelancong.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century before Christ, and used by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it with the name Casa Branca, only to leave it after an earthquake occurred in 1755. The Moroccan Sultan built the city back up as Daru I-Badya and named it Casablanca by Spanish traders who stabilized the basis of business there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in Maghribi. It is easy to find places that sell traditional Maghribi goods around the old Medina such as tagin, pottery, leather goods, shisha and various small jewelry, but that is only for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Ke arah utara dan mudah dicapai adalah bandar romatik dan menarik Sintra dibuat terkenal kepada orang asing selepas cerita kegemilangannya yang direkod oleh Tuan Byron. Bas Scotturb 403 melakukan perjalanan yang kerap ke Sintra, bersinggah di Cabo da Roca. Juga di bahagian utara, lawati Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), sebuah tempat penjelmaan Marian yang terkenal di dunia.
mt: To the north and easily reached is the romantic and attractive city of Sintra made famous to foreigners after its story was recorded by Lord Byron. Bus Scotturb 403 makes frequent trips to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also in the north, visit Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a Marian apparition site famous worldwide.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Pada 1994, wilayah Nagorno-Karabakh beretnik Armenia di Azerbaijan melancarkan perang terhadap rakyat Azerbaijan. Dengan sokongan Armenia, sebuah republik baharu diwujudkan. Walau bagaimanapun, tidak ada negara yang telah lama wujud - walau Armenia sekalipun - yang mengiktirafnya secara rasmi. Pertengkaran diplomatik ke seluruh rantau hingga merosakkan perhubungan antara Armenia dan Azerbaijan.
mt: 1994, the Armenian ethnic region of Nagorno-Karabakh in Azerbaijan launched a war against the Azerbaijani people. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was created. However, no country that has long existed - even Armenia - has officially recognized it. Diplomatic quarrels throughout the region until it ruined the relationship between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Salah satu titik kuat Charlotte, North Carolina, adalah bahawa ia mempunyai banyak pilihan yang berkualiti tinggi untuk keluarga. Penduduk dari kawasan lain biasanya menyatakan keramahan keluarga menjadi sebab utama untuk berpindah ke situ, dan pengunjung biasanya mendapati bahawa bandar tersebut mudah dinikmati bersama kanak-kanak. Dalam 20 tahun terakhir ini, bilangan pilihan mesra kanak-kanak di Uptown Charlotte telah meningkat dengan pesat. Teksi biasanya tidak digunakan oleh keluarga-keluarga di Charlotte, namun ia masih dapat berguna dalam keadaan tertentu. Terdapat surcaj untuk lebih daripada 2 penumpang, jadi pilihan ini mungkin lebih mahal daripada perlu.
mt: One of Charlotte's strengths is that it has many high-quality family options. People from other areas often cite family friendliness as the main reason for moving there, and visitors usually find that the city is easy to enjoy with children. In the last 20 years, the number of family-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has increased dramatically. Taxis are rarely used by families in Charlotte, but they can be useful in certain situations. There is a surcharge for more than 2 passengers, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Sebelum Sepanyol tiba di abad ke-16, utara Chile berada di bawah pemerintahan Inca manakala Araucanians asli (Mapuche) didiami tengah dan selatan Chile. Puak Mapuche merupakan salah satu puak bebas daripada orang asli Amerika, yang tidak diserap sepenuhnya dalam pemerintahan Sepanyol sehingga setelah Chile mencapai kemerdekaan. Walaupun Chile mengisytiharkan kemerdekaan pada tahun 1810 (sewaktu perang Napoleon yang meninggalkan Sepanyol tanpa kerajaan pusat yang berfungsi untuk beberapa tahun), kemenangan di atas Sepanyol tidak dicapai sehingga tahun 1818.
mt: Before Spain arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule, while the Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were one of the few indigenous peoples of the Americas to not be completely absorbed into the Spanish government until after Chile achieved independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars, which left Spain without a functioning central government for several years), victory over Spain was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, yang bermaksud Tanah Lima, terdiri daripada lima buah kampung pantai kecil Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza dan Monterosso yang bertempat di rantau Itali Liguria. Ia disenaraikan dalam Senarai Tapak Warisan Dunia UNESCO. Selama berabad-abad, rakyat telah dibina dengan teliti teres di landskap yang lasak, curam sehingga ke tebing yang menghadap ke laut. Sebahagian daya tarikannya adalah kekurangan perkembangan korporat yang dapat dilihat. laluan, keretapi dan kapal menghubungi kampung-kampung, kereta tidak dapat mencapai mereka dari luar.
mt: Cinque Terre, meaning Five Lands, consists of five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, located in the Italian region of Liguria. It is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. For centuries, people have built terraces into the steep, rugged landscape, facing the sea. Some of its appeal is the lack of corporate development that can be seen. paths, trains and boats connect the villages, cars cannot reach them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Punca kemalangan paling sering pada musim sejuk ialah jalan yang licin, turapan (jalan kaki lima) dan terutamanya tangga. Paling minimum, anda memerlukan kasut dengan tumit yang sesuai. Kasut musim panas biasanya sangat licin pada ais dan salji, malah but musim sejuk tertentu juga kurang sesuai. Coraknya seharusnya cukup dalam, 5 mm (1/5 inci) atau lebih, dan bahannya harus cukup lembut untuk suhu sejuk. Terdapat beberapa but yang mempunyai pancang dan juga peralatan tambahan kepada yang telah berpancang untuk mengelakkan daripada keadaan licin, sesuai untuk kebanyakan kasut dan but, untuk tumit atau tumit dan tapak kasut. Tumit kasut perlu rendah dan lebar. Pasir, kerikil atau garam (kalsium klorida) sering diselerakkan di atas jalan atau laluan untuk meningkatkan daya tarikan.
mt: The most common cause of accidents in winter is slippery roads, sidewalks and especially stairs. At a minimum, you need shoes with suitable treads. Summer shoes are often very slippery on ice and snow, and some winter boots are also unsuitable. Its pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough for cold weather. There are some boots with studs and also additional equipment to those already studded to prevent from slippery, suitable for most shoes and boots, for soles or soles and shoe heels. Shoe heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to increase traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Kepulauan Cook merupakan negara pulau dengan hubungan bebas dengan New Zealand, terletak di Polynesia, di tengah Laut Pasifik Selatan. Ia sebuah kepulauan dengan 15 pulau yang tersebar luas di kawasan lautan melebihi 2.2 juta km2. Dengan zon masa yang sama seperti Hawaii, kepulauan ini adakalanya dianggap sebagai “jajahan Hawaii”. Walaupun lebih kecil, ia mengimbau kembali kenangan para pelancong Hawaii yang berusia terhadap keadaan tempat ini sebelum adanya hotel besar dan projek pembangunan yang lain. Kepulauan Cook tidak mempunyai apa-apa bandar raya, tetapi ia mempunyai 15 pulau lain. Yang utama ialah Rarotonga dan Aitutaki.
mt: The Cook Islands are a self-governing island country in the South Pacific, in free association with New Zealand. It comprises 15 islands whose total land area is 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The Cook Islands' Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ), however, covers 2,000,000 square kilometres (770,000 sq mi) of ocean. The Cook Islands' 12 governors represent the 15 islands. New Zealand is responsible for foreign affairs, defence, and currency, the New Zealand dollar.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

Ia sebuah kepulauan dengan 15 pulau yang tersebar luas di kawasan lautan melebihi 2.2 juta km2. Dengan zon masa yang sama seperti Hawaii, kepulauan ini adakalanya dianggap sebagai “jajahan Hawaii”. Walaupun lebih kecil, ia mengimbau kembali kenangan para pelancong Hawaii yang berusia terhadap keadaan tempat ini sebelum adanya hotel besar dan projek pembangunan yang lain. Kepulauan Cook tidak mempunyai apa-apa bandar raya, tetapi ia mempunyai 15 pulau lain. Yang utama ialah Rarotonga dan Aitutaki.
mt: The Cook Islands are a self-governing island country in the South Pacific, in free association with New Zealand. It comprises 15 islands whose total land area is 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The Cook Islands' Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ), however, covers 2,000,000 square kilometres (770,000 sq mi) of ocean. The Cook Islands' 12 governors represent the 15 islands. New Zealand is responsible for foreign affairs, defence, and currency, the New Zealand dollar.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Permit mesti ditempah terlebih dahulu. Anda perlu ada permit untuk bermalam di Sirena. Sirena merupakan satu-satunya stesen renjer yang menyediakan penginapan asrama dan hidangan panas beserta dengan perkhemahan. La Leona, San Pedrillo, dan Los Patos hanya menyediakan perkhemahan tanpa perkhidmatan makanan. Ianya adalah mustahil untuk mendapatkan permit taman secara langsung dari Stesen Ranger di Puerto Jiménez, tetapi mereka tidak menerima kad kredit Perkhidmatan Taman (MINAE) tidak mengeluarkan permit taman lebih dari satu bulan sebelum ketibaan yang dijangka. CafeNet El Sol menawarkan perkhidmatan tempahan dengan yuran sebanyak US$30, atau $10 untuk pas harian, butiran terdapat di laman Corcovado.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. You need a permit to camp at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals along with camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only offer camping without food service. It is impossible to get a park permit directly from the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards and MINAE does not issue park permits more than one month before your expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for $30, or $10 for a day pass, details are at Corcovado.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Mengembara dengan ski: Aktiviti ini juga dikenali sebagai ski di kawasan pedalaman, lawatan ski atau mengembara ski. Ia berkaitan tetapi biasanya tidak melibatkan lawatan ski gaya alpine atau pendakian gunung, pendakian gunung dilakukan di kawasan curam dan memerlukan ski dan kasut yang lebih keras. Fikirkan laluan ski sebagai serupa dengan laluan mendaki. Dalam keadan baik anda akan meliputi jarak lebih jauh daripada berjalan kaki - namun sangat jarang anda akan mendapat kelajuan ski merentas desa tanpa beg galas berat dalam lorong yang rapi.
mt: Skiing: This activity is also known as backcountry skiing, ski touring or ski trekking. It is related but usually does not involve alpine ski touring or mountaineering, which is done in steep terrain and requires stiffer skis and boots. Think of ski touring routes as similar to hiking routes. In good conditions you will cover more distance than walking - but very rarely will you get ski touring across town without a heavy pack in groomed trails.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Kejutan kepulangan terjadi lebih awal daripada kejutan budaya (terdapat fasa bulan madu yang kurang), bertahan lebih lama dan mungkin lebih teruk. Pelancong-pelancong yang senang menyesuaikan diri kepada budaya baharu kadang-kadang mempunyai masa yang sukar untuk menyesuaikan kembali kepada budaya asal mereka sendiri. Apabila pulang selepas tinggal di luar negara, anda telah menyesuaikan diri dengan budaya baharu dan kehilangan beberapa tabiat anda daripada budaya rumah anda. Apabila pertama kali anda ke keluar negara, orang mungkin bersabar dan memahami, memandangkan pengembara yang berada di negara baharu perlu menyesuaikan diri. Orang ramai tidak boleh menjangka bahawa kesabaran dan kefahaman adalah wajib untuk pelancong yang pulang.
mt: The shock of the return comes earlier than the shock of culture (there is a honeymoon phase that is less), lasts longer and may be worse. Travelers who are easy to adjust to new cultures sometimes have a hard time readjusting to their original cultures. When returning home after living abroad, you have adjusted to a new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When first traveling abroad, people may be patient and understanding, given that travelers in a new country must adjust. People cannot expect that patience and understanding are required for travelers returning home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Binatang moose (juga dikenali sebagai elk) sebenarnya tidak agresif, namun akan mempertahankan diri sekiranya merasakan ancaman. Apabila orang tidak menganggap moose berpotensi berbahaya, mereka mungkin menghampirinya dengan terlalu dekat dan membahayakan diri sendiri.
mt: Moose (also known as elk) are not aggressive, but will defend themselves if they feel threatened. When people don't consider moose to be potentially dangerous, they may approach them too closely and endanger themselves.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Ketika bahang memuncak, para pengembara boleh mengalami fatamorgana iaitu berilusi melihat air (atau benda-benda lain). Ini mungkin sangat berbahaya jika pelancong itu mengejar fatamorgana tersebut lalu membazir tenaga berharga dan baki air yang tinggal. Bahkan padang pasir terpanas pun boleh menjadi sangat sejuk pada waktu malam. Hipotermia menjadi risiko besar tanpa pakaian yang memanaskan.
mt: When the heat is at its peak, travelers can experience mirages, or illusions of water (or other things). This can be very dangerous if the traveler chases the mirage and wastes valuable energy and remaining water. Even the hottest desert can be very cold at night. Hypothermia becomes a big risk without warming clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Republik Dominika (Sepanyol: República Dominicana) ialah sebuah negara Caribbean yang menduduki bahagian timur pulau Hispaniola, yang dikongsi dengan Haiti Selain pantai pasir putih dan lanskap gunung, negara itu adalah kediaman untuk kota terlama Eropah di Amerika, kini sebahagian Santo Domingo. Pulau tersebut awalnya didiami oleh orang Taínos dan Caribes. Orang Caribes merupakan orang yang bertutur dalam bahasa Arawakan dan telah tiba sekitar 10,000 tahun sebelum Masihi. Dalam masa beberapa tahun yang singkat berikutan kedatangan pengembara Eropah, penduduk Tainos telah dikurangkan dengan banyaknya oleh penakluk Sepanyol Berdasarkan Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) antara tahun 1492 dan 1498 penakluk Sepanyol mengorbankan kira-kira 100,000 Tainos.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Besides its white-sand beaches and mountainous landscape, the country is also home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribs. The Caribs were the people who spoke the Arawakan language and arrived around 10,000 years before the Christian era. In a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the Taínos were greatly reduced in number by Spanish conquistadors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498, the Spanish conquistadors killed about 100,000 Taínos.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Sukan salji turun bukit yang merangkumi ski dan luncur salji adalah sukan popular yang melibatkan meluncur di atas permukaan yang diliputi salji dengan ski atau papan salji yang terpasang pada kaki. Berski adalah aktiviti utama perjalanan dengan ramai peminat, yang kadang-kadang dikenali sebagai‚ “gelandangan ski” yang merancang keseluruhan percutian sekitar berski di lokasi tertentu. Sukan ski telah lama wujud — lukisan pada gua menggambarkan pemain ski sejak 5000 SM! Meluncur menuruni bukit sebagai satu sukan bermula sekurang-kurangnya pada kurun 17, dan dalam tahun 1861 kelab luncur rekreasi yang pertama dibuka oleh orang Norway di Australia.
mt: Snowboarding is a popular snow sport involving sliding down a slope with feet attached to a snowboard. Skiing is the main recreational activity of many tourists, sometimes known as "ski bums" who plan their entire vacation around skiing at a particular location. Skiing has been around for a long time — cave paintings depict skiers since 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport began at least in the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Kepulauan Afrika Timur terletak di Lautan Hindi di pesisir pantai timur Afrika. Madagascar adalah yang terbesar, dan benua sendiri apabila ia menjadi hidupan liar. Kebanyakan pulauan kecil adalah negara berasingan, atau dekaitkan dengan Perancis, dan dikenali sebagai resort pantai mewah. Orang Arab juga membawa masuk Islam ke tanah ini dan ia telah berkembang pesat di Comoros dan Mayotte. Pengaruh dan penjajahan Eropah bermula pada abad ke-15, ketika penjelajah Portugis, Vasco da Gama menemukan Laluan Tanjung dari Eropah ke India.
mt: The East African islands are located in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and continent itself when it was alive. Most of the small islands are independent countries, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. Arab influence and colonization began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Terdapat satu tradisi untuk berjaga pada malam Paskah di sesuatu tempat terbuka yang membolehkan anda melihat matahari terbit. Sudah tentu ada penjelasan teologikal Kristian untuk tradisi ini, tetapi ada kemungkinan ia adalah adat Musim Bunga dan Kesuburan pra-Kristian. Gereja yang lebih tradisional sering mengadakan Malam Paskah pada malam Sabtu pada hujung minggu Easter, dengan para penganut yang bersorak tepat jam dua belas tengah malam untuk meraikan kebangkitan Kristus.
mt: There is a tradition of keeping vigil on Easter morning at some open place that allows you to see the sunrise. Of course there are Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it is possible that it is a Spring and Fertility pre-Christian custom. More traditional churches often hold Easter Vigil on Saturday night at the end of the Easter weekend, with the faithful shouting in celebration at exactly twelve o'clock midnight to celebrate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuador memerlukan rakyat Cuba menerima surat jemputan sebelum memasuki Ecuador melalui lapangan terbang antarabangsa atau tempat-tempat masuk di sempadan. Surat ini harus disahkan oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri Ekuador, dan memenuhi beberapa syarat. Keperluan ini direka untuk memberi aliran migrasi yang teratur di antara kedua-dua negara. Rakyat Cuba yang merupakan pemegang kad hijau Amerika Syarikat harus mengunjungi Konsulat Ekuador untuk mendapatkan pengecualian kepada syarat ini. Pasport anda harus sah untuk paling kurang 6 bulan selepas tarikh perjalanan anda. Tiket pergi balik/sehala diperlukan untuk membuktikan tempoh percutian anda.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to receive an invitation letter before entering Ecuador through international airports or entry points at the border. This letter must be certified by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and meet certain requirements. This requirement is designed to provide orderly migration between the two countries. Cuban citizens who are holders of the U.S. green card must visit the Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to these requirements. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the date of your travel. Round-trip tickets are required to prove the length of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Kaca mata mungkin lebih murah di negara asing, terutamanya di negara berpendapatan rendah yang mana kos buruh adalah lebih rendah. Pertimbangkan untuk menjalani pemeriksaan mata di rumah, terutamanya jika insurans anda meliputinya dan membawa bersama preskripsi untuk difailkan di tempat lain. Nama-jenama eksklusif tersedia merangkap dalam kawasan sedemikian boleh ada dua masalah; sebahagian boleh jadi menguntungkan, dan yang betul import boleh jadi mahal dari di rumah.
mt: Glasses may be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. Consider having an eye exam at home, especially if your insurance covers it and bring along a prescription to be filed elsewhere. Exclusive brands available in such areas can be a problem; some may be advantageous, and the right import may be expensive from home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Mata wang rasmi Falklands adalah pound Falkland (FKP) yang nilainya ditetapkan setara dengan satu pound British (GBP). Wang boleh ditukar di satu-satunya bank di kepulauan ini yang terletak di Stanley iaitu seberang kedai FIC West. Pound Britain pada amnya diterima di mana sahaja di kepulauan ini dan di Stanley, kad kredit dan dolar Amerika Syarikat juga biasanya diterima. Di pulau-pulau terpencil kad kredit mungkin tidak dapat diterima, walaupun British dan Amerika Syarikat mata wang boleh diambil; semak dengan pemilik terlebih dahulu untuk menentukan apa kaedah pembayaran yang boleh diterima. Hampir mustahil untuk menukar mata wang Falklands di luar kepulauan tersebut, jadi tukarlah wang sebelum meninggalkan kepulauan tersebut.
mt: The official currency of the Falklands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged to the British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in these islands, which is located in Stanley, across from the FIC West. British pounds are generally accepted anywhere in the islands and in Stanley, credit cards and US dollars are also usually accepted. Credit cards may not be accepted on the outlying islands, although British and US currency can be taken; check with the owner first to determine what payment methods are accepted. It is almost impossible to exchange Falklands money outside the islands, so exchange your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Kebanyakan kuil ada perayaan tahunan mulai hujung bulan November ke pertengahn bulan Mei; yang berbeza mengikut kalendar tahunan kuil masing-masing. Sebahagian besar daripada perayaan-perayaan kuil disambut sebagai sebahagian daripada ulang tahun kuil atau ketua tempat hari jadi dewa atau sebarang peristiwa besar berkaitan dengan kuil. Perayaan kuil di Kerala sangat menarik untuk disaksikan, dengan adanya perarakan gajah-gajah dihias, orkestra kuil dan perayaan lain.
mt: Most temples have annual festivals starting from the end of November to the middle of May; the dates vary according to the temple's own calendar. Most of the temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple's birthday or the head priest's birthday or any major event related to the temple. Temple festivals in Kerala are very interesting to watch, with decorated elephants in procession, temple orchestras and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Cara jelas untuk terbang dalam kelas pertama atau kelas perniagaan adalah dengan mengeluarkan sejumlah besar wang untuk kelebihan ini (atau, lebih baik lagi, mohon syarikat anda untuk membayar tiket anda). Namun begitu, ini bukanlah murah, sebagai panduan kasar, anda boleh menjangka untuk membayar empat kali tambang ekonomi biasa untuk bisnes, dan sebelas kali untuk kelas pertama! Pada amnya, tiada ada gunanya untuk mencari diskaun untuk tempat duduk kelas perniagaan atau kelas satu dalam pernerbangan terus daripada A ke B. Syarikat penerbangan tahu bahawa terdapat golongan pelanggan tertentu yang bersedia untuk membayar jumlah yang banyak untuk keistimewaan yang membawa mereka ke destinasi dengan cepat dan selesa, dan mengenakan harga yang setimpal.
mt: A clear way to fly in first class or business class is to spend a large amount of money for this perk (or, better yet, ask your company to pay for your ticket). However, this is not cheap, as a rough guide, you can expect to pay four times the price of an economy ticket for business, and eleven times for first class! In general, there is no point in looking for discounts for business class or first class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know that there is a certain class of customers willing to pay a lot for the perks that bring them to their destination quickly and comfortably, and charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Syarikat penerbangan seperti Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines telah mengembangkan perkhidmatan mereka ke Afrika, dan menyediakan sambungan penerbangan ke banyak bandar-bandar besar di Afrika dengan harga yang berpatutan berbanding dengan syarikat penerbangan Eropah yang lain. Turkish Airlines menawarkan penerbangan ke 39 destinasi di 30 negara Afrika setakat tahun 2014. Teluk yang bagaikan syurga ini mempunyai lebih daripada 2,000 pulau yang diliputi hutan dengan gua yang menarik, groto, lubang benam dan tasik. Jangan lupa untuk menambahkan kos ekstra bagi visa tambahan, cukai pelepasan, pengangkutan darat dan lain-lain untuk semua tempat di luar Afrika.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have expanded their services to Africa, and provide connections to many major cities in Africa at affordable prices compared to other European airlines. The Turkish Airlines offers flights to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. This bay like a paradise has more than 2,000 islands covered with forests with caves, grotto, sinkholes and lakes. Don't forget to add extra costs for additional visas, exit taxes, ground transportation and others for all places outside Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Membeli makanan di pasaraya biasanya merupakan cara termurah untuk makan. Tanpa kesempatan memasak, pilihan dibataskan ke makanan siap saji. Pasaraya semakin penuh dengan bahagian beraneka makanan siap. Ada juga yang menyediakan ketuhar gelombang mikro atau cara lain untuk memanaskan makanan. Dalam sesetengah negara atau jenis-jenis kedai ada sekurang-kurangnya satu restoran setempat, selalunya yang kurang formal dengan harga mampu milik.
mt: Buying food at the supermarket is usually the cheapest way to eat. Without the opportunity to cook, choices are limited to prepared foods. Supermarkets are increasingly full of ready-made food. Some also provide microwave ovens or other ways to heat food. In some countries or types of store there is at least one local restaurant, usually less formal with affordable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Jenis Bahasa Perancis yang dituturkan di Belgium dan Switzerland sedikit berbeza daripada Bahasa Perancis yang dituturkan di Perancis, walaupun mereka cukup serupa sehingga dapat difahami bersama. Secara khusus, sistem nombor di Belgium dan Switzerland yang bertutur dalam bahasa Perancis mempunyai sedikit keunikan yang berbeza daripada bahasa Perancis yang ditutur di Perancis, dan sebutan beberapa perkataan sedikit berbeza. Walaupun begitu semua Belgia yang bertutur bahasa Perancis akan telah belajar bahasa Peransis standard di sekolah, oleh itu mereka boleh memahami anda walaupun anda menggunakan sistem penomboran standard Perancis.
mt: The French language spoken in Belgium and Switzerland is slightly different from the French language spoken in France, although they are close enough to be understood together. Specifically, the number system in Belgium and Switzerland that speak French has a few quirks that are different from the French language spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. However, all Belgians who speak French will have learned standard French in school, so they can understand you even if you use the standard French number system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Hanya beberapa syarikat penerbangan masih menawarkan tambang perkabungan, ia dapat membantu mengurangkan kos perjalanan pengebumian pada saat-saat terakhir. Syarikat penerbangan yang menawarkan ini termasuk Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa untuk penerbangan yang bermula dari A.S. atau Kanada, dan WestJet. Dalam semua kes, anda mesti menempah melalui telefon secara terus dengan syarikat penerbangan itu.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, it can help reduce funeral travel costs at the last minute. Airlines offering this include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book directly with the airline over the phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Menggunakan aplikasi navigasi GPS pada telefon pintar anda ialah cara yang paling mudah dan senang untuk menavigasi apabila anda keluar dari negara asal anda. Ia boleh menjimatkan wang lebih semasa membeli peta baharu untuk GPS, atau GPS peranti yang berdiri sendiri atau menyewa salah satu daripada syarikat kereta sewa. Sekiranya anda tidak mempunyai sambungan data, atau di luar kawasan perkhidmatan, pencapaiannya akan terhad atau tidak tersedia.
mt: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone is the easiest and cheapest way to navigate when you are out of your home country. It can save money on buying new maps for GPS, or GPS stand-alone devices or renting one of the car rental companies. If you don't have data connection, or out of service area, its performance will be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Melihat tapak dan hidupan liar Galapagos menarik dilakukan dengan menaiki bot, seperti yang dilakukan oleh Charles Darwin pada tahun 1835. Terdapat lebih daripada 60 buah kapal pelayaran yang berada di perairan Galapagos - bersaiz dari 8 hingga 100 penumpang. Kebanyakan orang menempah lebih awal tempat mereka (kerana perahu-perahu itu selalunya penuh semasa musim bermuncak). Pastikan ejen yang anda buat tempahan dengannya adalah pakar Galapagos yang berpengetahuan tentang pelbagai jenis kapal. Ini akan memastikan bahawa minat khas anda dan/atau kekangan akan dipadankan dengan kapal yang paling sesuai untuknya.
mt: To see the islands and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, as was done by Charles Darwin in 1835. There are more than 60 vessels in the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book in advance with their agent (as the boats are usually full during peak season). Make sure that the agent you book with is a Galapagos expert who knows about the different types of boats. This will ensure that your specific interests and/or limitations will be matched with the boat that is most suitable for you.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasino biasanya membuat usaha besar untuk memaksimumkan masa dan wang yang dibelanjakan oleh tetamu. Tingkap dan jam biasanya selalu tidak ada dan pintu keluar boleh jadi sukar dicari. Mereka biasnya mempunyai makanan istemewa, minuman dan tawaran hiburan, untuk memastikan tetamu berada dalam mood yang baik dan mengekalkan mereka di premis. Beberapa tempat menawarkan minuman beralkohol di rumah. Namun, mabuk boleh merosakkan pertimbangan, dan semua kaki judi yang waras tahu betapa pentingnya tidak terjejas oleh alkohol.
mt: Casinos usually make a big effort to maximize the time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually always absent and exit doors can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drinks and entertainment offerings, to ensure guests are in a good mood and keep them on the premises. Some places offer drinks at home. However, getting drunk can impair judgment, and all wise gamblers know how important it is not to be affected by alcohol.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Semua kata benda, di samping kata Sie untuk anda, selalu dimulakan dengan huruf besar, walaupun di tengah-tengah ayat. Perkara ini ialah satu cara penting untuk membezakan antara beberapa kata kerja dan objek. Boleh dihujah bahawa ia memudahkan proses membaca, walaupun penulisan dirumitkan dengan perlunya mengetahui sama ada sebuah kata kerja atau adjektif sedang digunakan sebagai kata nama.
mt: All nouns, including the word Sie for you, always start with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It can be argued that it simplifies the reading process, although writing is complicated by the need to know whether a verb or adjective is being used as a noun.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: Dalam banyak tempat di dunia, melambai adalah gerak isyarat persahabatan, menunjukkan “helo.” Namun, di Malaysia, sekurang-kurangnya antara orang Melayu di kawasan luar bandar, ia bermaksud “jemput datang” serupa dengan jari telunjuk yang membengkok ke arah badan, isyarat yang digunakan di negara-negara Barat tertentu, dan sepatutnya digunakan untuk tujuan berkenaan sahaja. Begitu juga, seorang pelancong Inggeris di Sepanyol mungkin tersalah anggap lambaian selamat tinggal yang mana telapak tangan menghadap ke arah pelambai (daripada menghadap orang yang dilambai) sebagai isyarat untuk kembali.
mt: In many places around the world, waving is a friendly gesture, meaning “hello.” However, in Malaysia, at least among rural Malays, it means “come here” similar to the bent index finger toward the body, a gesture used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Likewise, an English tourist in Spain might misinterpret a farewell wave where the palm of the hand faces the waver (instead of facing the person being waved at) as a signal to return.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Glasier tersebut tidak stabil, tetapi mengalir turun dari pergunungan. Ini akan menyebabkan retak, celah berlubang, yang mungkin ditutup oleh jambatan salji. Dinding dan bumbung gua ais boleh runtuh dan retakan boleh terjadi. Di pinggir glasier bongkah besar boleh terpisah, tumbang dan mungkin melantun atau berguling lebih jauh dari pinggir.
mt: The glacier is not stable, but flows down from the mountains. This will cause crevasses, cracks, which may be covered by snow bridges. Walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can occur. At the edge of the glacier large blocks can separate, topple and may slide or roll further away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma merupakan bandar pelancong di Republik Demokratik Congo di timur jauh berdekatan dengan Rwanda. Pada tahun 2002 Goma dimusnahkan oleh lava dari gunung berapi Nyiragongo yang menimbus sebahagian besar jalan-jalan di bandar, terutamanya pusat bandar. Walaupun Goma agak selamat, sebarang kunjungan di luar Goma harus dikaji untuk memahami keadaan perperangan yang berterusan di wilayah Kivu Utara. Kota ini juga merupakan tapak untuk mendaki gunung berapi Nyiragongo bersama beberapa dari penjejakan Gunung Gorila yang termurah di Afrika. Anda boleh menggunakan boda-boda (teksi motosikal) untuk menjelajahi Goma. Harga biasa (tempatan) adalah ~500 Franc Congo untuk perjalanan pendek itu.
mt: Goma is a tourist town in the Democratic Republic of the Congo in the far east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried much of the city's roads, especially the city center. Although Goma is relatively safe, any travel outside of Goma should be assessed for the ongoing conflict in the North Kivu region. This city is also the base for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano and some of the cheapest gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-bodas (motorcycle taxis) to explore Goma. The local price is ~500 Congolese francs for short trips.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Sebarang perkhemahan di bawah lereng Grand Canyon memerlukan permit pedalaman. Permit adalah terhad untuk melindungi gaung dan boleh didapatkan pada hari pertama bagi bulan tersebut, empat bulan sebelum bulan permulaan, Oleh itu, permit daerah pendalaman untuk mana-mana tarikh mula pada bulan Mei akan tersedia pada 1 Januari. Ruang untuk kawasan-kawasan terkenal, seperti Bright Angel Campground yang terletak bersebelahan dengan Phantom Ranch, lazimnya ditempah sepenuhnya pada hari pertama tempahan dibuka. Terdapat sebilangan besar permit yang disediakan untuk permintaan masuk yang tersedia atas dasar kedatangan pertama.
mt: Any camping below the rim of the Grand Canyon requires backcountry permits. Permits are limited to protect the canyon and can be obtained on the first day of the month, four months before the month's start, so backcountry permits for any start date in May will be available on January 1. Areas for popular areas, such as Bright Angel Campground located adjacent to Phantom Ranch, are typically booked solid on the first day reservations are opened. There are a number of permits available for first-come, first-served entries.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Hotel tertentu mempunyai warisan dari zaman emas kereta api wap dan kapal laut; sebelum Perang Dunia Kedua, pada abad ke-19 atau awal abad ke-20. Hotel-hotel ini ialah tempat tinggal orang-orang kaya dan terkenal dan sering menjamu selera dan hiburan malam. Kelengkapan fesyen lama, kekurangan kemudahan terkini dan usia yang anggun tertentu juga merupakan sebahagian daripada watak mereka. Walaupun ia milik persendirian, namun ada kalanya ia ditawarkan kepada ketua negeri dan orang kenamaan yang lain. Pengembara dengan timbunan wang boleh mempertimbangkan pusingan penerbangan dunia, dipecahkan dengan penginapan di kebanyakan hotel.
mt: Certain hotels have a legacy from the age of steam trains and ocean liners; before World War II, in the 19th or early 20th century. These hotels are the homes of the rich and famous and often entertained the palate and nightlife. Old fashion accessories, lack of modern amenities and a certain age are also part of their character. Although it is privately owned, it is sometimes offered to state leaders and other celebrities. Adventurers with a fortune can consider a world tour, broken up by stays in many hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Oleh kerana pautan kabel gentian optik bawah laut yang bersambung ke Eropah dan siaran satelit jalur lebar, Greenland terhubung baik dengan 93% dari populasi mempunyai akses Internet. Hotel atau hos anda ini (jika tinggal di sebuah rumah tamu atau rumah swasta) mungkin akan mempunyai wifi atau PC yang bersambung ke internet anda, dan semua penempatan mempunyai kafe internet atau beberapa lokasi dengan wifi awam. Seperti yang dinyatakan di atas, walaupun perkataan “Eskimo” masih boleh diterima di Amerika Syarikat, ia dianggap penindasannya oleh ramai orang bukan AS. Rakyat Arctic khususnya di Kanada. Walaupun anda mungkin akan dengar perkataan yang digunakan oleh orang asli Greenland, ia perlu dielakkan oleh orang asing. Penduduk asli Greenland menggelar diri sebagai Inuit di Kanada dan Kalaalleq (jamak Kalaallit), warga Greenland di Greenland. Pada umumnya, jenayah, dan niat jahat terhadap orang asing hampir tidak diketahui di Greenland. Walaupun di bandar, tidak terdapat “kawasan berbahaya.” Cuaca yang sejuk mungkin satu-satunya bahaya sebenar mereka yang tidak bersedia akan hadapi. Jika anda mengunjungi Greenland pada musim sejuk (dengan pertimbangkan bahawa semakin utara perjalanan anda, semakin sejuk cuacanya), adalah penting untuk membawa pakaian sejuk yang cukup hangat. Hari-hari yang sangat panjang pada musim panas boleh menyebabkan masalah untuk mendapatkan tidur yang mencukupi dan masalah kesihatan yang bekaitan. Semasa musim panas, berhati-hati dengan nyamuk Nordic. Walaupun nyamuk ini tidak menyebarkan penyakit, tetapi ia menyakitkan.
mt: Because of the undersea fiber optic cable link to Europe and satellite broadband, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having access to the Internet. Your host or hotel here (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) may have wifi or a computer connected to the internet, and all locations have internet cafes or some public wifi locations. As mentioned above, although the word “Eskimo” is still acceptable in the United States, it is considered offensive by many non-Americans, especially the indigenous people of the Arctic. While you may hear the word used by the native Greenlanders, it should be avoided by outsiders. The indigenous people of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), the people of Greenland. Generally, crime, and ill intent against foreigners is almost unknown in Greenland. Even in the cities, there are no “dangerous areas.” The cold weather may be the only real danger they face that you are not prepared for. If you are visiting Greenland in the winter (considering that the further north your journey takes you, the colder the weather gets), it is important to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can cause problems getting enough sleep and health problems related to it. In the summer, be careful of Nordic mosquitoes. While these mosquitoes do not carry disease, they are painful.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

Walaupun di bandar, tidak terdapat “kawasan berbahaya.” Cuaca yang sejuk mungkin satu-satunya bahaya sebenar mereka yang tidak bersedia akan hadapi. Jika anda mengunjungi Greenland pada musim sejuk (dengan pertimbangkan bahawa semakin utara perjalanan anda, semakin sejuk cuacanya), adalah penting untuk membawa pakaian sejuk yang cukup hangat. Hari-hari yang sangat panjang pada musim panas boleh menyebabkan masalah untuk mendapatkan tidur yang mencukupi dan masalah kesihatan yang bekaitan. Semasa musim panas, berhati-hati dengan nyamuk Nordic. Walaupun nyamuk ini tidak menyebarkan penyakit, tetapi ia menyakitkan.
mt: Because of the undersea fiber optic cable link to Europe and satellite broadband, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having access to the Internet. Your host or hotel here (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) may have wifi or a computer connected to the internet, and all locations have internet cafes or some public wifi locations. As mentioned above, although the word “Eskimo” is still acceptable in the United States, it is considered offensive by many non-Americans, especially the indigenous people of the Arctic. While you may hear the word used by the native Greenlanders, it should be avoided by outsiders. The indigenous people of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), the people of Greenland. Generally, crime, and ill intent against foreigners is almost unknown in Greenland. Even in the cities, there are no “dangerous areas.” The cold weather may be the only real danger they face that you are not prepared for. If you are visiting Greenland in the winter (considering that the further north your journey takes you, the colder the weather gets), it is important to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can cause problems getting enough sleep and health problems related to it. In the summer, be careful of Nordic mosquitoes. While these mosquitoes do not carry disease, they are painful.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Ruang ini dibina sebagai atrium untuk biara abad pada ke-17, yang mana Templo de San Diego ialah satu-satunya bangunan yang masih berdiri. Kini berfungsi sebagai plaza pusat dan selalu mempunyai banyak perkara yang berlaku siang dan malam. Terdapat sebilangan restoran di sekitar taman, dan pada waktu petang dan malam konsert percuma sering diadakan di gazebo utama. Callejon del Beso (Lorong Ciuman). Dua balkoni yang terpisah hanya dengan 69 sentimeter merupakan tempat kediaman lagenda cinta terdahulu. Beberapa kanak-kanak akan menceritakan kisah itu kepada anda untuk harga beberapa syiling.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. This area was built as an atrium for a 17th century abbey, of which the Temple of San Diego is the only remaining building. It now functions as a central plaza and is always full of activity day and night. There are a number of restaurants around the garden, and in the evenings and at night free concerts are often held in the main gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Lipkiss Alley). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters were the homes of a famous couple of lovers. Some children will tell you the story for a few coins.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Mengembara ialah aktiviti luar yang terdiri daripada berjalan di persekitaran semulajadi, biasanya di laluan mendaki. Mendaki waktu siang melibatkan jarak yang kurang daripada sebatu sehingga jarak yang lebih jauh yang boleh diliputi dalam satu hari. Bagi pendakian balik hari dengan laluan yang mudah, sedikit persiapan diperlukan, dan sesiapa yang agak cergas boleh menikmatinya. Keluarga dengan kanak-kanak kecil mungkin memerlukan lebih banyak persediaan, tetapi di luar rumah mungkin mudah walaupun dengan bayi dan prasekolah kanak-kanak.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity involving walking in the countryside, usually in a natural environment. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile to distances of more than a mile that can be covered in a day. For a day hike with a relatively easy trail, little preparation is needed, and anyone in reasonably good health can enjoy it. Families with young children may require more preparation, but hiking outside the home can be easy even with babies and preschool children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Fjord dan lembah curam yang tiba-tiba berubah menjadi dataran tinggi yang hampir rata adalah biasa di Norway. Ini dataran tinggi yang sering dirujuk sebagai “vidde” yang bermaksud ruang tanpa pohon yang luas;, luas terbatas. Di Rogaland dan Agder mereka biasanya dipanggil “hei” yang bermaksud tanah rumput tanpa pohon yang sering dilitupi dengan heather.
mt: Fjords and steep valleys suddenly change into high plateaus that are almost flat are common in Norway. These plateaus are often referred to as “vidde” which means open space; open areas with limited trees. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called “hei” which means grassland without trees that are often covered with heather.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Musim pelancongan bagi stesen bukit mencapai puncak secara umum pada musim panas di India. Walau bagaimanapun, mereka mempunyai pelbagai jenis keindahan dan daya tarikan semasa musim sejuk, dengan banyak stesen bukit menerima jumlah yang sihat salji dan menawarkan aktiviti seperti bermain ski dan snowboarding.
mt: The tourist season for hill stations reaches its peak in general during the summer in India. However, they have various kinds of beauty and attractions during the winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy snowfall and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Percayalah bahawa apabila anda memukul marina segala-galanya akan menjadi agak jelas. Anda akan berjumpa dengan pengangkut kapal lain dan mereka akan berkongsi maklumat mereka dengan anda. Pada asasnya, anda akan meletakkan notis untuk menawarkan bantuan, berulang-alik di pelabuhan, mendekati pemilik yang sedang mencuci perahu layar, cuba bertegur sapa dengan pelaut di bar, dsb. Cubalah untuk bercakap dengan sebanyak orang mungkin. Selepas beberapa ketika semua orang akan mengenali anda dan memberi anda petunjuk tentang kapal mana sedang mencari seseorang.
mt: Believe it or not, when you hit the marina everything will become quite clear. You will meet other boat owners and they will share their information with you. Basically, you will put up a notice offering help, go back and forth at the dock, approach sailboat owners who are washing their boats, try to talk to sailors at the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will recognize you and give you pointers about which boat is looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Pulau Hong Kong memberikan wilayah Hong Kong namanya dan merupakan tempat yang dianggap sebagai fokus utama oleh banyak pelancong. Barisan bangunan yang menghias latar langit Hong Kong disamakan dengan carta palang berkilauan yang semakin terselah dengan pantulan perairan Victoria Harbour. Untuk mendapatkan pemandangan Hong Kong yang terbaik, tinggalkan pulau tersebut dan hala ke arah tepi pantai Kowloon yang bertentangan. Majoriti pembangunan bandar di kepulauan Hong Kong ialah padat di atas tanah yang ditambak sepanjang pantai utara. Ini ialah tempat yang diambil oleh penjajah Inggeris sebagai milik mereka dan sekiranya anda mencari bukti sejarah penjajahan wilayah ini, ini merupakan tempat yang bagus untuk bermula.
mt: Hong Kong Island gives Hong Kong its name and is considered the main focus by many tourists. The line of buildings that grace Hong Kong's skyline is matched by the glittering chart of the Star Ferry that reflects off the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best view of Hong Kong, leave the island and head towards the opposite shore of Kowloon. Most of the city's development is packed onto reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is where the British took possession of the territory and if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial history, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Rakap adalah alat sokongan untuk kaki penunggang yang tergantung di kedua-dua sisi pelana. Ia memberikan lebih kestabilan untuk penunggang namun terdapat risiko keselamatan disebabkan potensi untuk kaki penunggang tersangkut. Jika seorang penunggang dilempar dari kuda tetapi kakinya tersekat pada rakap, dia akan diseret sekiranya kuda tersebut melarikan diri. Untuk mengurangkan risiko ini, beberapa langkah keselamatan dapat diambil. Pertama, kebanyakan penunggang memakai kasut but dengan tumit dan tapak yang rata dan agak sempit. Seterusnya, beberapa pelana, terutamanya pelana Inggeris, mempunyai bar keselamatan yang membenarkan pemijak kaki kulit menjatuhkan pelana jika ditarik ke belakang oleh penunggang.
mt: A stirrup is a support for the rider's feet that hangs on both sides of the saddle. It provides greater stability for the rider but there is a safety risk due to the potential for the rider's feet to get caught. If a rider is thrown from a horse but their feet are caught on the stirrup, they will be dragged if the horse takes off. To reduce this risk, most riders wear boots with flat and relatively narrow heels and soles. Secondly, some saddles, especially English saddles, have a safety bar that allows the rider to dismount the saddle if pulled backwards by the rider.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Sebuah rangkaian pertukaran hospitaliti merupakan organisasi yang menghubungkan pelancong dengan orang tempatan di bandar yang mereka bakal kunjungi. Menyertai rangkaian seperti ini biasanya memerlukan pengisian borang dalam talian, namun beberapa rangkaian menawarkan atau meminta pengesahan tambahan. Senarai tuan rumah yang tersedia kemudiannya akan diberikan sama ada dalam bentuk cetak dan/atau dalam talian, kadangkala dengan rujukan dan ulasan oleh pelancong lain. Couchsurfing ditubuhkan pada Januari 2004 apabila seorang pengaturcara komputer bernama Casey Fenton telah menjumpai penerbangan murah ke Iceland tetapi tidak mempunyai tempat untuk tinggal. Beliau menghantar e-mel kepada pelajar di universiti tempatan dan menerima begitu banyak tawaran untuk tempat tinggal percuma.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with locals in the city they are about to visit. Joining such a network usually requires filling out an online form, but some networks offer or request additional verification. A list of hosts available will then be provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 when a computer programmer named Casey Fenton found cheap flights to Iceland but had nowhere to stay. He sent an email to students at the local university and received so many offers of free lodging.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
