src: Sundarbans merupakan hutan paya bakau litoral yang terbesar di dunia dengan keluasan 80 km (50 batu) yang bermula dari pesisiran pantai hingga jauh ke pedalaman Bangladesh dan India. Sundarbans telah diisytiharkan sebagai Tapak Warisan Dunia UNESCO. Bahagian hutan dalam lingkungan kawasan India dipanggil Taman Negara Sundarbans. Hutan bukan hanya pokok bakau - ianya termasuk beberapa tempat terakhir dari hutan rimba yang terbuang meliputi dataran Gangetic. Sundarbans meliputi kawasan 3,850 km²,<sup> </sup>di mana satu pertiga diliputi oleh air/kawasan paya. Sejak tahun 1966 Sundarbans merupakan tempat perlindungan hidupan liar dan kini dianggarkan sebanyak 400 ekor harimau Royal Bengal dan 30,000 ekor rusa berbintik hidup di kawasan itu.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest littoral mangrove forest in the world with an area of 80 km (50 mi) that begins from the coastline to deep into the Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans has been declared as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within the Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forest is not only mangrove trees - it also includes some of the last remaining forest cover of the Gangetic plains. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km²,<sup> </sup>of which one third is covered by water/swamp. Since 1966 Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary and now estimated to have 400 Royal Bengal tigers and 30,000 spotted deer living in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Terdapat lebih daripada 5,000 bahasa yang berbeza di dunia ini, termasuk lebih daripada dua puluh bahasa dengan 50 juta atau lebih pentutur. Perkataan yang tertulis lebih mudah difahami daripada kata-kata yang diucapkan. Ini terutama benar untuk alamat, yang sering kali sukar untuk disebut dengan jelas. Banyak negara petah dalam bahasa Inggeris, dan dalam lebih banyak negara anda boleh menjangkakan pengetahuan yang berbatas - terutamanya dalam khalayak orang muda. Bayangkan, jika anda mahu, orang dari Mancun, Boston, Jamaica dan Sydney duduk semeja untuk menikmati makan malam di sebuah restoran di Toronto. Mereka menghiburkan satu sama lain dengan cerita dari kampung halaman mereka yang diceritakan dalam loghat khusus dan slanga tempatan mereka.
mt: There are more than 5,000 different languages in the world, including more than twenty languages with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true for addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce clearly. Many countries are familiar in English, and in more countries you can expect limited knowledge - especially among young people. Imagine, if you will, people from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica and Sydney sitting around a table to enjoy dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They amuse each other with stories from their hometowns told in their own special dialect and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Bas bertolak dari stesen bas dalam daerah (di seberang sungai) sepanjang hari, walaupun kebanyakannya terutama yang berhala ke timur dan Jakar/Bumthang bertolak antara pukul 06.30 dan 07.30. Oleh sebab bas antara daerah sentiasa penuh, adalah dinasihatkan untuk membeli tiket beberapa hari lebih awal. Kebanyakan daerah mempunyai perkhidmatan Bas Pesisiran Pantai Jepun, yang selesa dan kukuh. Berkongsi teksi cara yang cepat dan selesa untuk perjalanan ke tempat berdekatan seperti Paro (Nu 150) dan Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Buses leave from the bus station in the district (across the river) throughout the day, although most are primarily those heading east and Jakar/Bumthang depart between 06.30 and 07.30. Since buses between districts are always full, it is recommended to buy tickets a few days in advance. Most districts have a Japanese Coastal Bus service, which is comfortable and reliable. Sharing a taxi is a quick and comfortable way to travel to nearby places such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Digabungkan dengan lokasinya yang sukar diakses, “Timbuktu” telah menjadi sebuah metafora untuk tanah yang eksotik dan jauh. Pada hari ini, Timbuktu merupakan bandar yang miskin, namun reputasinya membuat ia menjadi tarikan pelancong, dan ia mempunyai lapangan terbang. Pada tahun 1990, ia telah ditambah kepada senarai tapak warisan dunia yang diancam bahaya, disebabkan ancaman padang pasir. Ini adalah salah satu hentian utama semasa rancangan khas PBS Henry Louis Gates “Wonders of the African World”. Bandar raya ini berbeza dari bandar raya yang lain di negara ini, kerana ia mempunyai lebih gaya Arab daripada Afrika.
mt: Combined with its remote location, “Timbuktu” has become a metaphor for exotic and faraway lands. Today, Timbuktu is a poor town, but its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of threatened World Heritage Sites, due to desertification. It is one of the main stops on the PBS special “Wonders of the African World”. This town is different from other towns in the country, because it has more of an Arab style than an African one.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralimpik akan berlangsung dari 24hb Ogos hingga 5hb September 2021. Sebilangan acara akan diadakan di lokasi lain di seluruh Jepun. Tokyo akan menjadi satu-satunya bandar Asia untuk menjadi tuan rumah Olimpik musim panas dua kali, setelah pernah menjadi tuan rumah pada tahun 1964. Jika anda menempah penerbangan dan penginapan anda pada 2020 sebelum penangguhan diumumkan, anda mungkin menghadapi situasi yang sukar. Polisi pembatalan berbeza-beza, tetapi pada akhir bulan Mac kebanyakan dasar pembatalan berasaskan korfonavirus tidak berlaku sehingga Julai 2020 ketika Olimpik telah dijadualkan. Adalah dijangka tiket peristiwa sebahagian besar akan berharga di antara ¥2,500 dan ¥130,000, dengan biasa tiket berharga sekitar ¥7,000.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held at other locations across Japan. Tokyo will be the first Asian city to host the Summer Olympics twice, having previously hosted in 1964. If you booked your flight and accommodation in 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may be in a difficult situation. Cancellation policies vary, but by the end of March most coronavirus-related cancellation policies were not in effect until July 2020 when the Olympics were scheduled. It is expected that most event tickets will be priced between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with most tickets costing around ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Angin puting beliung adalah pusingan tiang dari udara yang sangat rendah tekanan, di mana penyedut udara sekeliling ke dalam dan keluar. Mereka menjana angin kencang (sering 100-200 batu/jam) dan boleh mengangkat objek berat ke udara, membawa mereka sebagai bergerak puting beliung. Mereka mula sebagai corong turun daripada awan ribut dan menjadi “tornado” apabila menyentuh tanah.
mt: A tornado is a violently rotating column of air that is in contact with both the surface below and the cloud above. They are often (though not always) visible as a funnel-shaped cloud stretching from the base of a cumulonimbus cloud down to the ground, and can be accompanied by a roaring noise similar to that of a train or airplane. Tornadoes come in many sizes but typically eat up to 1 mile (1.6 km) in diameter, though smaller and stronger ones with diameters less than 50 yards (46 m) are also possible. They usually last less than an hour and are usually associated with thunderstorms and have winds of up to 250 miles per hour (400 km/h). Tornadoes have been reported in every state in the United States, although they are most common in the Midwest and Southeast during spring and summer. Tornadoes are also common in the United Kingdom, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, France, India, Japan, New Zealand, and Pakistan.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Sekiranya negara yang anda akan lawati menjadi subjek kepada penasihat perjalanan, insurans kesihatan perjalanan anda atau pembatalan perjalanan anda mungkin terjejas. Anda juga mungkin ingin berunding dengan nasihat kerajaan lain daripada anda sendiri, tetapi nasihat mereka dirancang untuk rakyat mereka. Contohnya, warga Amerika di Timur Tengah mungkin menghadapi situasi yang berbeza daripada warga Eropah atau orang Arab. Pengumuman rasmi hanyalah ringkasan pendek mengenai situasi politik di sesebuah negara. Pandangan yang dibentangkan biasanya sepintas lalu, secara am dan terlampau ringkas berbanding dengan maklumat yang ada di tempat lain.
mt: If the country you are visiting becomes the subject of a travel warning, your travel health insurance or trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also want to consult with other government advice besides your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. For example, Americans in the Middle East may face different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Official announcements are only brief summaries of the political situation in a country. Opinions presented are usually superficial, generally, and overly brief compared to information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Agensi pelancongan telah bertapak sejak abad ke-19. Ejen pelancongan biasanya merupakan pilihan yang baik untuk perjalanan yang melangkaui pengalaman terdahulu pelancong ke tempat semula jadi, budaya, bahasa atau negara-negara berpendapatan rendah. Walaupun kebanyakan agensi bersedia untuk mengambil tempahan biasa, banyak ejen yang pakar dalam pengkhususan jenis pelancongan, anggaran perbelanjaan atau destinasi. Ia mungkin lebih baik untuk menggunakan ejen yang sentiasa membuat penempahan yang serupa dengan perjalanan anda. Lihat jenis perjalanan yang dipromosi ejen tersebut, sama ada pada laman web atau jendela kedai.
mt: Tourism agencies have been in place since the 19th century. Travel agents are usually a good choice for travel that exceeds the previous traveler's experience to natural, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take regular bookings, many agents specialize in the type of travel, budget or destination. It may be better to use agents who are always making bookings similar to your trip. See the types of travel promoted by the agent, whether on the web or shop window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Terdapat banyak perkara yang perlu diambil kira sebelum dan semasa anda melancong ke suatu tempat. Apabila anda melancong, jangan harapkan barang akan seperti keadaan “di rumah”. Adab, undang-undang, makanan, lalu lintas, penginapan, standard, bahasa dan sebagainya akan ke sesuatu tahap berbeza dengan tempat tinggal asal anda. Ini adalah sesuatu yang anda sentiasa perlu ingat, untuk mengelakkan kekecewaan atau mungkin rasa tidak senang dengan cara orang tempatan melakukan sesuatu.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during your trip to a place. When you travel, don't expect things to be like the "home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, accommodation, standards, language and so on will be at some level different from your home. This is something you always need to remember, to avoid disappointment or perhaps feel uncomfortable with the way the locals do something.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Sekiranya anda melancong ke negara yang membangun untuk pertama kali – atau di pelosok dunia yang baru – jangan memandang rendah kemungkinan kejutan budaya. Ramai pengembara yang stabil dan berkebolehan telah ditewaskan oleh pengembaraan dunia membangun yang baharu, di mana banyak penyesuaian budaya yang kecil boleh berkumpul menjadi banyak. Terutama pada hari-hari pertama, pertimbangkan untuk berbelanja lebih untuk hotel, makanan dan perkhidmatan gaya Barat yang berkualiti untuk membantu anda menyesuaikan diri. Jangan tidur di atas tilam atau alas di atas tanah, di kawasan yang anda tidakkenal akan fauna tempatan. Jika anda ingin berkhemah, bawa katil kem atau buaian gantung untuk menjauhkan diri daripada ular, kala jengking dan sebagainya.
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country for the first time – or to the backwoods of the world – don't underestimate the possibility of culture shock. Many seasoned and capable travelers have been undone by the developing world, where many small cultural adjustments can add up to a lot. Especially on the first day, consider spending more for hotels, food, and Western-style services that are of good quality to help you adjust. Don't sleep on a bed or mat on the ground, in areas you're unfamiliar with local fauna. If you want to camp, bring a camping cot or hammock to keep away from snakes, scorpions, and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Membuat dan membawa salinan polisi anda dan butir-butir syarikat insurans dengan anda. Mereka perlu menunjukkan alamat e-mel penanggung insuran dan nombor telefon antarabangsa untuk nasihat/kebenaran dan membuat tuntutan. Adakan satu salinan lagi di dalam bagasi anda dan atas talian (emel kepada anda sendiri dengan dikepilkan bersama, atau disimpan di “awan”). Jika melancong dengan komputer riba atau tablet, simpan salinan dalam memori atau cakeranya (boleh diakses tanpa internet). Berikan juga salinan polisi/kenalan kepada rakan perjalanan dan saudara-mara atau rakan-rakan yang bersedia untuk membantu.
mt: 1. Make and carry copies of your police report and insurance details with you. They need to show the insurance company's email address and international phone number for advice/authorization and to make a claim. Have another copy in your luggage and online (email to yourself with password protected, or saved in "the cloud"). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, save a copy in memory or on a flash drive (can be accessed without internet). Also give copies of your police report/authorization to travel companions and family or friends who are willing to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Terdapat pelbagai format filem yang telah digunakan sejak bertahun-tahun lamanya. Filem standard 35 mm (36 x 24 mm negatif) ialah yang paling biasa digunakan. Ia biasanya boleh diisi semula dengan mudah kalau kehabisan, dan ia memberi kualiti gambar yang setara dengan DSLR sekarang. Beberapa kamera film format sederhana menggunakan format 6 kali 6 sm,dengan lebih tepat negatif 56 kali 56 mm. Ini memberikan resolusi hampir empat kali ganda daripada negatif 35 mm (3136 mm2 lawan 864).
mt: There are many film formats that have been used for years. Standard 35 mm (36 x 24 mm negative) is the most commonly used. It is usually easily reloaded when empty, and it gives image quality equal to DSLR now. Some cameras of the small format film use a format of 6 x 6 sm, with more precisely negative 56 x 56 mm. This gives a resolution almost four times that of the 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 against 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Cara yang paling mudah untuk memulakan bisnes penulisan mengenai pelancongan adalah dengan mengasah kemahiran anda di laman web blog pelancongan yang dikenali. Apabila anda telah selesa dengan pemformatan dan penyuntingan di web, kemudian, anda mungkin membina laman web sendiri.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel writing business is by honing your skills on well-known travel blogs. Once you are comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then, you may build your own site.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Oleh sebab pendedahan berterusan terhadap kuman di persekitaran rumah, kemungkinan besar anda sudah imun terhadapnya. Tetapi di bahagian dunia yang lain, di mana fauna bakteriologi baru kepada anda, anda jauh lebih cenderung untuk menghadapi masalah. Selain itu, di iklim yang lebih panas, bakteria membiak lebih cepat dan bertahan lebih lama di luar badan. Oleh itu, balasan daripada Delhi Belly, Sumpahan Firaun, Revenge Montezuma, dan rakan-rakan mereka yang ramai. Seperti masalah pernafasan di kawasan iklim sejuk, masalah usus di kawasan iklim panas adalah perkara biasa dan dalam kebanyakan kes adalah jelas menggangu tetapi tidak benar-benar berbahaya.
mt: Because of continued exposure to bacteria in the home environment, you are likely to be immune to it. But in other parts of the world, where the fauna is new to you, you are much more likely to have problems. Also, in warmer climates, bacteria grow faster and last longer outside the body. So, the response from Delhi Belly, Pharaoh's Curse, Revenge of Montezuma, and their many friends. Like respiratory problems in cold climates, digestive problems in warm climates are common and in most cases are annoying but not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Eropah ialah benua yang agak kecil tetapi mempunyai banyak negara yang bebas. Di bawah keadaan biasa, mengembara melalui pelbagai negara bermakna perlu melalui aplikasi visa dan kawalan pasport beberapa kali. Namun Zon Schengen, berfungsi agak seperti satu negara dalam hal ini. Selagi anda berada dalam zon ini, secara umumnya anda boleh merentas sempadan tanpa melalui pusat pemeriksaan kawalan pasport sekali lagi. Begitu juga, dengan memiliki visa Schengen, anda tidak perlu memohon visa di setiap negara ahli Schengen secara berasingan, oleh itu ia dapat menjimatkan masa, wang dan dokumen.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent but has many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, traveling through multiple countries means going through visa applications and passport control several times. However, the Schengen Area works somewhat like one country in this regard. As long as you are within this area, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control again. Similarly, with a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa in each Schengen country separately, so it can save time, money, and documents.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Makam Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 mungkin merupakan makam yang paling terkenal di dalam Lembah, tempat terjadinya penemuan Howard Carter pada tahun 1922 yang merupakan perkuburan agung raja muda tersebut yang hampir lengkap sepenuhnya. Kalau dibandingkan dengan kebanyakan makam diraja yang lain, makam Tutankhamun hampir tidak berbaloi untuk dikunjungi, dengan saiz jauh lebih kecil dan hiasan yang terhad. Sesiapa yang berminat untuk melihat bukti kerosakan kepada mumia yang dilakukan semasa usaha untuk mengeluarkannya daripada keranda akan kecewa kerana hanya kepala dan bahu dapat dilihat. Makam mitos terkaya tidak lagi ada di dalamnya, tetapi telah dipindah ke Muzium orang Mesir di Cairo. Para pelawat yang mempunyai masa yang terhad adalah digalakkan menghabiskan masa mereka di tempat lain.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 is probably the most famous tomb in the Valley, where the discovery of Howard Carter in 1922 was the young king's intact tomb. Compared to most other royal tombs, Tutankhamun's tomb is much smaller and less decorated. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of damage to the mummy during efforts to remove it from its sarcophagus will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders can be seen. The richest myth tomb is no longer in it, but has been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time are encouraged to spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Pulau Bowen merupakan lawatan harian atau hujung minggu yang popular menawarkan aktiviti berkayak, mengembara, kedai-kedai, restoran-restoran, dan banyak lagi. Komuniti tulen ini berada di Howe Sound berhampiran dengan Vancouver, dan mudah dicapai dengan teksi air berjadual yang bertolak dari Pulau Granville di pusat bandar Vancouver. Bagi mereka yang suka aktiviti luar rumah, sebuah pengembaraan di koridor Sea to Sky adalah harus. Whistler (perjalanan 1.5 jam dari Vancouver) adalah mahal tetapi terkenal kerana Sukan Olimpik Musim Sejuk tahun 2010. Pada musim sejuk, nikmatilah pengalaman ski terbaik di Amerika Utara dan pada musim panas pula, anda boleh cuba berbasikal gunung.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day or weekend trip offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and much more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound near Vancouver, and is easily accessible by scheduled water taxi from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a Sea to Sky drive is a must. Whistler (a 1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is pricey but famous for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy the best skiing in North America and in the summer, try mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls adalah sebuah bandar di bahagian barat Zimbabwe, melintasi sempadan dari Livingston, Zambia, dan berhampiran dengan Botswana. Bandar tersebut terletak di sebelah air terjun dan itu merupakan tarikan utama, namun destinasi pelancongan yang terkenal ini menawarkan pengembara dan peminat pemandangan banyak peluang untuk tinggal lebih lama. Pada musim hujan (November hingga Mac), isi padu air akan menjadi lebih tinggi dan Air Terjun akan kelihatan lebih dramatik. Anda pasti basah sekiranya anda melintasi jambatan atau berjalan di sepanjang laluan yang berliku-liku berhampiran Air Terjun. Sebaliknya, ia adalah kerana isipadu air adalah begitu tinggi bahawa tontonan anda daripada Air terjun sebenar akan dikaburi oleh semua air!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, straddling the Zambezi River across from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town is situated next to the Victoria Falls themselves, the main tourist attraction, but this well-known destination offers travelers and nature lovers many opportunities to stay longer. During the rainy season (November through March), the water level will be higher and the Falls will look more dramatic. You will get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the winding path near the Falls. Conversely, it is because the water level is so high that your view of the actual Falls will be obscured by all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Peraturan mengenai fotografi biasa juga termasuk untuk merakam video, kemungkinan lebih lagi. Sekiranya mengambil gambar sesuatu adalah tidak dibenarkan maka anda tidak sepatutnya berfikir pun untuk merakam videonya. Jika menggunakan dron, periksa sebaiknya dahulu samada anda boleh membuat penggambaran filem dan apa permit atau lesen tambahan yang diperlukan. Menerbangkan sebuah drone berdekatan dengan lapangan terbang atau di atas orang ramai hampir selalu merupakan cadangan buruk, walaupun tidak melanggar peraturan di kawasan anda.
mt: Rules on photography also include filming, possibly more so. If taking pictures of something is not allowed, you should not even think about filming it. If using a drone, check beforehand whether you can make a movie and what additional permits or licenses are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not breaking the rules in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Pendaftaran merupakan syarat tambahan bagi proses visa. Dalam beberapa negara, anda harus mendaftar kehadiran anda dan alamat di mana anda tinggal dengan pihak berkuasa tempatan. Ini mungkin memerlukan pengisian borang di balai polis tempatan atau kunjungan ke pejabat imigresen. Dalam banyak negara dengan undang-undang begitu, hotel tempatan akan menguruskan pendaftaran (pastikan anda bertanya). Dalam kes lain, hanya mereka yang tinggal di luar tempat penginapan pelancong perlu mendaftar. Namun, ini menjadikan undang-undang menjadi lebih kabur, jadi cari terlebih dahulu.
mt: Registration is an additional requirement for visa processing. In some countries, you must register your presence and address with local authorities. This may require filling out a form at the local police station or visiting the immigration office. In many countries with such laws, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure you ask). In other cases, only those staying outside tourist accommodation need to register. However, this makes the law more ambiguous, so check first.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Melakukan kerja sukarela semasa melancong ialah cara yang baik untuk membawa perubahan tetapi ia bukan sekadar pemberian. Bermastautin dan menjadi sukarelawan di negara asing merupakan cara yang baik untuk mengenali budaya baru, mengenali orang baru, mempelajari tentang diri sendiri, memperoleh pandangan dan bahkan mempelajari kemahiran baru. Ia juga boleh menjadi cara yang bagus untuk membelanjakan anggaran untuk membolehkan tinggal lebih lama di sesuatu tempat oleh kerana banyak kerja sukarela menyediakan bilik dan asrama dan beberapa membayar gaji kecil.
mt: Volunteering while traveling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just giving. Staying and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a new culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, gain perspective and even learn new skills. It's also a great way to stretch your budget to stay longer in a place because many volunteer programs provide housing and some pay a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Melancong ke Walt Disney World merupakan tempat ziarah utama bagi kebanyakan keluarga Amerika. Kunjungan “tipikal” melibatkan penerbangan ke Lapangan Terbang Antarabangsa Orlando, mengambil bas ke hotel Disney, menghabiskan masa lebih kurang seminggu tanpa meninggalkan tapak Disney dan kemudian kembali ke rumah. Terdapat variasi yang tidak terhingga, tetapi ini tetap menjadi maksud kebanyakan orang apabila mereka berkata “mengunjungi Disney World”. Kebanyakan tiket yang dijual dalam talian melalui laman web lelong seperti eBay atau Craigslist adalah tiket “multi-day park-hopper” yang sebahagiannya telah digunakan. Sementara ini ada aktiviti biasa, ia adalah dilarang oleh Disney: tiket tak boleh pindahmilik.
mt: Traveling to Walt Disney World is the primary pilgrimage site for most American families. A “typical” visit involves flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving the Disney property, and then returning home. There are endless variations, but this is what most people mean when they say “visiting Disney World.” Most tickets sold online through auction sites like eBay or Craigslist are “multi-day park-hopper” tickets that have been used in part. While this is a common practice, it is forbidden by Disney: tickets cannot be transferred.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Sesiapa yang merancang untuk melawat ke negara yang boleh dianggap sebagai zon perang hendaklah mendapatkan latihan profesional. Carian di Internet untuk “Hostile environment course” mungkin akan memberi kepada alamat syarikat tempatan. Sebuah kursus biasanya akan meliputi semua isu yang dibincang di sini dengan lebih terperinci, biasanya dengan pengalaman amali. Sesuatu kursus biasanya akan berlangsung selama 2-5 hari dan akan melibatkan permainan peranan, pertolongan cemas yang banyak dan kadangkala latihan senjata. Buku dan majalah berkaitan kelangsungan hidup di hutan belantara adalah biasa, tetapi penerbitan berkaitan zon peperangan adalah sedikit
mt: Anyone planning to visit a country that can be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search on the Internet for "Hostile environment course" may give you the address of a local company. A course will usually cover all the issues discussed here in more detail, usually with practical experience. A course will usually last 2-5 days and will involve role playing, extensive first aid and sometimes weapons training. Survival books and magazines are common, but publications on survival in war zones are rare
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Terdapat pelbagai cara untuk menyaring air, kaedah tertentu lebih berkesan terhadap ancaman khusus. Di beberapa kawasan, mendidih air selama seminit adalah memadai, di kawasan lain beberapa minit adalah diperlukan. Penapis berbeza-beza dari segi keberkesanan, dan sekiranya anda bimbang. anda patut mempertimbangkan untuk membeli air dalam botol tertutup daripada syarikat yang mempunyai reputasi yang baik.
mt: There are many ways to filter water, some methods are more effective against certain threats. In some areas, boiling water for a minute is sufficient, in other areas several minutes are required. Filters vary in effectiveness, and if you are concerned, you should consider buying water in sealed bottles from a company with a good reputation.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Arus yang bergolak adalah aliran balik daripada gelombang yang memecah di pantai, biasanya di terumbu atau seumpama itu. Disebabkan topologi bawah air, aliran balik tertumpu pada beberapa bahagian yang lebih dalam, dan arus yang deras ke air dalam mungkin terbentuk di sana. Kebanyakan kematian berlaku kerana keletihan yang amat sangat kerana hendak berenang balik melawan arus, yang mungkin mustahil. Sebaik sahaja anda keluar dari arus, keupayaan untuk berenang balik sepatutnya tidak lebih sukar berbanding biasa. Cuba tuju ke suatu tempat di mana anda tidak tertangkap lagi atau, bergantung pada pengalaman anda dan sama ada anda telah diperhatikan, anda mungkin hendak tunggu untuk diselamatkan.
mt: A rip current is a backwash from a breaking wave, usually on a reef or similar. Because of the underwater topography, the backwash concentrates in some deeper areas, and a strong current into the deep may form there. Most deaths occur because of extreme exhaustion from trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, the ability to swim back should not be much harder than normal. Try to go to a place where you are not caught again or, depending on your experience and whether you have been noticed, you may have to wait to be rescued.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Arus yang bergolak adalah aliran balik daripada gelombang yang memecah di pantai, biasanya di terumbu atau seumpama itu. Disebabkan topologi bawah air, aliran balik tertumpu pada beberapa bahagian yang lebih dalam, dan arus yang deras ke air dalam mungkin terbentuk di sana. Kebanyakan kematian berlaku kerana keletihan yang amat sangat kerana hendak berenang balik melawan arus, yang mungkin mustahil. Sebaik sahaja anda keluar dari arus, keupayaan untuk berenang balik sepatutnya tidak lebih sukar berbanding biasa. Cuba tuju ke suatu tempat di mana anda tidak tertangkap lagi atau, bergantung pada pengalaman anda dan sama ada anda telah diperhatikan, anda mungkin hendak tunggu untuk diselamatkan.

src: Jalan air dalam negeri mungkin merupakan tema yang baik untuk memulakan percutian. Sebagai contoh melawat istana-istana di Lembah Loire, Lembah Rhine atau menaiki kapal persiaran ke kota-kota menarik di Danube atau berperahu di sepanjang Terusan Erie. Mereka juga menyatakan laluan untuk denai pendakian dan berbasikal.
mt: Inland waterways may be a good theme to start a vacation. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley, Rhine Valley or taking a cruise to the attractive cities along the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also mention routes for hiking and cycling.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Wilayah ini bersempadanan dengan Sahel di bahagian utaranya dan Lautan Atlantik di bahagian selatan dan barat. Wanita: Disyorkan agar pengembara wanita mengatakan bahawa mereka telah berkahwin, walau apa pun status perkahwinan sebenar mereka. Terdapat kelebihan memakai cincin (tetapi bukanlah cincin yang kelihatan terlalu mahal. Wanita sepatutnya sedar bahwa perbezaan budaya mungkin mengakibatkan apa yang mereka anggap sebagai gangguan dan ia tidak jarang untuk diikuti, dicengkam melalui lengan, dll. Tegas dalam menolak manusia, dan jangan takut untuk berdiri teguh (perbezaan budaya atau tidak, ia tidak menjadi ok!).
mt: This region borders the Sahel in its northern part and the Atlantic Ocean in its southern and western parts. Women: It is recommended that female travelers say that they are married, whatever their actual marital status may be. There are advantages to wearing a ring (but not one that looks too expensive. Women should be aware that cultural differences may lead to what they consider to be harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed through the arm, etc. Be firm in rejecting people, and do not be afraid to stand your ground (whether cultural differences or not, it is not okay!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Hidupan liar adalah antara motif yang paling mencabar kepada jurugambar dan ia memerlukan kombinasi nasib baik, kesabaran, pengalaman dan peralatan yang baik. Fotografi hidupan liar sering dianggap remeh, namun seperti fotografi secara amnya, sebuah gambar bernilai seribu perkataan. Fotografi hidupan liar sering memerlukan kanta telefoto yang panjang, walaupun perkara seperti kawanan burung atau makhluk kecil perlu kanta lain. Banyak haiwan eksotik sukar untuk dijumpai, dan taman ada kalanya mempunyai peraturan sekiranya mengambil gambar untuk tujuan komersial. Haiwan liar mungkin sama ada pemalu atau agresif. Persekitaran mungkin sejuk, panas atau seteru.
mt: Wildlife is one of the most challenging subjects to photograph and it requires a combination of luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often considered trivial, yet like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, although things like bird flocks or small creatures require other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules if you are taking pictures for commercial purposes. Wildlife may be shy or aggressive. The environment may be cold, hot or hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Sesiapa yang akan memandu pada latitud tinggi atau melintasi gunung harus fikir tentang kemungkinan adanya salji, ais atau suhu yang membekukan. Keadaan jalan raya berais dan bersalji menyebabkan daya geseran rendah dan anda tidak boleh memandu seolah-olah anda memandu atas jalan turap biasa. Semasa ribut salji, anda boleh terkandas ditimbuni oleh salji dalam masa yang singkat sahaja. Jarak penglihatan mungkin juga terhad oleh salji yang jatuh atau ditiup atau melalui pemeluwapan atau ais pada tingkap kenderaan. Sebaliknya, dilitupi salji dan dingin adalah normal di kebanyakan negara, dan lalu lintas kebanyakannya lancar sepanjang tahun.
mt: Anyone who will be driving at high altitudes or crossing mountains should think about the possibility of snow, ice or freezing temperatures. Snowy and icy road conditions cause low traction and you cannot drive as if you are driving on a normal paved road. During a snowstorm, you can be stranded in a snowdrift in a short time. Visibility may also be limited by falling snow or blown or through condensation or ice on the vehicle windows. On the other hand, covered in snow and cold is normal in most countries, and traffic is mostly smooth throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Kecuali anda seorang diplomat, bekerja di luar negara secara amnya bermaksud anda perlu memfailkan cukai pendapatan di negara tempat tinggal anda. Cukai pendapatan disusun secara berbeza mengikut negara dan kadar cukai dan lingkungan berbeza dari satu negara ke negara yang lain. Di beberapa negara persekutuan, seperti Amerika Syarikat dan Kanada, cukai pendapatan dikenakan pada peringkat persekutuan dan tempatan. Oleh itu, kadar dan julat pendapatan mungkin berbeza dari wilayah ke wilayah.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad generally means you need to file a tax return in your country of residence. Tax returns are structured differently in each country and tax rates and brackets vary from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, taxes are levied at the federal and local level. Therefore, rates and brackets may vary from state to state.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Pameran Dunia (biasanya dipanggil Eksposisi Dunia atau Ekspo) ialah pesta seni dan sains antarabangsa yang besar. Negara-negara peserta mempersembahkan hasil seni dan pendidikan mereka di pavilion kebangsaan yang memaparkan isu-isu global atau budaya dan sejarah negara masing-masing. Ekspo Hortikultur Antarabangsa merupakan acara khusus yang mempamerkan pameran bunga, taman botani dan apapun yang berkaitan dengan tumbuh-tumbuhan. Walaupun dalam teori mereka boleh melakukan setiap tahun (selagi mereka berada di dalam negara-negara yang berbeza), dalam latihan mereka tidak boleh. Acara tersebut berlangsung selama tiga hingga enam bulan, dan diadakan di tapak yang berukuran tidak kurang dari 50 hektar.
mt: A World's Fair (usually called an Expo or Exposition) is an international exhibition held in a different country every five years. Countries participating in the fair present their artistic and educational achievements in national pavilions that showcase their respective country's culture and history. The International Horticultural Exposition is a special event that features flower shows, botanical gardens, and anything related to plants. Although in theory they can be held every year (as long as they are in different countries), in practice they cannot. The event lasts three to six months, and is held on a site that is at least 50 hectares in size.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Walaupun kebanyakan haiwan di taman digunakan untuk melihat manusia, hidupan liar adalah tetap liar dan tidak boleh makan atau diganggu. Menurut pihak berkuasa taman tersebut, kekalkan jarak 100 ela/meter daripada beruang dan serigala dan 25 ela/meter daripada semua binatang liar yang lain! Bagaimana jinak sekali rupa mereka, bison, rusa, moose, beruang, dan hampir semua haiwan besar boleh menyerang. Setiap tahun, berpuluh-puluh pelawat tercedera kerana mereka tidak menjaga jarak yang betul. Binatang-binatang ini amat besar, liar dan berpotensi bahaya, oleh itu beri ruang kepada mereka. Di samping itu, berhati-hati kerana bau kuat boleh menarik perhatian beruang dan haiwan liar yang lain. Oleh itu elakkan daripada membawa atau memasak makanan berbau kuat dan sentiasa jaga kebersihan kem.
mt: Although most of the animals in the park are there to see people, wild animals are still wild and cannot be fed or disturbed. According to park officials, keep a distance of 100 yards from bears and wolves and 25 yards from all other wild animals! How tame they look, bison, deer, moose, bears, and almost all large animals can attack. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they do not keep the proper distance. These animals are very large, wild and potentially dangerous, so give them space. In addition, be careful because strong odors can attract bears and other wild animals. So avoid bringing or cooking food with strong odors and always keep your camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
